title: Not a 4 star hotel
review: The hotel is not worthy of the 4 star! I’d say a 2 and a half stars!  The room wasn't even cleaned up properly when we first stepped in!  We found lots of hair and dust on the floor and in the bathtub!  The sheets were stained and the blankets were also dirty ... unacceptable for a 4 star hotel!  The bed is actually a twin bed that is very uncomfortable at night because the two beds can easily separate (not recommended if you have children with you).  Other than that, you can hear everything from the other rooms which is quite unplesant at night!  The food was ok and various everyday but there weren’t actually english names for all the food.  Some of it you will have to guess what it is before you eat it.  The waiters were very rude, they didn't understand english (most of them)!  They even took our plates before we finished our dinner without even asking if we were done!!!  I didn’t see this kind of behavior in other contries or hotels I’ve been!  The only polite people were at the reception!  Other than that, the location is quite nice and close to the strip and the main attractions in Magaluf, yet still a quiet area!…

title: Great food, small pool, bad wifi
review: My party of 10 recently arrived for our annual stay at this hotel. We were greeted warmly and it felt like coming home. All staff were extremely friendly and were easygoing and great fun.  The entertainment team encouraged us to take part in their activities and were always enthusiastic.  The restaurant and bar staff were also amazing and often went out of their way to help us. The food was always hot, varied and delicious. One day we there the snack bar wasn’t opened , however we just asked the bar staff and then food was prepared freshly for us - amazing service.  We were caught up in the Thomas Cook fiasco, however despite this the hotel welcomed us with open arms and took action to ensure our holiday went as smooth as possible.  Can’t wait to return next year.  Jayne Hardy and friends …

The hotel has 9 floors, so I requested a lower ground room (having a fear of lifts) and my request was granted as we were allocated a room on the first floor. The room had air…

title: Average Hotel
review: Overall my stay at HSM Atlantic Park was fairly good and I wasn’t disappointed. I wouldn’t give it no more than 3 stars though. It’s an average hotel which gets the job done.   More than half of the staff were rude, especially the room cleaners. The receptionist wasn’t the politest woman as well. However, all of the bar staff were very friendly and quite funny characters.   When we arrived, the night entertainment team told us that if we gave them 5 star ratings and a good description on Trip Advisor then we would receive certain facilities to use for free such as free access to the pool table for example.  This was not the case though. The hotel reps would personally write good reviews on your phone and not supply free facilities as promised. This is bribery and suggests…

Great enthusiasm from the entertainment team (Feddi, Alex, Merci and Mooriney) 100% capable of making the kids happy.   Pool was clean and Layout good to supervise son and make friends. Raquel was tentative serving drinks around the pool and on the tables. 🙏👍 Mealtimes was a safe bet always something good for us. Self service drinks choice couldn't be faulted.  Location is brilliantly easy to get to the Pirates Show, waterpark, go-carts, the stripe and more. I wish we could go again tomorrow, we would go back definitely!!

Highly recommended by myself and the lovely people I met. Well done guys.

review: Stayed here whilst travelling in Majorca.  First thing I'd say is this is a completely independent review.  First impressions, the smell in the foyer ... not sure what this was, chemicals maybe,  Seemed to be coming from the toilet area, next to the entrance to the restaurant.  Woeful.  Rooms are ok but the place is just dated.  Walls paper thin, next doors alarm went off, sounded like it was on my bedside table.  Food, went for breakfast, never went back.  Really poor quality.  Pool, is ok, plenty of beds.  Drinks, didn't have any but was told very expensive.  Wi-fi was acceptable.   Would I return, no chance.  Recommend ?  Nope.  Wish I'd noticed how many amazing reviews contain identical grammatical errors ....

I wouldn’t read too much into the other reviews about being pressured into writing them as we didn’t have that what so ever. Of course if you really wanted to look into issues you would find them. Positives: Modern room, cleaned regularly, friendly bar/waiting/cleaning staff, always can get a sunbed, space around pool, bus service outside hotel - regularly, cheap, right by pirate adventure which was ideal on night out.   Negatives: A few reception staff not the friendliest, foyer uninviting, only two lifts - forever waiting, walls very thin / noise most nights, entertainment - what can I say, didn’t see anything I would class as entertainment whole time there, food - basic but ok if your a meat eater, I am a vegetarian and I has bored with what options were available to me.  Wouldn’t offer a extension on the room when having late flight.  Hotel not far from Magaluf nightlife but one of the furthest away.  …

Also the drinks machines should be labelled for all inclusive only,as we saw alot of guests without the white bands just helping themselves. The hotel is ideally situated not too far from the…

We left the do not disturb sign on the door and every morning the cleaners would still walk in your room anyways. The entertainment at night time is not very entertaining at all, the only bar is the pool bar and that closes at 12pm every night. If you’re looking to get a take away do not go to McDonalds, the food was disgusting. The Pizza Hut, Burger King and kfc was nice.

review: Stayed in HSM Atlantic Park for the first time in September.The hltel itself is about 5-10 minute walk from the beach and the strip which is no bad thing if you don't want to be bothered by noise,in saying that it was quiet anyway given the time of year. Staff are frendly and all speak english, the rooms are clean amd tidy and cleaned with towel change each day. The food was of a high standard and a good variety available. The pool area was quite small but clean and well maintained. There was no spa at the hotel although a masseur was on site at least 3-4 times a week and at a cost of €60 for a full body massage which lasted approx an hour. The famous Pirates show was just literally across the road and was well worth a visit with a meal and drink included in the price, cost of…

title: HSM Atlantic Park
review: Stayed for 4 nights on a short break a lovely hotel with lovely rooms helpful staff and nice food very nice stay would recommend highly to anyone a short walk to the beach shops and night life or stay at the hotel it has everything you need

title: Rude staff & bad food
review: Without any introduction I must say that I have traveled quite a few times but have never seen such a "4 stars" hotel. I got a feeling that the management doesn't really understand the meaning of a "good service". Waiters with really basic knowledge of English, Food cold and often overcooked, bar staff rude and unpolite. I am not a picky person but common - is it so difficult to smile sometimes? The only smiling persons we saw was animators but that is their job specific. Was not worth my money.

title: Economy trip with group
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.  Please accept our apologies for not meeting your expectations.  Kind regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: GREAT HOTEL
review: Fourteen senior men on a jolly to celebrate a seventieth birthday. Also to watch the Ryder cup, now I know the Ryder cup golf was played in France. But we all watched as a group in a sports bar knocking back some serious drinks. I E cocoa, oveltine.Now back to hotel, we were looking for a hotel that was not ridiculously expensive to keep in budget for all.  Hotel in good position on edge of all you require. Good coastline. Good shopping, plenty of restaurants,

title: Group Booking B&B
review: I really liked the hotel, stuff and location, breakfast was also amazing. The only thing that really disappointed me was that they only had a few Iron, not available for every room. But other than that was great.

Although we had our reservations about this hotel when we arrived we were pleasantly surprised when walking into reception, it seemed clean fresh and modern . When we went to check in after a very long day travelling the young man behind the counter stared at us until I finally said hi we would like to check in to which he replied very nastily ''PASSPORTS!'' , he did not say hello welcome or anything of the sort just PASSPORTS! After taking our passports he handed us a slip in Spanish and told me I have to pay an additional 46 euro tax , he did not explain it was the tourism tax which I knew I had to pay,  after doing the documentation and handing us our keys I said thank you and took them ,he then said angrily ''LISTEN'' even though he had said nothing after handing us our keys…

title: Sad to have spent money.
review: We came with friends to have some rest and restore our batteries. We were all-inclusive which definitely didn't pay off. After eating first two days in the restaurant we decided to go and try restaurants in the city. The food in the buffet was most of the time either cold or overcooked and cold. After eating the fish me and one more guy we spent the rest of the day in the toilet. However the biggest disadvantage of the hotel was the bar staff. Even without knowing Spanish we could understand that the bartenders were not handling stressful situations and were shouting at each other in bad language which even us know. Attitude was definitely not welcoming. Not gonna come back!

title: Disappointing
review: Dear Vineta,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.  Please accept our apologies for not meeting your expectations.  Kind regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: Pleasant stay
review: Hotel condition is very bad. Strongly needs refurbishment, especially in the public areas around the inner bar. Leaking roof and nobody’s doing anything about it. Food - dry and tasteless, staff not smiling, rude and unprofessional, bartenders especially. Only animation kept us in the hotel however looked like the guys had to work with very poor equipment.  Definitely not worth the stars and money we paid.

title: What 4 star
review: Dear Tadas069,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.  Please accept our apologies for not meeting your expectations.  Kind regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: Horrible service
review: Worst workers,they don't respect or treat well worst hotel i have ever visited especially the workers on the reception they are rude and sassy. Dont make the mistake and visiting this terrible hotel..

title: Do not trust the comments
review: Dear Antwanhelou,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.  Please accept our apologies for not meeting your expectations.  Kind regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: singles holday
review: Me and my wife came to this hotel at the beginning of September. As we always carefully choose the hotel where we want to go we did read the comments in TripAdvisor and got convinced that this is the best choice according to other people. Sure there are sometimes bad comments but we decided to give a try.  Well.. where to begin.. Arrival and the check-in up to standards but the rest - I doubt if the hotel even earns 3 stars. Room was not bad but the cleaning staff has to be better trained - both - in basics of communication in English  (as this is strongly international hotel) as well as noticing the signs hanged on the door handle.  Restaurant - good choice of salad, fruits and bread, but the rest.. really feels that kitchen lacks budget - hot line very poor with low quality…

title: very good hotel
review: best service ever.smiling all the way food excellentactivities  were provided, all you have to do is choose.clean environment, I would just suggest that if they could look at the smoking and have a section for smokers and non smokers.

title: Holiday there last week
review: The hotel is very clean and the staff work very hard to keep it that way always seen staff cleaning the public areas even late into the evening .the restaurant is very good as a picky eater I always found something to eat and they have a very large range they have a salad bar pizza corner and fresh fruit everyday . there are some small improvements that I think they could make but they are only small ones we arrived on an early flight  but check in is  not to 1400 so had to wait around for room but as we were all inclusive we could have food and drink just would have liked to get in room sooner and the same if you have a late departure check out is 1200 so you have to check by 12 I think they should give people the choice of paying a little extra for early check in and late…

title: Such a lovely hotel
review: Couldn't fault this hotel. From the moment we arrived the reception staff warmly greeted us and had our rooms ready even though we were early.There was 10 of us in 4 different rooms and they placed us next to each other, the rooms were clean and tidy and house keeping came in every day to clean.  All the staff in the restaurant and snack bar are so friendly and work so hard, as do all the staff. Then you have the wonderful entertainment crew who got us involved in activities every day and evening. Thank you Silvia, Robertas, Merce and Moorinny.Definitely would come back.

title: Faultless.
review: This is the first review I have written on here and the reason for wanting to do so is because me and my girlfriend had a wonderful time. We arrived around midnight on Tuesday and was welcomed by Alex. He was very welcoming and had everything we needed ready to go. We went up to our nice and clean room. After a good nights sleep we went for breakfast. A good selection, although I wasn’t keen on the bacon. (I’m passionate about bacon🐷🤣) After breakfast we took a stroll to see how far we was from the main areas of Magaluf. The hotel location was brilliant! A very simple 5 minuets walk to the main strip but on another day we took a bus into Palma as the bus stop is right outside the hotel but Palma was even closer than we expected so we walked back.  The selection of food at…

title: A good hotel
review: This is a very good hotel with very good service.It is at a reasonable distance from the beach for those who would like a good night sleep, and a few minutes walk to the beach. The room is a bit dry in terms of frills - but it is neat and decent. The aircon works perfectly and so does the wifi - which for us counted as being essentials!

title: Nice hotel let down by the waiting staff
review: The hotel is good friendly reception staff & entertainment the cleaners are friendly but we were messed us around the older woman made a few sly digs as we arrived 40 mins before closing , then another day we were asked to move tables ,  even though another table was not asked to move next to us . Finally I had enough when on another day another waiter told me 'don't sit here tomorrow 'as I sat down  I told him to get lost as he ruined my dinner & complained to the manager

title: bussines trip
review: Greatest hotel with perfect servis. Recommedation for all type of guests. Popular Niki beach is Just two minutes from the hotel, and also center of corolful Magaluf. The parties and night life doesn't comes to the hotel.

title: Good Choice
review: Clean, nice entertainment and good food. You can tell that all the staff try really hard. The kids club catered mainly to older children. The baby pool was very cold.  We booked a trip to Marine Land from the reception but were not given clear instructions. In the end we jumped on a local bus.   They had a great deal for the water park nearby.   It was a good relaxing stay. Food in all inclusive can be boring but the hotel really  made an effort to jazz things up!  It would be grate if there was more than a tiny hut for the kids.  I think kids should be signed in and out from the kids club. Also more should be done to include younger guests 1-4 years.

title: Relaxing
review: Dear Lightchild,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!  Best regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: we will be back
review: From the moment we arrived all the staff and facilities were excellent, food was good , rooms clean and spacious, the entertainment staff looked after my entire family faultlessly. There was no sun bed was that I experienced last time we stopped in Majorca, just stroll out after breakfast and pick where we wanted to go , plenty of room , hopefully we will be going back soon.

title: A Great Spot to experience mallorca
review: Dear grice69,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: Great stay
review: Everything worked. From the check in, to the great room we received everything is fine ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Top we love it food and of course the fully motivated and very friendly staff run by an excellent, very friendly manager. And the location of the hotel was perfect, the beach about 10 minutes on foot. In the evening in the various centers all within easy walking distance. the entertement can be better but tony and the rest try his best. We look forward to next winter again.

title: We never stay anywhere else in Magaluf.
review: Brilliant. We love this hotel. All the staff are fab. We will be back next year. Great for kids also. Not too close to all the nightclubs, but a bit off a walk. Can't wait to return next year. Our grandchild loves this hotel.😎

title: Nice hotel with good and negative points
review: Dear paddypayne,  Wow! Thank you so much for your nice review! We are so happy to know that you had a fantastic stay at our hotel :)  We hope to see you again very very soon!  Best wishes from sunny Mallorca,  HSM Atlantic Park

title: Great family holiday
review: Lovely clean swimming pool areas with plenty of sunbeds for everyone.  Nice rooms, very good air conditioning.  Very helpful reception staff.  Brilliant animation team, lots of activities for children during the day and discos  and party dances in the evening also.  Very good kids clubs every day.   Engaging activities for adults too during the day darts aqua gym water polo to name a few.  Food was not brilliant.  Cold breakfast, lunch and dinner most days.  There was however a microwave so you could warm your meal up if wanted to.  There was plenty of choice however and a very good salad bar and range of desserts including a large selection of fresh fruit.  Was very disappointed to see the charge for €5 euros per person  for drinks for each meal time.  We paid almost £4k for…

title: Holiday
review: We have just returned, we have a young family and can't recommend the hotel enough, staff are fantastic and so helpful, kids loved the entertainment. Food was great so much choice well cooked. We will be back!

title: Iain
review: Dear grahamnatashia,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again very soon.  Best regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: great place
review: In my point o view, HSM is Very good hotel. It's well located, near beaches, bares, and other facilities such water park. It serves a great quality food.  Staff always nice and helpful. Very good swimming pool. Perfect

title: Our stay at GSM Atlantic Park
review: Dear sandr0brasil,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we  hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards from Mallorca,  HSM Atlantic Park

title: Very nice!
review: Great Hotel for families with very friendly accommodating staff and super clean.Food was Good even for vegetarians!Kids loved the entertainment throughout the day although evening entertainmemt was not great.Overall 9/10 would definatly go back

title: Family birthday holiday
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards,  HSM Atlantic Park

title: Poor
review: Location is very good, close to the beach and to the center, but in a quiet quarter. In front of the Hotel is the bus station and large Parking. Staff is very kind and helpfull.  We have half board and the food was delicious but for dinner we didnt get any drinks at all (not even the water) unless we pay 5€/person!!! That is outrageous!

title: Lovely
review: Lovely hotel stayed past 4 years. This year they have had a change in staff still a few familiar faces. All very friendly. Food amazing as always. All inclusive is definitely worth it. 5 minute walk to beach. 4 star hotel but if u get a back room your view is horrible especially when your paying for a 4 star hotel!

title: Deplorable experience
review: Having visited hundreds of hotels scattered around Europe, my experience at this hotel goes down as one of the worst.      The hotel has a guard/bouncer named Leonard which at first sight was already concerning as why does a four star hotel need one of these? He was aggressive, obnoxious, rude and he seemed to cause more problems than he solved. I presume he was hired based on the fact that he was big and powerful rather than on his ability to resolve an issue.      The receptionists were equally as rude and unhelpful. They do not listen to complaints, instead they threaten to kick you out therefore you do not really have a choice other than to put up with an issue unless you have enough money to move to a different hotel.      I opted for self catering therefore I am unable to…

title: Family holiday
review: This hotel is great. We had a late arrival (2am), receptionist was very helpful and got us checked in quickly. Staff at the hotel were great and the food was good, good choice. Great holiday all round.

title: all inclusive
review: Dear kirstiebarwise,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards,  HSM Atlantic Park

title: Average based on other hotels
review: just back from here after a week with my family of 5 we spent 3200 pound for a week this hotel is awful do not book every one i spoke to in the hotel wss so upset with it its old and dated they give you old curtains for bed sheets the beds are so hard worst sleep ive had the food was auful about 4 dishes to choses from a day all cheap rubbish all tge drinks from the machines are all warm all the balconys are rusty the staff are so nasty as they are overworked apart from one nice man named dino who works hard its the same staff on constant they even work in the dinner area aa well and bars they just through drinks down like you dont deserve iy after paying 3 thousand pound my room was dirty constant peoples toe nails all over my floor on arrival and dirt every place all they did…

title: Family Break ay HSM Atlantic Magaluf
review: Just returned from a second visit to this hotel. We stayed on an all-inclusive basis and noticed a real attempt to add a few extra little touches to our last stay which demonstrate they are working harder to justify the four star rating which is they just about deserve. The hotel is very clean, the staff work incredibly hard and we found them to be attentive, friendly including the restaurant / bar and cleaning staff. The food is ok, nothing spectacular, fresh, hot but a little repetitive at times. The hotel rooms are clean, we had rooms on the first floor (9 in total) and despite a bit of noise, in general we had no issues with a mix of families and a few groups of lads and girls.Entertainment is ok during the day with sports on offer if you wish to participate - the evenings…

title: holidays
review: Dear stevenowen2,   Thank you for your review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Kind regards,  HSM Atlantic Park

title: Family holiday
review: We had a fantastic stay at atlantic park The staff  were organized and very helpful, ensuring that everything during our stay went smoothly. Our unit was clean, spacious and well appointed, with everything we needed to settle into our beach vacation..we recomended

title: Lovely hotel, but staff made us feel uncomfortable
review: Dear Patricia,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Best wishes from Mallorca,  HSM Atlantic Park

title: fantastic
review: Hotel was very nice. Food and facilities were very good also. Night time entertainment wasn't the best but was ok. Felt they could of had a kettle and coffee and tea in the rooms would of helped a lot nd b nice.

title: Average
review: Pro:Good location.Food was really good.The Staff was quite friendly.Nice pool even though is a bit too smallCon:Good for families, not for young people.No way to make new friends in the Hotel.Rooms are old. Mine was way too small and facing the backyard of the hotel.Animation just for kids. if you want to have fun that's not the right place.Conclusion:You would expect more. At least I would. From a 4 stars hotel (and for that price) I would expect a different kind of luxury.

title: Lovely visit
review: This is 2nd stay at this hotel and we’ve had a great time again. Pool can get a bit over crowded but the entertainment staff are always doing activities in and out of the pool to keep people entertained and to try and help relieve this. Most staff were polite and helpful.  Rooms are spacious( family room) and cleaned daily with clean sheets and towels. Bathrooms spacious with complimentary shampoo and body wash. Wardrobes are big but we did take extra hangers this year as last year not enough.  WiFi dosent Work by pool for kids iPads at night for evening entertainment.  If all inc and going out for the day, you can order picnic before 7pm night before. Hotel don’t inform you of this. The picnic has improved from last year which is good.  I do feel the restaurant has slipped a…

title: Not worth 4*
review: Hotel is not far away from beach. The room was cleaned every day. Bus stop is straight near. Restaurant must be more clean, glasses and dishes was not washed well, food is ok first and second day, after it get start boring to eat the same.

title: HSM Atlantic Park
review: On the plus side pool, food and entertainment staff very good. Rooms are small and dated. The poolside bar staff were surly bordering on rude. Breakfast hot food was luke warm at times. Only English tv channels were News - no entertainment channels. Plenty of sun beds for a change which was nice. Good fun in the evening with the fantastic entertainment guys.Still enjoyed our trip but would rate hotel 3 star

title: good
review: atlantic park is a hotel very well located in magaluf that although it has its bad reputation is an ideal place to spend it with friends and families. the hotel is just 10 minutes from the beach. and to 20 min from palma city by car idea to know the island. the staff of the hotel make you feel like family although there are many english people the atmosphere is nice. tony is very kind he gave us many recommendations of the city highly recommended

title: Family holiday
review: I wasn’t expecting much from some of the reviews but it isn’t all bad. We are currently staying now and there are a few things that need to change, the food - it is very same old every day and now I’m dreading lunch and dinner every day! It’s not that it’s poorly cooked but it’s so bland and repetitive. The floor outside is pretty vile, they don’t put the sun loungers away so the floor doesn’t get cleaned and it’s got to the point I won’t walk around without shoes on. Cigarette butts, dirt and spilt drinks is not a good combination. A glass broke on our balcony last night due to high winds and it was everywhere, we left early morning thinking the cleaners would be ok to clear it but came back and it was still everywhere. So we had to use a towel and do it ourselves. We had to…

title: Family fun in the sun
review: 10 out of 10 for the HSM Atlantic Park. We booked as a family of 4 all inclusive and cannot fault this place. We were in room 215 just above the pool entrance and were suprised by the lack of noise. The rooms were spacious and cleaned to a high standard every day and the air conditioning is brilliant which makes the stay comfortable all of the time. The food is great and there is always lots despite what time you go to the restaurant. The snack bar is open between meals to keep everyone happy including even the most fussy eater. The kids love the pool all day long and the endless AI drinks. On the subject of the drinks, the hard working bar staff are generous with the drink measures which adds to the atmosphere which the great entertainment staff provide throughout the day and…

title: Brilliant hotel for a family holiday
review: We have just been here for the second time and had another brilliant week with the kids. The entertainment team are so friendly and full of energy. The food is really really good at this hotel and the whole atmosphere is relaxed and lovely. The pool is really clean and big and the sun loungers are really comfy especially the new ones! Thank you HSM Atlantic Park for a great holiday

title: Olga podsiadlo
review: Ive spent great family holiday at this hotel  Rooms r big enough and they r cleaned every day  Meals r great everyone will find something  I would like to thank Jesus, Louis, Andrea, and Neida at the canteen as they were excellent. There is one person I want to say big thanks, Roman at the bar is great at his work, very helpful and nice. Animation staff is great especially Robertas  There is two things which Need changes First: lifts are total mistake, there is no fan so it’s awful hot in there and sometimes when we wanted go down we had to go up couple times and then it was going down  Second: doors to the pool... they’re so slow, they not open   Overall I would recommend this hotel to anyone

title: Very good
review: Very clean hotel, food was great and all staff was friendly and helpful, beach, markets and bars are nearby  A little bit noisy at night, but that was tolerable.   Best time on pool was around 2pm when lot of people went to lunch.   Animation was ok, and they didn’t annoy you if you didn’t want to participate.   All in all l, our stay was pleasant.

title: Much better than expected!
review: We read all the reviews and was very nearly put off... and the hotel was lovely! The food was absolutely AMAZING, I don't understand what people were on about saying how bad the food was etc! The rooms were nice and clean, pool area was lovely and is an all round good family hotel. The entertainers there work so hard and were genuinely entertaining! The only thing I can fault... the majority of the staff are SOOO RUDE, the bar staff and some of the waiters have very very bad attitude. The security guard at night should be sacked... he screamed in someone's face for 'laughing' in reception after 12am and told them to stop being disrespectful or he was going to hit them! Apart from that it's a lovely hotel and we had a great time. Well worth going all inclusive!

title: Great hotel for all!!
review: My wife and I as we are not in the 18-30 age group wanted a hotel that was near to the strip  and Magaluf beach but far enough away from the noise and excitement when we wanted to relax. We were slightly worried that it would be a little too lively for a mature couple on holiday but we loved it. We booked half board as we would spend most of the day at the beach. The food was great, buffet style with many different options. We were worried as my wife is a fussy vegitarian but she found great variety and choice daily. We werent aware of the half board drinking restriction in the resurant untill our second day so make note of this when booking as you have to pay extra (5 euros) to have a drink.  The hotel was very clean and tidy with our room cleaned and stripped daily and the air…

title: love love love!!
review: just got back. we loved this holiday! hotel was lovely and clean a little tired but that can be ignored. beds very comfortable! staff lovely.  food was nice typical all inclusive. the entertainment team were brilliant worked day and night to keep kids and adults entertained. my son loved them! located about 5 minutes walk to the beautiful beach, town and shops. great hoilday we will definitely go back

title: Much Better
review: We arrived again to this great hotel, after two years I'm still impressed and the rooms look much better after the quick refurbishment. The welcome is always great and very warm along with English speaking staff at all times. The pool is a great space and since our last visit there is now WIFI for free throughout. The restaurant still resembles very similar to the one before but with a few tweaks it looks better. The food options are great considering my family and I are vegetarian and the chef did cook us a few dishes which we could enjoy. The staff in the restaurant is brilliant along with the cleaning staff and there were two people from these sectors of the hotel who stood out. Sadly I don't know there names but they are so nice and considerate including the cleaner who…

title: Nice & pleasant place
review: One week holiday stay in the beginning of July 2018. Big, comfortable hotel, 5-minute walking distance from the beach. Nice service, especially people at the recepcion. Delicious food with smiling waiters. Young holidaymakers not too noisy. In two words - a great stay.

title: surprisingly good hotel
review: I went to this hotel with my husband, 20yr son, his girlfriend their baby and my teenage son. i went slightly worried that it would be a little too lively for a family holiday but we loved it. Booked as all inclusive as we thought this would be the easiest option for us. The food was standard all inclusive buffet style food but as they had so many different nationalities they did a bit to suit all which led to some weird looking dishes but have to say tried a lot and were quite tasty. if your a fussy eater maybe rethink all inclusive as there are some fantastic restaurants on the beach front as we did eat out a couple of times but we had always planned too. snacks were tasty and was made for you while you waited which i liked as you knew they where hot. the drinks that are…

title: Upmarket Magaluf !!!!!
review: Just got back from HSM Atlantic Park and it was one of the most enjoyable holiday we have had and we have been going for about 15 years . The hotel is modern , clean and situated away from noisy teenagers . People of Majorca like to call this place CALVIA , getting away from the bad press it gets . They are really trying and succeeding to have this resort a new chic place to be with the new Calvia hotel with its glass bottom pool on the roof with eateries and shops below . Anyway , we were on the 7th floor overlooking the pool . The air con was superb along with the refreshing shower . The staff from the manager to the cleaners were exceptional . If I could " nit pick " the food was nice but a little repetitive . Another little downside is that the pool is not very big ,…

title: Best Hotel in Magaluf!
review: HSM Atlantic Hotel is a 4star hotel. We’re currently in our first night here and the staff are very nice, they have a big pool, the food is great, and location wise too.   We’ll definitely book here again next time!

title: 5 day break
review: stayed here for 5 nights July 2018, all inclusive with my two daughters 16 and 18. Hotel was a good location. Room was on 9th floor, pool facing. Enough room for our needs.There was a mini fridge in room but was locked. You have to pay to use it as with the mini safe. There was no water available unless bar or restaurant was open. The last hotel we stayed in bottled water was available 24hrs a day. Best air conditioning I have experienced. The hotel was very clean and maid service was in every day making beds and changing towels. Only two lifts so could be a wait. The only downside of this hotel was the food. For us as a family we only ate in restaurant once. The other nights we walked through and walked back out. There was little choice and very repetative. The salad and cold…

title: Nice hotel but not 4*
review: I’d say 3*plus but not 4* heres why....  Transfer by taxi 🚕  about 30 minutes  Location: central enough to walk where you want to go but not so central it’s noisy at night. Check In: quick but not too informative. (Might just have been the guy at reception at that time) as I had a few queries that were answered later. Rooms: first floor right above the pool entrance and outside seating area (very little noise for such a room close to the bar which was great) Pool: a lot smaller than looks in the pictures. No problems to get a  Sunbed throughout the day but a shortage of umbrellas.  Pool snacks: hot dogs, chips, chicken nuggets, calamari, toastie and onion rings. Not bad but started to run out of nuggets and onion rings mid week.  Masseuse: pool masseuse was expensive but…

title: Returned 25/7/18
review: Staff are very friendly, efficient, courteous, and helpful. Hotel is clean and rooms are very comfortable, and well maintained. Asked to move from the junior suite on the first day to another room with a better view and was accommodated very efficiently without any fuss. Food in the restaurant was a good wide choice. Only downside at times was that the meat would have too much fat on it, but that's a small criticism. Wine on the all inclusive for the restaurant, I'm sorry, was just not of good quality at all..red or white very poor quality. Catering and waiting staff were excellent. Pool was fine, and the ability to get sunbeds was no problem at all no matter the time of day. The entertainment team are excellent, in particular Robertas, and Mooringhi..just pretty sound people up…

title: Perfect hotel for lads
review: Came with 2 other friends, we all stayed in separate room. I enjoyed my room, pool was good to use, reception was great. Food was delicious.  Overall a lovely hotel with good staff. Especially the security guard. Thanks Leonard

title: Amazing
review: The Hotel was amazing with the pool and rooms. House cleaning was fantastic and really friendly staff. The food was also good but lacked diversity and I didn't experience spanish food in the hotel. The standards of the hotel was very high and they met my expectations.

title: Great Hotel
review: Went on holiday with a group of friends at the start of July, the hotel was lovely and the staff were friendly. The pictures on the website really don’t do the Hotel justice as it was a lot nicer than I envisioned.  There was a wide range of food from the buffet at meal times and they had different delicacies on nights throughout the week. I would strongly recommend going all inclusive as the unlimited free drinks and snacks added to the relaxing holiday experience and saved lots of money on buying drinks. The rooms were spacious and kept clean by the daily housekeeping visits. Overall I was very pleased with the week I spent at HSM Atlantic Park and would strongly recommend the hotel to anyone going to Magaluf and would definitely go back myself.

title: Good
review: Very nice hotel. Second time a atlantic park and every time just amazing. The recepcion was was very fast and acurated we got a really fast check in the room was big with alot of space we really recomended

title: Ok
review: This was a lovely holiday for me and my boyfriend as it was near the strip but far away enough from the noise of it all. However, bit disappointed in the staff as they seemed to not want to make the younger people feel welcome and the fact that "all inclusive" wasn't really all inclusive as there were some drinks you had to pay for like Pimms and lemonade which I thought was rather off. The snacks are all deep fried which was disappointing. The food wasn't labelled very clearly and the desserts weren't ever labelled at all! Also the fruit was frozen solid and very hard to eat. The wifi was free but did seem to lose connection quite a lot.

title: Back to Magaluf
review: Second visit to Atlantic Park Hotel......first was 3 years ago This time we had to pay the let’s rip off the tourist tax.... bought the flight...the hotel...will spend money........LETS GET MORE OFF THEM.............RIP OFF Not hotels fault  Hotel was as expected .....very nice ....been slightly renovated since last visit Deserves its 4 star status Staff all nice and helpful Plenty of room at the pool.....none of this run down and put your towel down nonsense  Food was overall very nice with plenty of choice   Would recommend Atlantic Park Hotel for all age groups and types of holidays Located at the outskirts of the “Strip” next to the “ pirates” venue  3 min walk to Magaluf beach

title: Not impressed
review: I stayed at this hotel with a group of friends for our holiday. The food, drinks and rooms were all at a good standard. My only problem with this hotel is that the receptionist gave a room key to someone that was not staying in my room, thankfully it was a friend of ours however the key should not have been given without our permission. No questions were asked when they asked for the key it was just handed over. When we then asked to speak to a manager we were told he wasn’t there.

title: Brill
review: Had a great holiday, the food was amazing something different every day, robertas made our holiday special his hospitality is 10/10 so professional and a genuine lovely man, we can’t wait to come back next year

title: Too much noise
review: The hotel is lovely and the staff are very helpful and our room very comfortable. The food was ok. The down side to this hotel was the noise of the sound system and hordes of youngsters on a binge holiday after finishing school. In the hotels own description it speaks of a quiet family friendly hotel away from the main bustle of Magaluf it was anything but and despite complaining about the noise from the sound system and the of the youngsters nothing was done so most of our time was spent away from the hotel.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Stayed here for a week for a group holiday (all early 20s), was a lovely hotel and better than we expected. The pool was nice to relax around, the staff were friendly and helpful, and the rep there (Phil) was helpful and not pestering you at all to buy tickets, was just generally helpful and lovely. We had half board, the breakfast was absolutely fine, best meal overall, however at dinner time you had to pay 5€ just for a drink to accompany your meal, which we found a bit unfair, it would’ve been nice to be allowed just a glass of water, but this was the only negative of our stay. Is in a good location close to everything and 10 minutes from the strip. However it is a family hotel, so the security guard would be on your case immediately after the slightest bit of noise past…

title: Regular visitors over 18 years THE FOOD QUALITY & QUANTITY HAS GONE DOWN HILL
review: We are regular visitors to this hotel  over approx 18 years.We love everything about it,the A team on reception Sylvia,Maria,Juan Carlos and Tony are exceptional as are the bar (the rude miserable man has retired) and restaurant staff.Cleanliness is brilliant inside and out,fantastic pool facilities,and close to beach and shopping areas.The entertainment team are friendly and do a good job with the budget given,although it should be better for a 4 star hotel.Before it changed to The Atlantic Park it was known as the Don Manolo which was 3 star,the entertainment then was absolutely amazing,the bar was packed to capacity every single night and they had a variation of entertainers including british Kez and Johny.Also bingo with hundreds of euros on offer everynight which brought in…

title: Recomendable
review: The hotel is very nice. We paid for 5 days an we wanted to stay longer. The receptionist and bartenders were very kind with us. The best part of this hotel is the restaurant is just amazing everyday was a new experience. And special mention to Tony he helped uf a lot hope to come backwards next year

title: Lovely hotel, awful food
review: Recently went to this hotel with my friends, massive double room, however with a bad view of the car park, pool was lovely and easy to get beds. Only bad thing was the food, lacked variety and was not nutritious.

title: HSM Atlantic Park
review: This hotel is not a 4 Star - the food is boring same every night - cold pizza, undercooked and tough beef, pasta same food lunch and evening meal - rooms need freshening up - plenty to drink though - entertainment average in the evening -   Beach 10-15 minutes walk and also supermarkets - wouldn’t stay here again

title: Excellent
review: Hotel was incredible, rooms always clean. Staff unbelievably friendly, the security guard here made our trip he was kind and friendly and made sure the hotel was quiet after 12. Close to both the strip and beech. Great choice of food at meal times and snacks were always great. 100% would recommend for all ages and groups of people visiting

title: Perfect holiday
review: Minor problem with room on arrival due to plumbing issue sorted out very quickly by Toni on reception super service  Food was plentiful and lots of variety no problems in getting sun bed by the pool plenty of them  Evening entertainment ok it’s not broadway but enjoyable  Go all inclusive  Location is very close to night life and beach but far away from noise 15 min walk.

title: Super
review: the hotel is very good, with a very nice staff and eager to help the guest. We live a very good experience the chieldren love this place the food was incredible every singel day we will definitely be back

title: 4th stay an it getts better
review: this hotel is fab , the staff are very freindly can have a chat with them whenever the entertainment are fab love a gab with moory an roberto , the public areas are all clean an well looked after , the food is great each night somthing different , snack bars great, rooms are fab an cleaned very well , ive stayed here 4 times an i will be backkkk

title: Rude staff
review: The hotel is beautiful and the pool is really nice. The rooms were clean and nice but all the staff apart for a few are just rude. The food wasn’t nice apart from at snack time when deano was cooking. Deano and one of the young bar tenders where the only nice, friendly people at the hotel. The cleaners also did a very good job. I would go to Magaluf again but not stay in this hotel. The hotel rep was also helpful.

title: Amazing hotel
review: the hotel was great the food was lovely, the staff were nice and friendly also the hotel was spotless. The rep was great he couldn’t do enough for you. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and I would definitely go back.

title: Rude staff
review: Staff are so rude at the hotel, was our first holiday without parents so obviously was anxious and the hotel staff wouldn’t help us in any way, asked for help on finding things as well as where to find transfer times for the way back to just have them shrug their shoulders not wanting to help, the cleaners did a good job of cleaning the rooms although the sheets were only changed once whilst we were there. The PR was really helpful and told us where to find the strip and shops for things we needed.

title: Not 4 Star’s
review: My friend and I recently stayed here for a girls holiday and after 12 days on the resort, I can say it wasn’t worth the money we paid.  Everyone knows Magaluf is a party island, you party all night and sleep all day. With this being the case, my friend and I always ensured that we put the do not disturb sign on the door before leaving for a night out so that the maid wouldn’t come barging into our room waking us up. However, the sign seemed to be ignored as we were awoken to the sign of a lady yelling “HOLA!” As though she wanted us to wake up. This happened several times, though luckily, not every day.  However, the overall cleanliness of the rooms are decent and they are decent rooms with comfyish beds for a party holiday stay.  The worst downfall of the hotel is the food. If…

title: Brilliant Holiday!! ☀️😁⛱👍🏻
review: Really lovely staff, so friendly and full smiles. Food was always hot and tasty, had a nice variety and the rooms were always clean and tidy!! The pool was perfect for the high temps of July!! 😁 would definately recommend this hotel and definately go back.  Also as a couple we found that the Palma Nova strip and bars were perfect for what we wanted in the evening times!! Only €5-6 in a taxi too.

title: Good location would stay here again.
review: Was in a great location, 5 minutes from Magaluf beach and pool was lovely. Hotel food was fresh and couldn’t complain really. Very loud near the pool but we didn’t mind that. Hotel room was very modern and clean and overall would recommend to anyone. Me and my friend who are both 22 spent 7 nights here.

title: good service and entertainmet team!
review: That holiday was absolutely amazing, very good service! Nice pool area, always clean. One negative thing is that the food is the same almost every day which for one week made me tired of the food.. Big cred to the anination team, they made the best shows and entertained me.

title: Very nice!
review: The hotel was very nice, very very clean. The maids thoroughly cleaned the room every day. The pool and surrounding area is lovely with ample space and sun-beds. It was very quiet in the evening, even during the World Cup. My only gripe with the hotel is that the food selection was poor, there wasn’t a big variety during the week and it wasn’t labed particularly well as to what exactly it was.

title: Summer Holiday
review: I came in a group of 7 and we had 3 rooms between us . The hotel itself was lovely, nothing to fault about the rooms or interior of the place , however I found that the staff treated people who were a lot older with more respect, because we are 18 they were quite rude , not to mention as we went to dinner one night , there were girls in next to nothing yet my friend who was wearing a sleeveless shirt the gentleman said he would have to change as his arms were out? weird when there were girls with their chest , arms and legs on show ? Personally for me the food was AWFUL. Not what I was expecting for a 4* hotel , it was very repetitive and I only ended up eating there for two days . It was walking distance from the strip literally a 5-10 minute walk so that was handy . I'd say it…

title: Summer 2018
review: Came to this hotel, as my mam was staying here for 9 days ..the staff were lovely to me even tho i didnt stay in this hotel , but they treat me as if i was ..even invited me to dinner with my mam ..the staff were so nice ..the food was lovely i had the pork and rice which was lovely , the cheese board was amazing for all u cheese lovers . loved lying round the pool today the music was right up my street .i ordered a strawberry mojito which was lovely while playing bingo didnt win but next time . id defo come back to this hotel

title: Great vacation time
review: Nice amenities, friendly staff, clean room, respectul waiters, nice and clean pool, nice shows at night (not all of them but still ok) Awesome miniclub for the kids, shooting, waterpolo and others, so overall nice , also they left the all inclusive bracelet after the checkout and we could eat and drink until our pickup arrived

title: Great hotel
review: I had a great time at Atlantic hotel. The service is great and the staff is amazing. Thank you to all the staff for making this vacation great. The only thing would to have more variety in the restaurant. I will come back next year for sure.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Me and my partner have just got home from a 2 week stay in this hotel. We were both very impressed with the cleanliness of both the room and the hotel in general. There were always loads of sun beds around the pool so you could go out for the morning and come back and still be able to find a free bed in the afternoon! Our only gripe would be that the food choices weren’t great, never really much to choose from (unless you love fish and are willing to eat it everyday for lunch and dinner). We stayed half board and were glad of that as ended up only eating dinner at the hotel twice. Overall very happy with our stay at Atlantic park!!

title: Very good hotel i would recommend to anyone.The staff were amazing really made us feel welcome.
review: Great staff and great hotel with activities during the day to keep you busy.Very close to the nearest attractions and beach and all the hustle.Stayed with a friend did not have any problems with anything.

title: Best hotels in Majorca
review: I had an amazing holiday trip in this hotel. I am highly recommend to my all friends and family. Best of the best. I have been there for a week and I am really enjoyed with my family especially my little girl was so happy to play with others children's. I am highly recommend that book for all inclusive. The pool is very clean and big ether for children's and adolt. Magda children's entertainment was fantastic . She's was very talented,my little girl was very happy to play with her.

title: GReat place
review: Defo coming again food and drink was good pool was clean rooms were clean lots of thongs round the pool staff were friendly and helpful. Lots of young people but of noise at night as expected but not hotels fault lots of thongs round the pool bacon could do with cooking longer coffee was nice did I mention there was lots of thongs round the pool

title: Bad food! Noisy room!
review: I visited at the beginning of June and everything seemed good. We were given the room on the top floor which was a good room, but we had a few noise issues. We noticed from day 1 that above us was where staff lived and it was very noisy. Especially early in the morning, when staff where coming down and cleaners were starting. We also put do not disturb signs on the doors which were ignored on a few occasions. The food is something else. I don't know of it's because I'm pregnant but I couldn't at all stomach the food. Most was a bad adaptation on English cuisine and very very bland. There was a  horrible stench aswell somewhat like cabbage, food was not labelled and if it was it wasn't a true definition of what it was.i had thought I'd put a white sauce onto my pasta which turnt…

title: Nice hotrl
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.   Best wishes, HSM Atlantic Park

title: A great hotel
review: Pleasant stay although had issues with towels on two separate occasions.  Taken out and only hand towel replaced then two days later. Didn't want towels replaced but they were taken and no new ones supplied , only realised as just stepping in to shower.  Call to reception asking for towels , luckily got some within 10 minutes.  All food available was of high standard.    Only concern was I paid for single supplement as travelling alone , was supplied with a single room so feel I was over charged for the room.  Isn't it a single person supplement for staying in a double room ??

title: Great
review: Stayed here for a week this summer and the overall experience was fantastic, really friendly and helpful staff to go with the good quality rooms, would recommend staying here to anyone whether that be as a family or group of friends

title: Perfect week away with mates
review: The hotel is nice and and clean and the reps are friendly (tony is the man) staff are all very friendly and good laid back atmosphere lots to do throughout the day many activities! Also the food is good quality both at the restaurant and snack bar.

title: Class place
review: Pool was very big,bar staff was very friendly and helpful, food was very nice overall very enjoyable holiday for me and my mates rooms was clean and there’s plenty of room when there was three in a room would definitely recommend

title: HSM Review
review: The hotel was very clean. It was full when we arrived and I was worried about getting a seat by the pool. It was never a problem, turn up any time and get a bed for the day, none of the awful having to put a towel down at the crack of dawn. You never had to wait at the bar. The food was good but a bit repetitive, always salads, fresh pizza, Paella plus various different dishes that changed daily. A great selection of fresh fruit every day. Again we never had any problems waiting there was always plenty of room. The guests are am absolute mix from much older people to couples and a few groups of young people. I think most people must go into town at night because the bar was always reasonably empty. The entertainment was on in the back ground but no one was particularly watching…

title: June 2018
review: We have stayed here numerous times, Hotel is very clean and very well kept,Staff were very friendly & pleasant, hot food is lovely but needs to be warmer, would definitely stay here again!! I have recommended this Hotel to family & friends!! 😊

title: Amazing
review: We stayed here for 13 days, what can I say, food is good, staff very helpful swimming pool is very nice, entertainment for kids is good, adult wise could be better but ... the rest pays for that. They had a Brazilian show that was absolutely AMAZINGGGGGGGG, yes this is Magaluf hotel was 90% 18-30 but very well behaved or the big Securety guy would be there ( wouldn’t recommend) hahahahah  One thing if u are coming to Atlantic Park came with All inclusive or gets really expensive. There is a lot of variety food related to all tastes.  Room ... we had a suite and it was spacious and towels were changed everything and the room tidy.  Would recommend  Give it a 5* Sorry forgot to take pics coming in hahahahha

title: June holiday in HSM
review: hotel in good location, far enough to be away but close enough to stroll down (5 to 8 mins walk to the Piano bar end). hotel clean, pool nice size, plenty of sun beds but maybe not enough for everyone in the hotel in peak times.  we had to pay hotel tax which isn't the hotel, its the government thing. the only thing we wasn't happy about was having to pay just under 20 euros for 4 nights when we stayed at the same star rating hotel in Palma nova for 4 euros for 4 nights. Food not great, hardly ate anything there (and im not fussy!) breakfast was always cold. dinner was ok, just the meats were extremely fatty. Wifi reached my room on the 4th floor so that was good. rooms were nice and cleaned, the only snag was on arrival the top sheet on the bed had dirty marks all over it so…

title: Good for the price, would return
review: Went on a girls holiday here and was very happy with the hotel. As a group of 7 girls who were in magaluf alone, drinking and partying, the hotel made us feel safe and we could approach them for anything. The rooms were spacious, clean and nothing was dsamaged. Being up on the 9th floor was a bit of a pain as the lifts were unreliable and very slow. However, it was nice to know we were up out of the way when getting ready late at night. The security on the door when we came in was great. The food was edible most days but some it was awful. Most of it was barely warm and worth having. The snack bar was great to make up for it. Seen as the restaurants in magaluf were so cheap I definitley would recommend evening meals outside of the hotel. The cleaners were excellent and always…

title: May stay
review: Friendly staff, spacious rooms, all inclusive option means you really do not need to spend money in the hotel. Pool good size and relaxed atmosphere. Entertainment team work to get guests involved if they want to in activities.  Would stay again.

title: friends holiday
review: very nice hotel with lovely pool and bar area. the pool has a ping pong table and a pool table which is very fun. everyone is very nice and friendly. very clean pool and friendly staff. great view from balancony.

title: boys holiday
review: Definitely would recommend, had a great stay here with my mates , hotel staff were very helpful and looked after us well! The pool area was amazing and very relaxing! the food had a great variety and tasted great!

title: Really good stay
review: Came here with a group of boys, had a lovely stay, staff were very friendly and helpful, the rooms were very nice and the pool was lovely. The place was family friendly but also good for us group of boys and the rep was very highly. Would definitely recommend.

title: Excellent
review: Great Hotel with great entertainment Mooriney was the entertainment guy who was very friendly and great with all this the customers  The pool was clean and there was plenty of sunbeds the food was lovely apart from the breakfast which was a bit basic  our friends from Northern Ireland complained about the coldness and within two days food was hot again I think that the cooker must be a bit slow if it took two days  seriously food was fine  Mooriney seriously was one of the best entertainment guys I’ve ever seen The bar staff led by Jose was always friendly and polite  Totally recommend

title: FANTASTIC HOTEL!!
review: I love the service in the hotel - the people are so friendly and helpful, especially Tony. The food and drinks are also very, very good! There is so much to choose from. I would 100% come back here again and would recommend it to everyone.

title: Amazing!
review: I would recommend this hotel without a doubt. The food was good, and had Great variety. As well as this, all the people were extremely friendly, especially Tony. Our room had no flaws and was in great condition. Overall, I would heavily recommend this hotel.

title: Brilliant holiday
review: Hotel was great the customer service was 10 out of 10 serve great food and the drinks are good. Tony and all the staff are so helpful. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a good time and the best staff in Magaluf

title: Great place
review: The staff are kind and helpful. Theres a good verity of food that is top quality and I highly recommend this hotel for people of all ages. I would come happily come back again as I’ve enjoyed my time here.

title: BRILLIANT TRIP!
review: Really really friendly place, the staff are so helpful. One employee Tony was very helpful and made us feel right at home. The bar is nice and  the drinks are cheap. Great place to stay, I would defintely come back.  P.S THE FOOD IS INSANE!

title: Great hotel
review: Really good hotel to stay in, good facilities and I am very happy with the standard of food. The hotel is great for families and those that want to get themselves legless down the magaluf strip, I would recommend staying here and would come back to stay here.

title: Great
review: Good hotel, receptionists were welcoming when first arriving and helped settle in. Food was good, hot and tasty and nice staff in the canteen. Pool was chilled and friendly for everyone in the hotel. Lots of activities to do around the pool aswell. All in all would definitely recommend

title: Not bad but not good
review: We stayed at Atlantic Park for a week and we did enjoy our stay, just not the food. We were all inclusive and breakfast was mediocre, but lunch and dinner was terrible, it was almost the same food for both and didn’t change much all week either. The only thing good was probably the salad bar as you can’t cook salad. We ate out most nights due to the bad food or waited between restaurant times to eat from the snack bar. The odd time some of the food was ok but nothing flash they need to change it up a bit more as the same food becomes boring, the service in the restaurant was good although 1 member of staff was very rude. A girl we met was only bed and breakfast and went to reception to pay for lunch in the restaurant and she got her food and her drink and she was rudely told…

title: Great!
review: Great service, brilliant staff really nice. Clean inside and outside would really recommend coming here! Room is very clean staff again really nice couldn’t be any better, let me stay for a review for the night really like them all

title: Review
review: Excellent place! Lovely staff and made us feel very welcome! Clean inside and out, room was kept very tidy all through the day and entertainment was good! (Writing characters writing characters writing)

title: Alantic park maguluf
review: Hi everybody i have come back home off my hols and I want to leave a review  Hotel was clean some off the staff was friendly we were told it was a German hotel it was geared up for the young ones which they had no respect.  Noisey coming back early hours of morning entertainment was alright  I was there for 8 days and out of the 8 there was only 2 days we had good entertainment  food was more for German's I can eat anything we were using snack bar some nights  Ann Cashmore

title: Amazing
review: Dear Ann,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short.   We are very sorry for not meeting your expectations.  Best regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: party place
review: Great hotel to chill out and do nothing. At the morning the pool área is really quiet we really enjoy this hotel. At the reception they recomend where to rent a car for a good price and the room were very clean everybody at this hotel is really friendly especially tomy from the entertement team really recomended

title: 3 years anniversary
review: This place is a party place with constant noise people slamming doors, loud music and groups on balconies. There is noise from every room with thin walls and no sense of behaviour. People with no shoes and t-shirt walking in and out and carrying drinks up their rooms. Couldn't wait for the week to end. The amount of swearing was shocking.

title: excellent hospitality
review: i stayed at this hotel for 6 nights with my girlfirend and i cannot praise the staff enough for their fantastic customer service and hospitality in particular francisco and luis. they were so accomodating and friendly to us and made the stay at the hotel very pleasant  and more than your average stay! the food was great and night time entertainment was suitable for all audiences and entertaining also. i would definitely reccommend this hotel for families, couples and large parties, very outstanding hotel!

title: Just great
review: I came to this hotel for a 3 day weekend with my bestfriends. We had a blast the entire time we were there. I coukent be more satisfied with the service they provided us. The staff is really friendly and the price is even better. I loved the food and the pool as well. My friends and I are already planning another trip to come back. Urayyy Atlantic park hotel :)

title: Amazing
review: So what to say about this hotel?! First of all the staff is amazing. My family and I decided to have some quality time away from Palma and we chose to come to Atlantic Park Hotel. When we came in they welcomed us with a big smile and fantastic customer service. Tony was awesome he guided us and explained how everything worked very well. The pool is beautiful and the hotel is extremely clean. I will definitely come back whenever I can. I had a great time and I will recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

title: Solo Traveler
review: Just returned from a week at this hotel. Stayed in a single room, which was great and plenty of room. Ideal as most hotels charge a huge premium as a solo traveler.  The hotel was very clean and the food was pretty good, although breakfast was a bit on the tepid side, but they do have microwaves that you can use to warm your breakfast up a bit.  Pool area and loungers very clean and plentiful.  The restaurant staff especially Isobella who saved my table after the first night when someone nicked my table were very helpful and polite. The bar staff were also great.  I can understand why some reviews say that the bar staff are rude, as I did witness some customers asking for drinks without saying please or thank you.  I think  I would be grumpy as well if people can't be bothered…

title: Hotel, holiday  experience
review: Magda is very helpful lovely intelligent young lady. She helped me play a game called Sjoelbak which I have never played before & it was fun & addictive! I wish her well in her professional career as she will do really well! I wish her well in her personal life.

title: Great hotel
review: Really great hotel at the reception very nice we we really like the food of this hotel everything was varied and good for the money we pay was perfect. At the pool was for relaxin nobody was making noise we really recommended

title: Great location - Great food - Great place
review: Stayed here for a week with my friends and it was just lovely. We had all inclusive and ate to our hearts content..great range of food as well as a snack bar outside restaurant times. Very close to the beach and walkable to the strip in Magaluf. Right on the bus route to go to Santa Ponsa. Reception staff lacked a bit of enthusiasm but were helpful..restaurant and bar staff were lovely. The hotel was immaculate. We never had to get up early and race to get a lounger by the pool, very comfortable amount of people around.

title: Loved everything and everyone
review: Outstanding hotel!! Everyone (from reception, room service, entertainment and restaurant) extremely helpful and friendly!! Mattress just perfect!! Huge variety of food, and always delicious!!! A big thank you to you all from Felipe and Lucia

title: Outstanding Hotel
review: first time in magaluf and we did a excellent choice, Atlantic park has a perfect location and the staff makes you feel welcome since the firs very moment.   The food was amazing and so varied. The evening entertainment was OK  could be better, and The cleanliness of the entire hotel and the friendly staff is the best. we really recomended.

title: Stay in May
review: A return to Atlantic Park and some subtle changes made to further enhance the service and standards in this hotel It does what it says on the tin, no airs or graces, a great hotel with fantastic staff

title: Long weekend
review: Very nice hotel ,friendly staff .In a good location. Five minutes from the beach. Good size pool, with a nice pool bar that sells draught cider and local lager.The food was OK but not the best.Overall good value for  money.

title: Atlantic Park
review: Been going to Atlantic Park for the last 8 years, always very clean, buffet style restaurant, not bad. Pool area has plenty of sunbeds, towels can be hired from reception for use around the pool. Staff always friendly

title: Back again, favourite hotel
review: We come here every year for our annual golfing holiday , the hotel is an ideal base for our trips. The staff and service is fantastic, they fulfil all our needs, with picnic lunches available for when we are away at lunchtime.Food ideal, rooms great, and the entire atmosphere ideal for us.Location away from the

title: Excellent hotel, friendly staff!
review: The hotel is located about 10 minutes from the strip in Magaluf so it’s possible to get a good nights sleep. Rooms were spacious, clean, full of light and beds were extremely comfortable. The breakfast buffet had a great selection : full English breakfast, fruit, yoghurt, cereals etc and was delicious! Evening meal buffet was also very good with a wide and varied selection. One of the restaurant staff was particularly friendly and helpful (I think her name was Noelia). The pool was a nice temperature and great on a hot summers day. Excellent trip!

title: wahooooo
review: from day one the hotel has been 5+ *...the staff can not do enough for you....the hotel strives to make sure guests are looked after....the facilities are perfect...perfect family experience...would highly highly HIGHLY recommend...food is of a very high standard with altering menus....I am going to miss the place....Will definitely be back 😀

title: Fantastic
review: I stay in a hotel 2 weeks with my family. The hotel is family friendly and the stuff is very helpful. The food is nice, the bar cool with great waiters, animacipn fantastic with many activities during the day and at evening. I recoment it!

title: Amazing
review: I love everything about this hotel. The food is different everyday which makes it perfect as you don't get many hotels with different menu everyday. My little kids love it here as there's so many family's with kids. The staff are so friendly and are always here to help always smile and the entertainment is great this animation everyday. I will recommend this hotel and if I get a chance I will come back.

title: Good
review: I loved the rooms.. the staf are lovedly everyday was diferent food something we like alot.. we love the pool area is really clean not like other hotel. The entertement team is very good with children we will come back

title: Best hotel in maga!
review: Came here to celebrate my nans 50th birthday, hotel staff were gorgeous especially the man on the desk with long hair he was very helpful! The balcony is lit, nice and comfy to lay on (see picture). The rooms are gorgeous just like my nans lounge! Defo stay here, the strawberry milkshakes are to die for ! #MagaMadness #Barbas50th

title: Great
review: My mom and my son and I went to Atlantic Park, and everything was just the way we ordered it! Three amazing hotel entertainers tony morini and clara made various activities for all the guest. There was a Mini Club for the kids, water gym for the people :D  the bartenders were very fastwith the drink something we like so we dont need to spend hr at the line.  the rooms was perfect clean en with alot of space the best thing is they clean it everyday.   We were really pleased with the staying,

title: Memorable Holiday
review: Hotel situated 5 mins walk from the beach front and Staff are absolutely brilliant, helpful and knowledgeable, we were able to arrange excursions at the reception desk and even order the Ensaimadas a typical sweet filled bread/cake which we brought back for all the family to taste. Maria & Sylvia in reception deserve a worthy mention for their care and attention we were allowed a late checkout at no extra cost, as we had a late flight back home. Restaurant staff also very good as were the housekeeping staff and the entertainment staff also. Hotel is a 4 star rooms are clean,air conditioned and include a hairdryer and a safe(pay for use, but worth it for peace of mind) buffet meals at the restaurant varied and good quality well presented, good selection of fruit and deserts. Bar…

title: GOOD
review: We stayed at atlantic park for 1 week and we had a great time.  Very quiet,nice view,absolutely perfect service and lovely staff.  Just 10 minutes by walking from the hotel there is a very nice beach   everything is close to the hotel en magaluf it self is amazing.

title: Lovely stay
review: Hotel was lovely and clean , rooms big and cleaned every day. Great location.  Entertainment team were lovely especially Roberto who really looked after my three young girls. Had a fantastic time and would definitely recommend

title: Holiday
review: Great stay at friendly hotel. Staff here are brilliant very friendly and helpful whether in the restaurant at reception or room service. Rooms comfortable had a good room overlooking the pool with balcony. Food good variety for all tastes. Will go again!

title: WAS EXCELLENT
review: We were here also last year and we enjoyed it so much that we decided to come again. Iggy and his family made us feel welcome, they offered a welcome drink and they did their best to help. Although Anaxos was very quiet, mama had everyday cooked very nice food and Iggy grills the best fish. We will definitelly come back soon.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Excellent hotel in a good location, the restaurant serves great food for breakfast and dinner times with the snack bar to keep you going in between, the hotel seemed very clean and all staff are helpful and friendly.

title: Perfect experience
review: We have spent a really nice week in that hotel. The food its incredible, much better Than last year. The service is really good as well. We met Tony, the public relations guy who helped us a Lot planing our routes around Mallorca.

title: Good
review: a hotel of charm. The truth is this very well for the price we have paid. the reception was very fast at the time of check in something that is very much appreciated. At breakfast time the buffet is the same as the other hotels but it was not bad. the waiters bar a bit grumpy but I think it was because of the heat :P. the entertement team was great with tony and muriny  give us a good time

title: Holiday
review: The hotel was clean and staf was very friendly. The only thing they were missing didn’t have the iron available any day. But wasn’t a big problem for us. Nice and quiet place for different age people. Close to Magaluf center. And always free parking for scooter. Thank you for a good service .

title: Excellent
review: The best thing about the hotel is the food every day is a surprise you can tell that the chef likes his work. the pool area is very quiet with lots of space. the bad days you always had something to do with the entertainment team. I hope to come back some day

title: Perfect
review: Hotel in a real good place very nice for family and friends. From first arrival until leaving we were made welcome and the staff were always friendly we will recommend and definitely come Back again sys

title: Miss you
review: the hotel is in a very good area of ​​mallorca Magaluf has a very bad reputation but the truth is that magaluf is very good  places even for families with childrem.  the rooms are very clean de Housekeeping do a good job everyday. the buffet was ok not the best but good for what you pay. the best is de pool area Top

title: Amazing time
review: Everything was amazing the staff were very profesional and the room very clean. Animacion team was very good at what they do especially mooriny and Magdalena thank you for everything  we will come back soon
