title: Lovely stay, friendly staff
review: Had a really lovely time, rooms & overall very clean & friendly staff. Only one slight issue to report was that breakfast was cold every morning from the buffet, cold beans not really for me. Other than that the food was lovely & a good range as well :-) Would definitely visit again

title: Avoid if your British and like a comfy bed!
review: My other and I are responsible 30 year olds. Wanted a 4 hotel star far enough away from the strip but within walking distance. We arrived back about 3am one night. To a repeated banging on our wall. Having gone to the door once. We couldn’t understand what the banging was about. We had made noise open/closing hotel, bedroom and balcony doors. Which is normal. Next thing we have a security guard at our door. Telling me there’s been a report of a female crying and screaming. As she came to the door, he quickly went realising it was rubbish. Yet we then receive a phone call from reception to keep the noise down. This then went on for over an hour. I was up and down to reception. Yet somehow we were to blame. The only two reports came from the same room(not British customers). I…

title: Great hotel and great entertainers!
review: Really enjoyed my stay here. I stayed with a couple of friends, it’s far out enough from the main strip of Magaluf that you can enjoy the surroundings and not get too bogged down in the madness. It’s about a ten minute walk away from the centre and we found the location perfect  The hotel itself was lovely, the pool is great, the food was good quality and the entertainers were good too. Magdalena was brilliant, very friendly and talkative, she helped a lot while we were there.  The quality of the alcohol on the all inclusive was good too. The room came with fantastic views - which to be honest I didn’t expect, we were on the 5th floor and it was great. Overall when compared with how much we paid, I thought it was really good and I’d stay there again!

title: Great hotel
review: Hotel la great in all respects,kindness  cleanliness at the reception since  we arrive the room clean and very confortable it is a family hotel only tree minutes from the beach the animation guys always ready to have fun

title: Encantada
review: Last Juny we were for a week, and we love it! the dining room staff, Jesus, Roman, Andres and the others,very helpful and attentive. Room very clean and the nites very funny, the beach is near the hotel, I recommend it!!

title: Great  hotel
review: The hotel is 100 % recommended. We have spent a great week. All the staff is very friendly and the animation the room very good and clean .only  five  minutes from the beach and far from the feasts of magaluf we will come back for sure

title: Loving Atlantic Park
review: Stayed in Atlantic Park with my boyfriend to have a break from the London rain and had the most amazing time! Even though whether in Malorca was not as warm as we expected, the stay at Atlantic Park was just wonderful, from the moment we entered the hotel we felt welcomed by the staff at reception, we were a bit scared cause neither of us speaks the language but everybody there speaks english! Hotel was   super clean, food was great and bar by the pool was just the relax we needed. There was a bit of an issue with one of the elevators but everybody was so apologetic and helpful that we barely noticed.You could actually feel how the staff was going the extra mile to make the guests' stay the best that it could be, and it was much appreciated. Hoping to book some holidays in july,…

title: Short break
review: Stayed in this hotel when it was the Don Monola, my how it has changed great hotel large bedrooms cleaned everyday clean towels everyday  if needed. Friendly and helpful staff. Downside was the food it was never hot warm and cooked yes and it seemed more to cater for the continental pallet rather than the British. May be as the hotel was full of aged Spanish people with a small sprinkling of bits. Would I stay here again probably.

title: Wonderful stay at Atlantic Park
review: I visited Atlantic Park in Majorca at the beginning of April with my husband and three kids. Coming from London, we were in such a need for some relax and sun, and Atlantic Park was just the thing. The food was delicious, the hotel was spotless and the service was just excellent. The fact of one lift being out of use did not shadow our experience at all as all of the staff worked hard to make us feel comfortable and make sure we had everything we needed. Sylvia at the reception was wonderful, making us laugh and going the extra mile to make sure that me and my family felt at home. We will surely be coming back to Atlantic park next year and will recommend it to all of our friends. It is not easy to find a hotel that will provide with everything you want, but Atlantic Park does…

title: Amazing service
review: Dear Pilar,  Thank you so much for your great review. We are glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay at our hotel.    We hope to see you again very soon.  Best wishes from all the HSM Atlantic Park team

title: Okay
review: We originally paid and booked into hotel Martinique but on arrival hotel still had builders on site and it was closed . We then went to the next hotel hsm Atlantic park and explained the situation to a member of staff there called Toni who was extremely helpful . He then rang hotels . Com and an hour and half later he resolved the situation and offered us 2 rooms and made us feel very welcome . At no cost . It was a far superior hotel and a very clean and spotless hotel . I will definitely be booking to stay here in future 5 star service .

title: Prima
review: Came here with friends a few weeks back. It was an okay stay.   Staff very polite, helpful and pleasant.   Good facilities, such as - restaurant, pool, entertainment.   Room had a nice view of the pool.   Unfortunately, it wasn’t very clean in our room, as kept finding hairs everywhere (in the bath, on the shower, in the bed plus elsewhere)   A little far from the main strip.

title: Lovely hotel with excellent staff
review: Spent 6 nights at this hotel the beginning of April.  Filled with a lot of Spanish senior citizens, so no entertainment for the British and the pool was freezing. Room was very clean and spacious and lovely to have a balcony. Great that it is off the strip as it also gives you the option of a quiet night in. I'm sure in the summer this hotel would be fabulous for parents with children under 12.

title: Springtime break
review: We spent a week here recently and  enjoyed every moment. Our room on the 8th floor was quiet, clean and very comfortable.  The food was excellent, something to suit every taste. Staff friendly and helpful. We were the only 4 English people that week but were welcomed and made to feel wanted. Luckily we spoke a little Spanish but Reception Staff spoke English. We hired a car for the week and most days were able to park opposite the hotel entrance. There is also a large car park opposite the hotel.

title: Nice hotel, shame about poor food quality and lack of communication
review: We are currently here, the hotel is lovely, clean, nice pool, good sized room, can’t fault it for the price!   We’ve had a few issues with the food! Always cold or borderline warm! Thank goodness we only paid for breakfast! We were told breakfast was 8.30-10.30, and it was also stated on the card we received on arrival, today we got there at 10.05 to be told it closed at 10am... another group came in behind us and said the same thing. The man (Jesus) was lovely and opened it all back up and apologised, but for a minute we thought we wouldn’t be able to have breakfast! For the remainder of the holiday we have to be there before 10am....   Onto lunch! On the second day we were enjoying relaxing by the pool so decided to have lunch in the hotel... being €15, we expected a decent…

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Paigem1411,  First of all, we would like to thank you for sharing your opinion with us.  We appreciate your kind words about our hotel and its facilities as well as for our barmen.   We are very sorry for not meeting your expectations regarding the food, it is useful to us to know the opinion of our customers so we thank you all the details in your review. Please excuse us for the inconveniences caused by the lifts and our staff at the reception desk.  An important issue to highlight is that you and your friend had to be noticed, due to the noise and loud music in your room, we had some complaints from other customers. We don't allow that kind of behaviour at our hotel.  Once again we would like to thank you for your feedback as it gives us the opportunity to make improvements and thus offer all our guests a better service.  Best regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: Very enjoyable stay
review: I was there with my family and we enjoyed our holidays. Thanks to Silvia, the female entertainer. She is doing a wonderful job. She works hard with all the guests of the hotel. A lot of Spanish guests in the hotel. The manager was also very nice and helpful. We will come again.

title: Will be coming back next year
review: Stayed in this hotel in the summer with 4 of my friends and so glad we chose this hotel. Really friendly staff with a great atmosphere. Nice sized pool and lovely food. The hotel is roughly a 6/7 minutes walk from the strip.

title: Nice Hotel just not quite the 4 star experience we expected
review: We booked a junior suite which was absolutely gorgeous could not be faulted , the hotel and grounds were clean and tidy , entertainment in the day was good but evening was terrible , two drinks per person was a bit restrictive being in a party of 5 it mean't multiple trips to the bar if it was your round , food was nice but it never had the wow factor no show cooking or themed nights and in this modern age the food labeling was poor , the staff on the restaurant  door need training on how to welcome people in , snack bar open until 1030 pm with food cooked to order was really good , all in all a nice hotel but we wont be returning

title: Worst hotel ever
review: Read all the reviews from other guests and thought give this hotel a try saved all year and looked forward to it ! Now can't wait to leave !!!! Food only comprised of pork freezing cold and due closing Sunday running out of everything . Drinks only available in plastic glasses not as shown in photos around the pool ! Cocktails from a machine with mijito tasting like mouth wash and snacks around pool were a burger in between 2 pieces of bread there photos look amazing but nothing like what they give you . With 3 days till they close amazingly there air con has broken down nothing to do with 2 rooms on 6th floor occupied and 4 on 5th . Air con around reception works fine but when ask was told it's only 14 degrees at night so why the problem been waiting 2 days for the part ! Let's…

title: Family holiday
review: Dear guest,  We are regretful to know that your perception of our resort did not comply with the image of a four-star hotel.  We would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations and for the lack of food during our last opened days.  Once again we would like to thank you for your feedback as it gives us the opportunity to make improvements and thus offer all our guests a better service.  Best regards, HSM Atlantic Park

title: Superb stay.
review: We had our family holiday here for a week in August. I was apprehensive after reading the reviews but had no need to worry. We had a decent sized room for 4 of us, it was cleaned & beds changed every day. No rush for sunbeds which was perfect. The food was good and there was always something to suit. The staff work very hard and we never had issues with the service we received from anyone. You can pay 10euro for a towel for the pool and change it every day then you get the money back at end of holiday. The main reason I didn't give 5 stars is the entertainment in the evenings was a little uneventful. Otherwise a great holiday in a quieter end of Magaluf.

title: Pleasantly Suprised
review: We stayed hear for 10 days from September 6th - 16th on a B&B basis. Originally we wanted to stay in Palma Nova or Son Caliu but as we booked this very  late around 1 week before travel and there was very little choice left and we reluctantly booked this hotel in Magaluf. I was really worried about staying here after reading the reviews as we were travelling with a 13 month old baby and wanted something as quiet as possible( Magaluf would not be a sensible choice for this i know!!) however i emailed the hotel ahead of travel to air my concern and asked for a room in the most quiet part of the hotel which is where they placed us.   The hotel is large and in a quiet location,  its one of the last ones you come to in magaluf and its located a 2 minute walk from the pirates show (…

title: Nice base on the edge of Magaluf
review: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your opinion with us.  We are so delighted to read that you had a fantastic stay with us and you appreciate our facilities.   We will be very pleased to welcome you back again in our HSM Atlantic Park.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Summer holiday in Magaluf
review: Decent hotel, good food, reasonably priced.  Staff are friendly.    Ok clientele at the hotel (much improved since a previous visit a few years ago- slightly higher prices have helped I think!)  Pool is ok but a bit on the small side for the hotel size.  Nice location- easy access to the nightlife but not in the midst of it.

title: Great vacation
review: Dear guest,  We would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park and we will be very pleased to welcome you back again at our hotel.   Best wishes from the sunny Mallorca!  HSM Customer Service

title: Rough, Risky and Rude.
review: We spent 8 days in this hotel. (2 adults and 1 teenager). The location of the hotel is at the end of the resort and the place around is not what you expect from a vacation. Instead the hotel is clean, the food breakfast and dinner is OK, a lot of dishes. The beach is at 5 minutes walking. And just near hotel is a bus station to palma (40 minutes by bus).  The resort is not typical mayorcan, especialy in this point of the resort. On the beach the price for two chairs and umbrella is 13,50 euro/all day. From the bus Palma Nova resort seemed more clean and quiet.

title: DISAPPOINTMENT
review: My husband and I were staying 7 nights in this hotel, which unfortunately did not meet our expectations of a 4 star hotel. The most disappointed was the room, which although quite spacious, had an outdated air, old furniture and a bad smell. The armchairs and the bedboard were dirty patches, the air conditioning system smelled bad. On arrival we found hair on bed linen, dust on furniture and sand in the room, and the toilet bowl very dirty on the outside (see photo) The cleanliness was superficial: in the 8 days the floor was never washed, It's true that they changed the towels every day, but that's all… The carpet on the hall was full of sand, the sofas in the reception were broken, things inacceptable in a 4-star hotel. The food was quite ok and varied, especially breakfast.…

title: A very nice clean hotel, All inclusive
review: Dear guest,  We are really sorry to read about your concerns and we would like to express our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you have experienced by giving us a low global evaluation.   As you can imagine, we are very dismayed to hear that we did not reach your expectations during your stay with us. We can imagine how frustrating this must be for you and apologize for the inconvenience experienced. This is not the HSM service we strive to provide.   We sincerely hope that you will decide to give us another chance to gain your confidence in our service and live the HSM experience you could not perceive at this occasion.  We would love to welcome you back at any of our 16 hotels of the "Hoteles Saint Michel" hotels in Mallorca.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Would not recommend
review: Stayed here for a week and it was lovely. Rooms and hotel were very clean and tidy. Pool was very clean and looked after very well, even though less considerate people left rubbish next to the sun beds the staff clear up regularly. Food was very good but very limited if you are a vegetarian. I am not so didn't care but bear this in mind. Only a 10min walk from the beach and the main strip if that takes your fancy, Manos bar down the road very good if you want to watch live sports (only Spanish TV at hotel) . Only thing that let it down was the evening entertainment, the animation team during the day were amazing, and the kids club was great all very friendly, evening entertainment was a little naff but plenty of entertainment in Magaluf if you want something more special.   All…

title: Amazing holiday!
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your opinion with us.  We appreciate your words about the rooms, the pool and the food. However we apologize for not meeting your expectations about the evening entertainment.  We will be very pleased to welcome you back again in our HSM Atlantic Park.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Excellent!
review: My husband and I booked our stay here for our anniversary and selected the all inclusive package, so that we wouldn't have to worry about traveling with cash, and could leave wallets in the room safe/not have to keep euro on us. The convenience also allows you to not have to go find restaurants for breakfast lunch dinner. We have been pretty disappointed over all with our stay here so far. The hotel is "all inclusive" however, if you need a towel for the pool you have to put down cash deposits. If you want to use the safe inside your room, you have to pay a separate fee per day. If you want chips from the bar by the pool, you have to pay for them. Ladies - they do not provide conditioner but if you want some, you can buy it. The hotel also lists in the description,  …

title: Couple holiday
review: Me and my husband have just had a lovely two week holiday at this hotel.  The rooms are perfect and you always find your room is cleaned daily and towels etc replaced with no issues... we stayed on the third floor and didn't have much issue with noise, we found that people would be listening to music having a few drinks on their balcony and would then head out to bars etc, we were never awoken by them when they returned home though.. so no issues for us- just people enjoying themselves on holiday. The entertainment team are fantastic- they work so hard to keep everyone involved and I found myself shooting almost everyday beating my husband more than once!! :) The food was great- always a variety for you to choose from, husband however preferred the snack bar by the pool but he…

title: Family Holiday
review: Dear Rose,  We would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park and we will be very pleased to welcome you back again at our hotel.   Best wishes from sunny Mallorca,   HSM Customer Service

title: Mr
review: Atlantic Park is a very nice hotel, well situated (5 mins walk to beach) and extremely clean and tidy and very well presented. Food is great, with plenty of choice on offer in the restaurant as well as the snack bar which the kids loved. The restaurant itself is spotlessly clean and the waiting staff work very hard and are all very polite and helpful.  The pool area and Sun terrace is again very clean and is an absolute credit to the guy who works tirelessly to keep it all so immaculate, lots of sunbeds too with no need to get up at silly hours to reserve one.   A special mention must go to the animation team of Tony, Morini, Clara and Roos who work hard to keep everyone entertained day and night, they do a great job and are all lovely people especially Roos (Rose) who is…

title: Brilliant Hotel
review: Took my wife and two sons aged 6 & 3 in August 2017 and found the hotel to be excellent throughout. The hotel was very clean and family oriented and the standard and selection of food was superb. We stayed on the 6th floor and found the hotel to be quiet, you can not hear Magaluf nightlife for example. I found the staff happy to help with anything they could and reception to have lots of info and offers for trips to water parks, marine land etc. Only two negatives really were two of the pool bar staff who didn't manage a smile in two weeks and the lock on the bathroom door which locked with nobody in the bathroom? This was fixed by a paper clip provided by reception and some handle wiggling but not great when your with young kids.

title: 100% recommended
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your review and for sharing your opinion with us.   We are happy to read that you had a nice stay with us,  however we apologize for any inconvenience caused by the pool bar staff and the bathroom door. We will take note about your comment and take actions.   We will be very pleased to welcome you back again in our hotel HSM Atlantic Park.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Words fail
review: My daughter and her boyfriend stayed at this hotel for a week in July. They were on their first holiday together as they were only 17. My daughter has coeliac disease and has researched the fact that this hotel would be able to cater for her gluten deee requirements. She had emailed the hotel twice and was told yes they would cater for her and what to do when she got there, she was happy. She and her boyfriend had paid £600 each all inclusive so that she could eat and drink safely and enjoy. The morning after they arrived they went to see the reception to let them know that she was the one who's emailed and to find out what to do next. NO ONE knew what to do next, she was past from one person to another, nobody had a sufficient amount of understanding or communication, being…

title: Lads Holiday
review: Dear Madam,   First of all we would like to thank you for sharing your opinion and we are very sorry for any inconveniences caused during your daughter's stay.  On their first day at our hotel, your daughter and her boyfriend came to the restaurant without asking about the gluten free and lactose free food. Even there is a sign saying that for any question you can speak to the staff.  On the second day of their stay, the restaurant manager and the hotel manager talked to them and offered a variety of gluten free and lactose free products. He even emailed you the daily variety gluten and lactose free for all our clients.   We are very sorry that we couldn't help your daughter and her boyfriend during their stay and we ask you to apolize us for that.   Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Mr buchanan
review: We stayed at this Hotel for a week in July, the service and attitude of the staff was exceptional. We booked on an all inclusive basis and the choice of food and standard was exceptional, the only criticism of the food was due to early check out we weren't allowed to take away breakfast on day of departure. There is a very wide range of drink available which is a good benefit if looking to pre drink before going onto the strip.During the day the pool and room facilities are very well maintained and to a good standard with all staff providing plenty of entertainment such as water polo and music acts day/night.  I did feel though as this hotel was of a far distance from the strip (20 min walk min) as well as the high level of security at night that the target market for this hotel…

title: Good hotel
review: Dear guest,   We would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park and we will be very pleased to welcome you back again at our hotel.   Best wishes from Mallorca!  HSM Customer Service

title: Visited for Ten Years
review: Lifts not working  causing questions booked family room and a twin room on arrival rooms not available  food overall  not to a four star standard  entertainment not up to four star standard rooms are not available until 2pm

title: Atlantic Park
review: Returned from a weeks stay here  09 June 17 for 7 days 2 adult couples, stayed here last year as well. Hotel very well maintained with rooms cleaned and towels changed everyday. The pool is immaculate and the bar staff are very pro active in keeping the area tidy throughout the day. We had no problem with the attitude of the staff either, unlike some of the reviews that have been written about them and yes at times it can get very busy and they have to be efficient and deal with people quickly especially on a evening, The food was just as good as last year, lovely and hot with amazing salads! even a bowl with sweets in for children?. My wife loved the breakfast. The staff in the restaurant work extremely hard and all very nice. Location perfect as 5 minutes from the beach,…

title: Not what I was expecting
review: Dear guest,   First of all, we would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park for your stay in Mallorca, as well as for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor.  We will be very pleased to welcome you back again.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Holiday
review: I have just returned from a weeks stay here and it certainly isn't all bad!! Hotel very well maintained with rooms and towels changed everyday. The pool is immaculate and the bar staff are very pro active in keeping the area tidy throughout the day. We have had no problem with the attitude of the staff either, yes at times it can get very busy and they have to be efficient and deal with people quickly of an evening, we found during the day they were more than happy to entertain a conversation.  I found the food to be wonderful but then I have a pallet that likes most things, that wouldn't be said for my son and dad who joined us, they didn't feel there was enough choice. Always lovely and hot with amazing salads! I found breakfast not to be of the usual standard I've had at…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear guest,   First of all, we would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park for your stay in Mallorca, as well as for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor.  We are very sorry to read that you would't book again and return to our hotel, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused during your stay.   We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Lovely all inclusive
review: Had great time in the hotel on the free bar great place to stay in magaluf not to near the strip so isn't noisy good for kids to stop in nice people especially Maria on reception clean helpful tidy rooms

title: gone more for the youngsters
review: Second time at this hotel, single room great last year, room average this year, small for more than 2 persons, 3rd bed is put up bed with thin top up mattress, mind your legs when you sit on bed with the  metal bars. stayed for 7 nights, noise 3 times in early hours , had to phone reception , had had enough, gone more for youngsters with big groups. food ok would give 7/10, but not a lot of choice for children, pasta or pizza, breakfast was good. Pool seemed to be clean, plenty of beds throughout the day , no need to get up early for towels, youngsters are asleep, again in the afternoon youngsters are at the pool , end of peace and quiet, with music and very bad language, not good for little ears.Entertainment was poor but they tried hard with what they had, great fun in the day…

title: Good Hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your opinion with us.   We apologize about the noise induced by other guests, we try to keep the silence during the night but sometimes it is very difficult. We try to control the inappropriate behavior, but everyone has to be polite with the rest of customers.  We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Brilliant
review: The hotel is situated on the far end of town near the water park and Pirates. About  5-10 minutes from the beach and the bars. The hotel is kept very clean, towels, beds made every day. Rooms were big with enough balcony that overlooked the pool. The fridge is very small , no more than two bottles would fit in it, at a pinch. The food is very hit and miss, if you like hot food get there as it opens or you will get the luke warm , cold food. Choice is ok, pasta, beef, lamb etc all good. Limited choice for cheeses. The entertainment is OK, the animation team try hard but as they are unable to entertain outside due to a local law they put the shows inside where there is no air conditioning and so hot and sweaty. The pool is good, nice and warm for a change although it was over 30…

title: Cheeky few days away in the heat
review: Dear guest,  We would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park and for the precious time you dedicated in sharing your feedback about your stay with us.  We will be very pleased to welcome you back again at our hotel.   Best wishes from sunny Mallorca!  HSM Customer Service

title: Lovely hotel
review: Stayed here for a week near the middle of June. The location is brilliant, can be loud on a night but your in Magaluf so what do you expect. The food was fine, the drinks were fine also. The room was regularly cleaned, gorgeous views from most of the rooms. Staff we're friendly specially to the ladies... would recommend this hotel highly! (They charge you tax for staying on the island, wasn't much though) pool was lovely! The staff really tried to get everyone involved in activities, such as volleyball in the pool etc... there's a hotel round the corner which is really loud think it might be a hostel full of screaming teenagers most of my stay...

title: Worst bar staff ever!
review: Me and friends have just got back from a girls holiday and we stayed at the hsm Atlantic park.  The hotel itself is very clean and tidy and great value for money, however the bar staff are the rudest people I have ever met. People would be waiting at the bar and they would just stand their having a conversation between their selfs, we was constantly given the wrong drinks.  Twice I asked for an ice cream and it  was just thrown at me. They made us feel very uncomfortable and we was made to feel we was doing something wrong by ordering a drink. Everyone we spoke to at the hotel felt the same way.   The food is quite bland but well presented, the snack bar is really good and the chicken nugget man was so lovely! I think his name was tony.   Other than the bar staff all the people…

title: Great place for your holiday
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your opinion.   We are happy to read that you liked our hotel and the food. However excuse us for the inconveniences caused by our bar staff, we will take actions.   We wil be pleased to welcome you back again at our HSM Atlantic Park.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: First ever sunny holiday
review: We were at Atlantic Park for a week in June. Great location. Comfortable beds. Great choice of food. Only the cucumbers and tomatoes weren't good quality. The only thing I didn't like at the hotel was that there was no music around the pool and the shows, which the animating team were doing, were indoors with no air conditioning,  so we had to miss them all.

title: OK for a cheap break in the sun
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your opinion with us.  We are happy to read that you liked the location, food and beds. We take note about your suggestions about the music around the pool.   We will be pleased to welcome you back again at our HSM Atlantic Park.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Holiday
review: The receptionist was very helpful and well clued in.  The hotel itself was very clean and tidy.  Room service came daily at a time which was very convenient to us with clean fresh towels every day.  We hadn't a great view so try not to book First Floor Rooms 101 to 105 approx.  I loved the location of the hotel as it was away from the hustle and bustle of the strip.  The entertainment was good some nights and not so good on other nights, but didn't mind, as we just used this time to relax and wind down for the night.  The bar was always fairly empty as the bar staff were not friendly at all, especially the bald headed barman.  I feel this let the hotel down and if he was replaced with a friendly person or a developed a new personality the bar would be a million times better. …

title: Better hotels in Majorca to book
review: The Atlantic park hotel is well established hotel chain. The hotel it self as in reception and the rooms and the bar are good, but the hotel lets itself down with the breakfast, dinner & evening meals, very bland and repetitive. Ok if you like eating cold salads every time you eat but the rest is very bland.  Look for other all inclusive hotels with better trip advisor reviews for there food.

title: A once good family hotel now ruined
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your opinion with us on Tripadvisor.  Please accept our apology for not meeting your expectations regarding the food.  We will be pleased if you can give us another opportunity to our hotel or to one of our 16 hotels from the Hoteles Saint Michel chain in Mallorca.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Good place to stay
review: We have been to this hotel a number of times and have always enjoyed it up until this visit. The hotel itself is in a good location about 5 min walk to the beach, bars restaurants etc Is fairly modern and with the exception of the pool area clean. The maids are friendly and efficient as are one or two of the receptionist,especially Tony. It used to be a great family hotel BUT NO Longer.it has degenerated into a club 18-30 style hotel with large numbers of single sex groups booking in. The noise language and behaviour around the pool at times is disgusting and for the last 4 nights we have been awake from 4 am with the noise and shouting, running up and down corridors banging doors.even climbing over balconies. This morning it started with someone banging on our door at 4 am by 6…

title: Budget hotel which can be neglected
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for sharing your opinion with us.    We apologize about the noise induced by other guests, we try to keep the silence during the night but sometimes it is very difficult. We try to control the inappropriate behavior, but everyone has to be polite with the rest of customers.  We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Families or Stags?
review: Nice but a bit oldish hotel, separated beds in all rooms which might be a bit awkward if you like to stay close with your partner, staff very nice and friendly especially Roman :) good food and snacks served almost all day, bar open till midnight, nice animation every evening.

title: Amazing hotel, great staff, perfect spot for faimily holidays.
review: We stayed here for 7 days. Very spacious and clean room with view for swimming pool. (hotel looks much better from inside) Good hotel service- room cleaned every day. Amazing food variety - good balance between intercontinental choices and local specialities and helpful staff, preparing us picnic to take with us on daily trips (good to have snack bar if you travel with little ones, as you can tp them up if necessary during the day). Nice and warm swimming pool (with water quality check few times per day) with good size paddling pool for little ones. Enough space to fit a lot's of guest. Absolutely 5 star bar service- great thanks for Roman an Francisco- who look after us and our little ones during the stay, they extend our expectations - been very attentive and polite each and…

title: Bored
review: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for your wonderful description of your holidays. We are very happy to know that you had a great stay with us, it is our main satisfaction.  We are delighted that you liked the location, the food and the room. We will congratulate all the staff, they will be very happy.  We will be very pleased to welcome you back again in HSM Atlantic Park.  Best wishes from sunny Mallorca!  HSM Customer Service

title: Golf trip
review: Just returned from a week at hsm Atlantic park, hotel nice and clean, rooms cleaned daily clean towels every day, food ok good variety, with snack bar open when restaurant shuts, pool area clean, but very very boring, no music round pool, only abit of sports going on through day every 2 hour, can get a sun lounger anytime of day, location is brilliant a good 15 mins walk to main strip, with bars on the way, beach front is lovely, and it was red hot, wouldn't return to this hotel, not enough going on, entertainment was crap as well, and drinks horrid,

title: Bit of a honeymoon
review: Dear Debbie,  We are sorry we might have dissapointed you, and you wouldn't come back to our hotel. We apologize because we did not reach your expectations and we would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Great stay, friendly staff, great entertainment
review: Return again,for our annual golf trip, to our favorite hotel,all inclusive, ideally located for majority of golf courses on island. packed lunch available if away playing at lunch time .Staff brilliant, rooms great .quiet part of town away from the maddening crowds.Pool area clean and spacious.

title: Fab hotel
review: A lovely hotel very clean with very spacious rooms and lovely staff pool area was nice and snack bar food was simple but nice only thing that disappointed me with this hotel is that food in the main restaurant wasn't very nice and I was or was a little bit closer to the stip but it wasn't so far that it would stop me from coming back! But it's also nice that if you want to chill or have a lively night out on the stip you have the choice to do both😊

title: Good Service and Stay
review: Our room was always clean and the restaurants offering was always good for us strict vegetarians. The wifi connection was always worth while in the lobby. The reception staff greeted us on entry and when we left early in the morning for our flight back. We were All inclusive so we always were allowed the drinks which were great bug because most of them had alcohol we could not have them. Overall we had a extended room which was great considering you have place to sit on the sofas and two televisions to watch. But if you are going in the summer despite the air conditioning mosquitoes will be in the room and bite you. We did not have a good weir but we were not bothered about that so I would recommend the pool view one but not if you have young children. Overall a great experience.

title: MAGALUF SEP 2016
review: We only stayed here for 3 nights and couldn't fault it really...the all inclusive for drinks was great I cant really comment on the food as I didn't eat here apart from some chips at the snack bar which were fine...the rooms were a good size and clean...maids came in every day and made beds and gave us clean towels...the hotel is very high and we were on the top floor which wasn't ideal but was still ok but wouldn't be happy with this if my kids were there with us ...the hotel was pretty quiet which was nice if you just want to relax by the pool and in a fantastic location for the bars and not much of a walk to the strip not even a 10min walk ...

title: Great location good hotel
review: Dear kato03,  We feel very proud to have offered you an unforgettable stay in our hotel. Our main goal is your happiness and satisfaction during your holidays.   We will be waiting your next visit, in HSM Atlantic Park you and your family have your home!  All the best from Mallorca,  HSM Customer Service

title: Birthday Break
review: The location is great as you are far enough away from the noise. Rooms were adequate cleaned and special thanks to very good maids, towels changed almost every day. I was on 8th floor and worried about only two lifts but only waited a couple of minutes at dinner time. Food was good as self service drinks good idea. Waiters and waitresses were great and always helpful. Special mention to snack bar chef great guy always happy to serve. Good drinks on offer but what about the bar staff, try and be courteous to the people you are serving, looked like they did not want to serve you as you could be standing waiting for drink but they would still chat away to each other leaving you waiting. Try and smile or go and work in the ghost train as you have pretty poor attitudes. Front desk…

title: 3 nights homiday
review: Stayed here for 3 nights was on the first floor and had a view of the pool. Room was standard couldn't really complain for the price I paid.  Found staff on the bar and reception a bit ignorant at times but can't praise the entertainment staff enough! They were great and enjoyed the entertainment every night.  There was a great choice and selection of food and drinks on the all inclusive.   Hotel is located about 10 mins walk from the strip.   I would probably stay here again.

title: Great relaxing break
review: Dear Allannah M,  First of all, I would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park for your stay in Mallorca, as well as for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for highlighting the professionalism and kindness of our entertainment staff, be ensured that I will share with her and the entire team your nice words.   It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your experience and you appreciated our facilities and our varied gastronomic offer.  We lament your comments on our staff, since the entire team put a lot of effort to maintain the highest standards of service, to let our guests feel most valued and genuinely cared for.  Once again we would like to thank you for your feedback as it gives us the opportunity to make improvements and thus offer all our guests a better service.  All the best from the sunny Magalluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: Clean & quiet area of Magaluf
review: Just had a week at the Atlantic park hotel Magaluf really cant fault the hotel food was really good plenty of choice. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the animations team did some really good shows in the evening. The hotel is located just far enough from the center of Magaluf to be quiet but a 5 min walk to the livelier part of town. There is a great pool and the hotel was full and had plenty sun beds. Would sefinately recommend this hotel.

title: Nice hotel but not 4 star
review: Dear Graemewb,  We are impressed about your fantastic review, we feel very proud to know that you have enjoyed your holidays in our hotel. Your satisfaction is our happiness.    We are very happy to know that you felt absolutely satisfied with the gastronomy that our kitchen staff prepared during your time with us and we are sure that compliments like yours make their daily efforts worthwhile.  We are delighted that you liked the location, our animation team and the entire hotel. We will congratulate all the staff, they will be very happy.  We will be very pleased to welcome you back again in HSM Atlantic Park Best wishes from the sunny Mallorca!  HSM Customer Service

title: Nice, clean, good pool!
review: Hotel was very clean and the food was very nice. Plenty of it too.  My friend and I were on an all inclusive basis and therefore food and drinks was great for us.   Breakfast wasn't my favourite meal of the day here although plenty of choice. Fruits, cake, toast, fresh bread/baguettes etc. Lunch and dinner was very nice and lots of choice.  Only downside on drinks though are the cocktails... They're from a machine and tasted like juice/pop. Plenty of other spirits though so not the end of the world :-)  Entertainment needs some work & consideration. To be fair to the 'team', they work hard all day trying to get people involved in the activities then on the eve do a show, bingo or karaoke.  They are really Friendly however do think spending some money on a proper…

title: Lovely, clean and great food!
review: Stayed here on our family holiday 8 adults and 4 children and what a great hotel. We were all inclusive as it's easier when you have children and I can honestly say I didn't have a bad meal. Every night there was a great selection and something different each night.  Cocktails from the machine are not the best but plenty of wine beer sangria and spirits available. If you want Smirnoff vodka or other brands you have to pay extra.   The rooms were clean staff polite and helpful. There were obviously some young groups and a few people were complaining about noise but we didn't experience anything ourselves.   Overall if you have a group of mixed ages and kids this is the perfect spot!

title: Yes Back Again ,so soon, must be GOOD
review: Dear 123nlk,  Thank you very much for your time sharing this wonderful opinion with the rest of the travelers. We are very happy to read that you had fantastic holidays with us.   Let me express our gratitude for your nice comments related to our service and facilities. Moreover, thank you for highlighting the professionalism and kindness of our staff, be ensured that I will share with her and the entire team your nice words.   It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your experience and you appreciated our facilities and our varied gastronomic offer.  We hope your journey back  was a safe and pleasant one and you will return to our hotel again in the future.  Best wishes from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: Great family holiday
review: After May trip with the lads golfing holiday, I returned for a more relaxing holiday with my wife, 10 days of pure relaxation and friendliness, staff stay the same, so they must be happy, and happy staff mean happy customers. Although hotel was nearly FULL, there was still plenty of room around the pool ,and no queueing for drinks etc. As usual nothing was too much trouble, from the room maids, waiters,waitresses ,bar staff and receptionists, Oh and of course the Manager, who came to say a special hello. We will be back !!!!

title: Relaxing family holiday
review: Dear villan20,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the HSM Atlantic Park through TripAdvisor. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a great stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride exceeding your expectations.  Thank you very much again for your nice review, all the team is waiting you again.  King regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Nice surprise
review: We stayed here from the 20th to the 27th of August.  This hotel is perfect for your family holiday, the kids club and entertainment are excellent especially Estelle and Tony who really went above and beyond.  We had our 8 year old girl with us and she loved the pool and kids club.  There is 1 pool and a kids pool both are quiet enough and there are more than enough sun beds out daily so there is no rush to get out and grab one in the morning.  We stayed all inclusive and the food is  but there is no tea  is always a large selection and burgers and hot dogs so you won't go hungry.  The hotel bar closes at midnight and to be honest it works out great as the hotel is quiet after that so we never had any problems sleeping at night.

title: Amazing family holiday
review: Spent a week here with 21 family members age ranging from 9-60.  Lovely clean hotel with nice rooms and balconies over looking the pool (if your in double rooms, suite are at the side of building and may not overlook pool). Was amazed there was never a sunbed issue, plenty to go round. On the day we arrived there was still a stack empty at 11.30am for us to help ourselves to.  Plenty of daytime activities for kids and adults, entertainment team were fab . First time having half board as normally like to eat out all the time but was happy to have breakfast daily, good selection and ate there for evening .meals half the holiday again good selection and could always find something you'd. My daughter's a chef and it wasn't really up to her standards but like I said to her it's…

title: Lovely holiday in a lovely hotel
review: Dear Angieb1974,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the HSM Atlantic Park through TripAdvisor. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a great stay. With a spirit to serve, we take great pride exceeding your expectations.  Thank you very much again for your nice review, all the team is waiting you again!   Best wishes for your family,  HSM Customer Service

title: Terrible place!!!!!!!
review: we had a brilliant holiday once again at the atlantic park  The weather was very hot but the air conditioning was right through the hotel The staff were excellent and friendly also the entertainment team worked hard to keep us entertained The hotel is in a quiet location but only five minutes walk from the shops and the beach Looking forward to going back next year Would recommend this hotelw

title: Best holiday ever
review: Dear Eric M,  We are impressed about your fantastic review, we feel very proud to know that you have enjoyed your holidays in our hotel. Your satisfaction is our happiness.   Let me express our gratitude for your nice comments related to our service and facilities. Moreover, thank you for highlighting the professionalism and kindness of our staff, be ensured that I will share with her and the entire team your nice words.   Thank you very much again for your nice review, all the team is waiting you again!   Best wishes from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: Terrible!!!
review: The staff at this place are so horrible they are all grumpy and they make you pay for small things like water in this place you have to pay for everything the bar staff threat you like your a piece of rubbish I can't wait to get out this hotel I'm disgusted and it's not like it's that cheap and I still can't get over how they make your pay to use the safe! I'm not sure how it's rated 4 stars I wouldn't even rate it at one star!

title: Great but only for families & couples
review: If you're looking for a party holiday with a group of friends then this is not the hotel for you.   After loosing the hotel we originally booked with due to our holiday company going bust, we had to book here as it was the only one available. We were hoping for a party holiday situated in the centre of Magaluf but that is not what we got. It's situated a good 15 minute walk from the strip and is very family orintated with lots of children around, so if a party holiday is what you're looking for look else where..   However, for families and couples this would be great for you.   Good points:  - The hotel is very clean and tidy. Especially around the pool and reception.   - The snack bar by the pool is great, it serves freshly cooked burgers, chips, pizzas etc.   - (If you have…

title: Much better than expected
review: Dear eml0uise,  We apologize about the problem Low Cost Holidays, there were a lot of people affected with the same problem.   We are delighted that you enjoyed the cleanliness so much, and that you felt so well attended by our staff, we certainly will keep on working to maintain our high quality service and keep focused on customer satisfaction and fulfillment of our HSM standards.  we are very happy to know that you felt absolutely satisfied with the gastronomy that our kitchen staff prepared during your time with us and we are sure that compliments like yours make their daily efforts worthwhile.  We lament your comments on our staff, since the entire team put a lot of effort to maintain the highest standards of service, to let our guests feel most valued and genuinely cared for.  Once again we would like to thank you for your feedback as it gives us the opportunity to make improvements and thus offer all our guests a better service.  All the best for you and your friends,  HSM Customer Service

title: All inclusive - worth every penny!
review: We were pleasantly surprised about this hotel. We were unsure about what to expect as we had booked for our two sons to be able to go out to The Strip whilst my husband and I caught up on some sun and relaxation.  We checked in , paid what appeared to be a tourist tax which I wasn't expecting but didn't mind - and extra for the use of the room safe. The room was nice - all rooms appear to be pool facing , we had a balcony and it was clean and well maintained.  The pool area was fine with plenty of sunbeds and shade if you needed it. There was a snack bar by the pool area where you could get food when the restaurant was closed. The boys had food there a couple of times and said it was fine.  The restaurant area was immaculately clean ,We all thought the food was excellent , there…

title: Great hotel, super location
review: Dear mariapaul2016,  Thank you very much for your wonderful description of your holidays. We are very happy to know that you had a great stay with us, it is our main satisfaction.  It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed your experience and you appreciated our facilities and our varied gastronomic offer.  We feel absolutely satisfied after to read your wonderful opinion, we will we very pleased to welcome back in your next visit to Mallorca.   All the best from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: July 2016
review: This is a pretty standard but lovely and clean hotel. I went to Magaluf on a girls holiday and this hotel was perfect. Pros: Cleaned rooms everyday Snack bar in between meals Clean and tidy Nice pool Always enough sun loungers All inclusive meant free drinks all day and evening!!   Cons: Basic rooms although quite large! Had to pay extra for the safe and also a tax?  Would 100% recommend - not amazing for families but perfect for clubbing (location is perfect - close to strip and beach!)

title: 1 week all inclusive July 2016
review: RECEPTION We arrived at the Hotel at 12pm and were served by a friendly man with a beard. He informed us that check in begins at 2pm but that he would give us access to the luggage room and give us our AI bands so that we could start our holiday.  The main entrance was well air conditioned and of a modern design with a good state of repair for a 4 star.  We went back just after 2pm and we were checked in quickly with no problems. If you are visiting Mallorca there is now a new Tourist tax to be aware of and payment is due on check in.  Payment is also needed for a safe and any other add ons you like such as internet. Free internet is available down stairs and there are comfy couches to sit on whilst you use it. Location wise it is 5-6 minutes walk to the strip and the beach in a…

title: Family with 4 year old boy
review: Dear SuzanneSteveAndrew,  Thank you very much for your time sharing your opinion. Your extended opinion help us to continue improving every day.   We celebrate that you enjoyed your holidays in our hotel but we consider all of your suggestions. We will congratulate the staff, especially Georgi, Toni and Morini.  Thank you for choosing HSM Atlantic Park for your holiday in Majorca and we hope you had a pleasant return journey home.  Best regards from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: Can't wait to go again!!
review: Did stay here in late July, with my wife and 4 year old boy. As a family with children we wanted to avoid the most noisy areas, therefor we were not sure about Magaluf at first. But this is not the most noisy area in Magaluf so it was no problem. The hotel of course can not guarantee what kind of guests arriving, but it seems to attract a mix, both young people, family's, couples etc, and they got security guard every evening to take care of things if necessary (we didn't notice anything)  They also got children's pool and playground for children..   The hotel got a stage nearby the pool with entertainment every evening(until midnight). Some entertainment for children until about 9 in the evening. So its possible to watch the entertainment from the balcony while children are…

title: All around an amazing holiday
review: Dear ha1979,  We feel very proud to have offered you a great stay in our hotel. Our main goal is your happiness and satisfaction during your holidays.   It is a pleasure to know that you and your family enjoyed this nice experience in HSM Atlantic Park.  We will be waiting your next visit. You and your family have your home!  All the best from Mallorca, HSM Customer Service

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Just got back after an amazing week here. Hotel is spotlessly clean, the food was lovely and all the staff were friendly and very accommodating, especially with our early flight on our final day- making sure the restaurant arranged an early breakfast for us. The lady running kids club was AMAZING and deserves some sort of medal- always happy, remembered all the kids names after meeting them once and managed to get reluctant kids to try new things. I cannot wait to go back, hopefully next year.

title: Great hotel enjoyable stay
review: Just back from a 9 night stay here and really enjoyed the hotel. Couple early 40s and our 12 yr old son Food was lovely and plenty of choice to suit most tastes with some themed nights like Chinese.  Staff were all friendly in restaurant and have seen some comments about rude bar staff but I didn't encounter this. Entertainment crew were good and did their best to get people involved in things around pool during the day. We spent most days at pool and most evenings in hotel.  Entertainment was ok with nights that animation team put on shows the best  We did venture to strip but realized very fast we were way too old for magaluf strip at night which to be honest varied from funny to crazy to just horrible drunken scenes .   Our 12 yr old son loved the kids activities and he had…

title: It was okay
review: Dear Noel k,  Thank you very much for your time sharing your opinion. We feel very proud to know that you will visit us again.  We are very happy to know that you felt absolutely satisfied with the gastronomy that our kitchen staff prepared during your time with us and we are sure that compliments like yours make their daily efforts worthwhile.  We regret the incidence on your arrival day, but we are very happy that you had an enjoyable stay in HSM Atlantic Park.  We hope your journey back  was a safe and pleasant one and the you will return to our hotel again in the future.  Best regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Amazing holiday
review: I stayed here for a week with my friends when we got here the room was not ready so we were put into a single room which was a bit of a squeeze but when we got our actual room the day after it was lovely and over looked the pool. The location of this hotel was perfect, great distance from the beach, nightlife and the Water Park. The food was not really great, but then again i am a fussy eater. The entertainment in the evenings was so bad it was good it defiantly made me laugh. The security guard Benson was very helpful and great fun and the reception staff where very helpful, but the bar staff and restaurant staff were really rude and kept questioning if i was a resident or not because i was not all inclusive so on occasions they would not serve me water. I found the bar staff…

title: Girls Holiday
review: Dear ChloeFlitter,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor Community. Feedback from our guests is a very important tool for us as it enables us to pinpoint our weak areas and to improve accordingly.  We celebrate that you enjoyed with the location and your holidays.   We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best wishes from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: "Lads Holiday"
review: This hotel was brilliant. Best hotel Ive ever stayed in. It was clean had great air con. Food was lovely and staff were so friendly. The entertainment team were so good, had a lot of laughs. If I was ever going to magaluf again then this would definitely be my first choice. Would recommend to all.

title: Brilliant but noisy
review: Good points: - The hotel is in a great location in Magaluf in terms of it being close to many tourist attractions such as Western Water Park (a must go), Go Karts, Pirates show and it's very close to the beach. If you're going on a "lads" or "girls" holiday then you'll be pleased to know it's a 10 minute walk away from one of the biggest night clubs in Magaluf, BCM Planet Dance, and a further 5 minute walk away from the club strip. - The hotel's restaurant has incredible chefs, me and my girlfriend were blown away with some of their meals, the paella was exquisite and they did a Chinese night when we stayed and the food there was incredible. The desserts are a bit odd but some of them were delightful, the banoffee pie and profiteroles to be precise. - Hotel staff are friendly -…

title: Lads Holiday
review: Dear Callum O,  Thank you very much for your time sharing your extendet opinion, it is very important for us.   We celebrate that you liked our location and the gastronomy. We apologize about your problem with food signs, we are going to solve it immediately.   We apologize about the noise induced by other guests, we try to keep the silence during the night but sometimes it is very difficult, because Magaluf is a zone where people are looking for party and fun, we are trying to control the inappropriate behavior, but everyone have to bring the education from his house. It is a shame the behavior of many guests.  We hope your journey back was a safe and pleasant one and the you will return to our hotel again in the future.  All the best from Mallorca,  HSM Customer Service

title: Lads Holiday
review: Stayed here last week with a group of friends. As it wasnt exactly high priced we weren't expecting a lot however where fairly surprised, the hotel is very nice in general and is clean. The rooms are nice and where a very good size for the 3 of us per room, you also had the option to have the room cleaned everyday. There was also a good selection of food and drink on the all inclusive and we definitely got our moneys worth. One negative i would potentially have could be the bar men as they were usually very miserable.

title: Modern and Fresh
review: Dear Andy_Jones_98,  Thank you very much for your nice description of your holidays. We are very happy to know that you had a great stay with us, it is our main satisfaction.  We will speak with our bar staff to find out what happened to avoid the same situation on the future. It is not usually, all the staff makes a lot of efforts to offer the best service.  We hope your journey back at home was a safe and pleasant one and the you will return to our hotel again in the future.  King regards,   HSM Customer Service

title: Boys holiday
review: From the moment we arrived at the hotel we just knew it was going to be a decent hotel. We waited in a queue and were dealt with relatively quickly considering it was peak time for checking in. Both members of the reception staff were very friendly and welcoming with us. We had to wait for our room as there was 3 of us and so we were told it would take a little longer which was understandable.   There is free WiFi in the reception area so this gave us something to do and we were allowed to put our suitcases in a secure room and sit outside to grab some of the first Spanish rays of the holiday.  Other good points are:  - The all inclusive wasn't too bad and was open for three different times of the day but there is a snack bar available outside these times up until 10.30pm. - The…

title: Nice Hotel, Shame About The Guests
review: Beautiful Hotel, Set On The Outskirts Of Magaluf. Very Clean And Well Presented. Food Good And Varied. Traveled As A 40+ Couple And Two Teenage Children (17). Booked A Suite As Hotel Website Advertises Whirlpool Bath, However This Is Not The Case In All Of The Suites, The Hotel Said It Was Because Our Suite Was A Disabled Room, However There Were No Handles Or Bars To Assist In The Bathroom. and Because Of The Position Of The Sink And Shower Screen You Had To Get Into The Bath To Put The Plug In. Although The Room Was Very Large With A Sliding Door Partitioned Lounge Area, We Had Specifically Booked It For The Whirlpool Bath. All Of The Suites Overlook The Dirty Reception Roof, Rubbish Is Constantly Thrown From Upstairs Windows Onto The Roof By Other Guests (Plastic Cups, 1/2…

title: Girls holiday
review: Dear tykes2007,  Thank you very much for your time sharing your opinion.   Let me express our gratitude for your nice comments related to our service and facilities. Moreover, thank you for highlighting the profesionalism and kindness of our staff, be ensured that I will share with her and the entire team your nice words.   We apologize about the noise induced by other guests, we try to keep the silence during the night but sometimes it is very difficult, because Magaluf is a zone where people are looking for party and fun, we are trying to control the inappropriate behavior, but everyone have to bring the education from his house. It is a shame the behavior of many guests.  We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best wishes,   HSM Customer Service

title: Amazing made my holiday
review: I stayed at the HSM Atlantic Park hotel from the 15th of June to the 22nd. On arrival I found the hotel to be exceptionally clean but when getting to the front desk a woman with disgusting attitude told us we couldnt check in, although it was 2pm? We came back at 2:30 and STILL couldn't check in...after travelling for hours you can assume we was getting very agitated. The woman didn't care in the slightest and if anything she belittled us because of our age. Our room was clean and tidy, hair dryer, air con, tv and a balcony overlooking the pool. The only thing I can fault is the shower, it constantly switched from hot and cold and there was nothing you could do about it. We also asked for blankets as it was very cold at night but didn't recieve any.  Us girls chose to go half…

title: Honest review
review: Dear Vicky P,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for taking the time to share on Tripadvisor your recent experience at HSM Atlantic Park.  We apologize about the acttiude of our recepcionist because it is not usually because our guests are the most important. On the other hand, we are delighted that you enjoyed the cleanliness so much, and that you felt so well attended by our staff, we certainly will keep on working to maintain our high quality service and keep focused on customer satisfaction and fulfillment of our HSM standards.  Once again we would like to thank you for your feedback as it gives us the opportunity to make improvements and thus offer all our guests a better service.  Best wishes from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: Read this all and don't go here if you are young
review: Well would firstly like to say how I can not believe  all the negative comments I have seen. Have I missed something.  I would certainly say what a brilliant 4 star hotel this is and the cleanliness is outstanding it was spotless always looked spotless how hard the cleaners must work , the cleaners was very accommodating to when the room was available to clean, remember they have to clean all rooms allocated but yet work around when we are not around not the easiest of jobs but was always friendly and polite.  The hotel staff was outstanding in how welcoming the made me and my partner feel , for instance we are all inclusive we went to purchase a bottle of water to be given are money back and told you do not need to pay you are all inclusive fresh water at the bar. The food was…

title: DONT STAY HERE
review: Me and 2 other girls stayed here from 14th to the 21st of June, and we would never stay here again. The hotel smells awful, they must have problems with their pipes as there was a horrible damp smell. We were all inclusive and lost half a stone on this holiday as the food was disgusting. Chicken was grey and lots of fish, which we did not like. Not all tastes catered for. The staff are incredibly rude, never have I experienced this before. We got a formal noise complaint, for talking in the room. We tried to explain that we were not loud and our neighbours were clearly just not happy staying next to young girls who were in Magaluf to stay out late but the manager was arrogant to us and took the Spanish couples side. Clearly prefer Spanish guests over British. When you are in…

title: Honest Review June 2016
review: Dear  Lara T,  We were regretful to learn that your perception of our resort did not comply your expectations.   Moreover, we sincerely regret your dissatisfaction with the dining experiences, mostly because the passion for gastronomy is one of our prime pillars and our Chefs strive to make meals one of the highlights of our guests’ overall stay by preparing a wide array of both local and international delicacies. During the service our Chefs check the temperature again to make sure it is appropriate.   Our staff is not rude, but we have to safeguard the welfare of all guests. You told that  when you are in Magaluf you should expect some level of noise. It is not true, if  you're in a hotel you have to respect the other guests whether you are in Magaluf as elsewhere, the respect and education is the most important when you travel.   King regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: ANOTHER GREAT HOLIDAY
review: Please read all. On the outskirts of Magaluf but still close enough to walk in around 10 minutes.  Nice reception area. Comfortable clean rooms. Good space in rooms. All inclusive food poor only *** from us. Greasy paella not as good as others we have stayed at. Too many rowdy younger groups allowed in with bad language. (Not a prude but a time and a place for it) Hotel let a large party of mentally challenged patients stay, ( not against that but I really didn't want to spend my holiday with them although they did go out of a day time) disabled young man next room to ours, I seemed to be the only person to help him at times, and became friendly with him, used to wave at each other which made him smile. Could of had much better entertainment though as the lads really struggled…

title: Loved our stay....apart from the last night
review: Dear Redrum1965,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for taking the time to share on Tripadvisor your recent experience in our hotel.   We apologize about the noise induced by other guests, we try to keep the silence during the night but sometimes it is very difficult, because Magaluf is a zone where people are looking for party and fun.   Please excuse us for the inconveniences caused during your holidays,  Best wishes, HSM Customer Service

title: 4*???? I don't think so!!
review: I travelled to the Hotel with a party of 8 others, it was the 15th year we have stayed at the hotel for my 2 brothers and I but a first time for the rest of the party. When we arrived at the Hotel at 11 am our rooms were being cleaned which is understandable so the delightful Sylvia on reception booked us in and said she would come and find us when the rooms were ready, she was very true to her word, the booking in proceedure was so easy and ran like clock work. The hotel is spotless with the staff working very hard each day to keep it clean and well maintained. Our rooms were cleaned daily. the staff at the hotel are in my opinion the best ive come across, very polite and really helpfull, if you treat them with respect they bend over backwards to help you, I think there moto…

title: great holiday
review: We had a great time at this hotel. All-inclusive, at the beginning of June, 2016. Relaxing and fun. The entertainments mobilisation team were really good, The room we had was  clean and quiet, room looked out to the pool area and the pool area very good, plenty of sun beds. The food was great, too, with all tastes catered for. staff was great, very friendly and we would definitely go back there.

title: very very good
review: Dear Reda2Kris,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for taking the time to share on Tripadvisor your recent experience in our hotel.   We are very happy to know that you felt absolutely satisfied with your holidays. Our staff makes daily efforts to offer you the a wonderful holidays.   In HSM Atlantic Park you have your home!   Best wishes from Magauf,  HSM Customer Service

title: What a joke for a 4star
review: verey verey good  the rooms are verey nice new shower and metrese   the food was deleshes  the front deske was good  all over wase good the mengement was verey good the air condision worke very good  food 10 rooms 9 serves 9

title: Ok for a basic hotel
review: Dear 941amnon,  We want firstly to say thank you for making HSM Atlantic Park your destination hotel for your recent holiday to Majorca and also for sharing your holiday experience with us and the Tripadvisor community.  We are very happy that you had a wonderful stay with us! It is our main satisfaction.  We look forward to welcome you back soon to continue enjoying pleasant experience with us!  All the best from Mallorca,  HSM Customer Service

title: Good beside the food.
review: Me and my partner have stayed here in total 3 nights so far and as far as I'm concerned the hotels dated and in certain bits smells old and foisty. The beds which was two singles pushed together my partner had woke up every time with bad back saying that they are so uncomfortable. the majority of the staff at reception are rude. it costs 12.99 a day  to rent an iron and then you have to wait 5 hours before it gets delivered as they don't have irons joke!!! the food is rubbish and I've eaten breakfast here once and it wasn't very nice. The later evening meal was just as bad. the beef was like rubber. And the cream of asparagus soup was like water. The shower was impossible as you'd put it on the right temperature then it would fire out red hot water at one point nearly burning my…

title: Need to do better
review: Rooms good size. Ask for pool view. Sun all day.  Suite has no view on low floors. Pool very clean and great for the little ones and disabled. Only two lefts for nine floors. About 5min walk to the centre. food not great. If you like chips you will be OK. Not a lot for the Britishs more for France. Staff nice. Day time entertainment team great. Been feel sorry for them. They have a lot to do. Hotel just brought in two professional shows all week. One was great and one was singing.( not good )  was at this hotel 11 years ago when it was a 3star and I would say it still is 3star. Towels for pool are €10 deposit witch you get back at end of week when you take it back., but it is 50¢ a day for a clean one. Was disappointed but had a nice holiday with my family. Would I go…

title: Golfing Holiday
review: Dear amandamillar2016,  Thank you for the time you have taken out of your day to write and share this review of your  stay with us at HSM Atlantic Park and the readers of Tripadvisor.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your room, the views and the location. Moreover, we sincerely regret your dissatisfaction with the dining experiences, mostly because the passion for gastronomy is one of our prime pillars. We consider your opinion about the entertainment.   I sincerely hope that you will decide to give us another chance to gain your confidence in our service and live the HSM  experience you could not perceive at this occasion.  Best wishes from Magaluf,  HSM Customer Service

title: Fantastic Atlantic
review: Good quiet spot yet all amenities close by within 2-3 minutes. Reception friendly and quick to check you in. Hotel great clean and comfortable, food great, always something for everyone, staff very welcoming Isabel in the restaurant always with a smile, the bar staff great service all day and night friendly smiling happy people. The pool area has plenty of sunbeds all in good condition the area is very clean. There are games to entertain young and old, water polo, boules, table tennis, darts, rifle shooting, tennis/football/etc. The entertainers make all welcome. Finally its good to see the hotel director out and about showing pride in the facilities.

title: Good for the price!
review: Dear  mikepatten123,  We are very pleased for this wonderful opinion. We are very happy when we obtain our main goal that is guest happines.   It is great to know that you loved all the hotel and services. We are going to congratulate all the staff for his good work, specially Isabel.   We would like to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  With the warmest of greetings,  HSM Customer Service

title: not for the engish
review: Back again , to one of my favourite hotels, we come back every year not just because of the location for our golfing holiday , but for the whole experience, the staff are great (as long as you treat them as you would be expected to be treated), facilities good, entertainment team great fun, food choice excellent, cleanliness marvelous, pride is taken. and most of all, although in MAGALUF, you are far enough away from the marauding hoards on the strip, quiet secludes location on the far end of the town, but still only 10 minutes walk to the beach. We'll be back, maybe September with my wife and family as well.

title: Lesley & Mark  Long Weekend Break
review: Rooms clean and tidy, friendly reception and bar staff, food needs looking into as not much choice and the later you went into the dinning room the less choice there was as it was not replenished. The entertainment was good and the team very friendly especially George he always went out of his way to speak at any time of the day. Well done

title: Short break
review: Dear maf0rd,  We would like to thank you for having chosen HSM Atlantic Park and for the precious time you dedicated in sharing your feedback about your stay with us.  We are delighted that you enjoyed the cleanliness so much, and that you felt so well attended by our staff, we certainly will keep on working to maintain our high quality service and keep focused on customer satisfaction and fulfillment of our HSM standards. Ww will congratulate all the staff, George specially.  Your comment about  food replenishment is very important for us. We apologize about it and we will take actions, we always try to offer you the best food service!  We look forward to welcome you back soon  to continue enjoying pleasant experience with us!  All the best from Majorca,  Follow us on facebook for  the news!  HSM Customer Service

title: BEST HOLIDAY!!!
review: We have just come back from a 5 night stay . The check-in was quick and efficient . Rooms were clean . The barstaff good especially Joseph . The entertainment team hardworking and imaginative especially George who always had a smile and took time out to talk us and other guests he is a credit to the hotel

title: Happy Holiday
review: Dear Misses Wendy S,   On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for taking the time to share on Tripadvisor your recent experience at HSM Atlantic Park.
