Let me express our gratitude for your nice comments related to our service and the room. Moreover, thank you for highlighting the profesionalism and kindness of our staff, be ensured that I will share with her and the entire team your nice words, especially Joseph and George.  We look forward to welcome you back soon to continue enjoying pleasant experience with us!  Best regards,   Follow us on facebook.com/saintmichelhoteles or Instagram for the news! HSM Customer Service

title: Holydays.
review: I went here with my partner and our best friend and had a fantastic time. The snack bar Chef was amazing- so polite and cooked great snacks (double cheese burgers). The pool was a great size and entertainment in the evening was great. Only down side was people hanging flags from balcony and throwing drinks- need better security.

title: Nice hotel and ideal location
review: Pleasant hotel which was 5 mins walk from nice beaches, and 10 mins walk from the strip and all the night activities, although all staff were pleasant we found that none of them went out of their way to encourage guests to stay in the hotel for the evening. So if you like just doing your own thing this hotel is ideal. I would go back. If you travel with Thompsons don't expect to see a rep, we didn't and we had to chase up transfer timings.

title: Atlantic park Magaluf
review: Dear Jeff,  Thank you for your evaluation and kind remarks.  We are happy to know that you liked our hotel and its location.  Your concerns have been passed on to the person who is responsible for that area in order to ensure improvement where possible. Your constructive criticism is always greatly appreciated.  We would be more than happy to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: great all rooms looked out to the  pool area
review: We are a couple who came for holiday in the hotel.  The food was very good. We booked half board. The problem is at dinner time.  you . obligated to pay 3 euro for drinks because there is not even a glass of water on the table.  There is a free wifi at the bar area only, who is a slow one. Staff very friendly, many thanks to lewis and silvia from the lobby reception for there service, and always went out of their way for us. The hotel is out of the noise from the strip but still very close so you can walk to it all. The hotel was very clean throughout, and our room got cleaned every day.Overall it was a very pleasant stay. We warmly recommend it.

title: Atlantic Park Magaluf
review: Dear Shimon,  We are grateful for your evaluation and your commentary.  We are glad to know that you have enjoyed your holiday and that you liked the meals we offer at our restaurant.  Our receptionists, especially Lewis and Slivia, will be happy about your positive remarks, as our first priority is to make your holiday as enjoyable as possible.  We would like to thank you for your constructive criticism and confirm that we have passed this information on to the person who is responsible for that area in order to ensure improvement where possible.  We would be happy to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  With kind regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: good location out of all noise Even better they do cider on the all inc
review: we are just back and had a great time hotel excellent .food lovely and everything about the hotel great .staff very friendly .would recommend to anyone. also very clean .we were all inclusive so found it great value lovely cocktails . snack bar good too.

title: Great Base
review: Booked this hotel as a last minute deal and we were not disappointed. Transfer is about 1 hour from the airport. The hotel location is great, 5 minutes to the beach, 10 minutes to the strip. Also there is no noise from the strip. The hotel was very clean throughout, and our room got cleaned every day. When we arrived our room wasn't ready, so as an apology for making us wait they upgraded our room to a pool view, staff were very polite and always went out of their way for us. Rooms were a good size for a couple, very similar to what you get in other Spanish resorts, we had a balcony overlooking the pool, small fridge, TV, hairdryer in the bathroom, the shower was really good too! The rooms have A/C and that was a godsend. The pillows were very thin though! Tip : ask for more…

title: Brilliant 4* hotel
review: Dear Natasha,  Thank you for your evaluation and kind remarks.  We are happy to know that you liked the location of our hotel and we hope that you have enjoyed your holiday in Magaluf.  Our staff will be glad to learn of your positive remarks, because their most prized reward is to know that their efforts to make you feel comfortable have paid off.  We would be more than happy to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Worst holiday in years.
review: Me and my partner stayed here as a late deal and couldn't fault the place at all.  It was on the outskirts of the town but only a 5 to 10 minute walk to the beach. This made it very quiet but also accessible and all age ranges were there when we visited for a week.   The hotel itself has everything you could want and if it wasn't there you only had to ask rooms were clean and towels were supplied. We could even use all of the facilities after we checked out due to our late flight home,  this included the use of a hot shower towels shampoo shower gel etc.  I would recommend this hotel and it's friendly staff to anyone of any age looking for any type of holiday!

title: wanted  a relaxing  break cc
review: Dear guest,  We would like to thank you for the time you have taken to evaluate our hotel.  It is great to know that you liked our hotel and that you have enjoyed your holiday.  Our staff will be very happy to learn of your positive remarks. It is very good for team spirit when our efforts are acknowledged and appreciated; after all, our first priority is to make your holiday great.  We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  With the warmest of greetings,  HSM Customer Service

title: Great hotel would recommend it to anyone
review: Our week here was rubbish. Staff were super rude to us. Receptionists laughed at us every time we passed by and bar staff threw us out of the bar at night when it was closing time. Our room had an ugly view and the hotel is far away from the good stuff Magaluf has. It's near Pirates but that was it. The food was disguting and they made us pay extra for drinks even though we'd booked half board! What a rip off.

title: holiday
review: Stayed here  for a week 28 Aug till Th sept  reception staff really helpful. room was nice  and was cleaned every day. walls are too thin tho. food was ok, pool was nice didn't need to save a sun lounger plenty to go around. right next to the pirate show and 10 mins walk to the water park. beach was 10 mins walk away and it is beautiful. near to  bars and shops. meet some lovely people here. would go back.

title: 11th sept
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your evaluation and kind remarks.  We are happy to know that you liked the location of our hotel and that you have enjoyed your holiday.  Our receptionists will be glad to learn of your positive remarks, because their most prized reward is to know that their efforts to make you feel comfortable have paid off. title: Excellent Friendly Hotel
review: just got back from this hotel it is very clean staff friendly plenty of sunbeds the bar closes at midnight and they serve drinks in plastic glasses the food is ok but on the cold side other 4 star hotels usually have a microwave but this hotel does not I did not stop in hotel for the entertainment so I do not  know what it was like the bars are less than a 5mins walk with plenty of entertainment for all ages we are in our late 60s and found everyone friendly in the town as the bars close there doors at 12midnightto cut down on the noise you can stop out all night if you want but the hotel is far enough away so you can have a good nights sleep

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your evaluation and kind remarks.  We are happy to know that you liked our hotel and that you appreciated our service.  Our staff will be glad to learn of your positive remarks, because their most prized reward is to know that their efforts to make you feel comfortable have paid off.  We would be more than happy to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Best wishes,  HSM Customer Service

title: Lovely hotel, would 100% stay again!!
review: On arrival we were greeted by a pleasant receptionist who spoke perfect English and quickly organized our room efficiently. The room was clean, a good size, air conditioned had a lovely pool view and very quiet with the corridors outside the door carpeted so no guests clonking shoes etc. The restaurant was excellent with a good variety of food. Outside in the pool area everything was spotless, the bar staff were very helpful especially Antonio. Entertainment team had the music just right i.e. not too loud. Evening entertainment was perfect, with outside acts that were entertaining. The beach was 5 mins walk and far enough away from crowd and noise. Overall our stay was perfect, we are a couple in our early 60s, and hope to book the same hotel next year, well done The Atlantic…

title: City break in Mallorca - HSM Atlantic Park
review: We booked everything very at the last minute so we were a little scared to end up in a place that could not be nice. But fortunately it all ended up to be quite pleasant. The hotel is very ok. Found it very Kids/family Friendly - wich was one of our main worries. Evenings were fun, since we were not going out (we had our small daughter with us) it was cool to being able to hang out and have some entertainment/animation for her and for all. It wasn't too noisy after 11pm, at least for us. Anyway, we were not expecting going to Mallorca - Magaluf, and have no noise outside.  People are NICE! Loved to meet Ms. Isabel "la camarera" in the Restaurant and Clara from the Animation team. :oD One down side. We paid half board and then in the restaurant we're told we have to pay extra 3€…

title: So so holidaY.
review: Dear guest,  We would like to thank you for the time you have taken to evaluate our hotel.  It is great to know that you have enjoyed your holiday and that you enjoyed the animation program we offer.  Our staff, especially those mentioned, will be very happy to learn of your positive remarks. It is very good for team spirit when our efforts are acknowledged and appreciated; after all, our first priority is to make your holiday great.  We would love to welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  With the warmest of greetings,  HSM Customer Service

title: Entertainment staff were exceptionally friendly and made the time very enjoyable
review: Paper thin walls which meant no sleep with the group of guys next to us. We heard it all. Bed sheets were old looking and bed was too hard for me. Needed more storage in bathroom for toilet bags and make-up bag and had to put stuff on the floor which is so unhygienic. Staff didn't have much to do with anybody and we didn't feel very welcome apart from one guy on the bar who was very friendly and always asked us how we were. Magaluf was not as good as we remembered it either.

title: DO NOT BELIEVE THE PAPERS
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for your evaluation and remarks.  We are sorry to read that your stay in did not satisfy your needs. We much appreciate the remarks and suggestions of our guests.  We would like to apologize in case you felt that the staff treated you in an unfriendly manner. Please rest assured that this behaviour is not accepted by the hotel chain or by direction of individual hotels, even if this case is an exception.  We would be happy to have the opportunity to change your mind about Hoteles Saint Michel and would gladly welcome you again in our hotel or in one of the hotels within our “Hoteles Saint Michel” chain in Mallorca.  Wishing you all the best,  HSM Customer Service

title: Girly holiday (not for family's)
review: Walking distance to the beach, clean rooms, great food, entertainment staff - brilliant, bar staff and other staff members friendly and willing to help. poor internet access.....to have it in the room need to pay extra and it is still not great.

title: Close to everything.
review: Location is the only thing going for this hotel and cleaners do a great job but the groups that visit the hotel make it very difficult for everyone else and the hotel does nothing about it. But besides this the most annoying thing about the hotel is the food that was so bland that we felt cheated. As for location it is very near the Pirates show which is a must and we have been seeing the show year after year and never get tired of it, but be aware that food is also very poor there, but the show makes up for it. The water park is within walking distance but in August it is so packed with uncontrolled children that after our last years visit we decided not to go back.

title: Good Hotel let down by some shortcomings
review: Estimado cliente,  Gracias por su evaluación y comentario.  Lamentamos mucho leer que su estancia en nuestro hotel no cumplió con sus expectativas. Apreciamos mucho los comentarios y sugerencias de nuestros clientes.  Nuestro restaurante ofrece una amplia selección de platos fríos y calientes en forma de un buffet, tres veces al día. Hay platos a base de carne fresca, pescado y verduras y también ofrecemos una gran variedad de postres, incluyendo fruta de todo tipo.  Lo sentimos mucho y nos gustaría pedir disculpas por las molestias ocasionadas. Nos gustaría confirmar que, para asegurar la calidad de nuestro servicio, hemos transmitido sus quejas al departamento central de calidad de nuestra cadena hotelera con el fin de asegurarle una mejora en lo posible.  Estaríamos encantados de tener la oportunidad de cambiar su opinión acerca de Hoteles Saint Michel y con mucho gusto le daríamos la bienvenida de nuevo en nuestro hotel o en uno de los hoteles dentro de nuestra cadena "Hoteles Saint Michel" en Mallorca.  Le deseamos todo lo mejor,  HSM Customer Service

title: Amazing Holiday
review: I stayed here as a solo traveller- I was looking for a quiet place and somewhere just convenient.   Overall a fair hotel, but let down by a few problems: the wifi here is only available in the lobby and it is extremely slow even there- wifi in the room is a surcharge. I think Wifi should be like any other utility and bundled in the price and of a good speed- this is 2015!  Secondly, I was on the half board package. Imagine my incredulity when they told me that although food was free, I would need to pay for drinks- even for water. That's disgraceful! It is only 3 euros, but I refused on principle alone. Why don't you just increase the room rate by 3 euros per night? I think it is an insult to ask guests to pay for a drink with water. What are you guys thinking? This is just…

title: Not to repeat
review: Estimado cliente,  Estamos muy agradecidos por su evaluación y su comentario.  Nos alegra saber que haya disfrutado el programa de animación que ofrecemos.  Nuestro equipo de animación se alegrará sobre sus comentarios positivos, ya que nuestra primera prioridad es hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable posible.  Nos gustaría darle las gracias por su crítica y confirmar que intentaremos mejorar en la medida de lo posible.  Nos gustaría verle de nuevo en nuestro hotel o en uno de los hoteles de nuestra cadena "Hoteles Saint Michel" en Mallorca.  Un cordial saludo,  HSM Customer Service

title: Nice hotel with kind personal
review: Location of the hotel is great, in a quiet area but within walking distance to the beach, bars, shops, restaurants as well as the splash park & Katmandu park & resort, not to mention being just across the road from Pirates the show. I would highly recommend all of the above mentioned, as well as Pirates the restaurant located along the beach front.  The free WiFi in the hotel can only really be picked up in the inside entertainment area during the day and can be quite weak due to the amount of people using it, however can sometimes be picked up in your room during quiet hours, ideal for online messages but not so good for uploading pics etc.  Food in the hotel is standard to all inclusive hotels, restaurant offered for breakfast: croissants, cereal, fruit, yoghurt, fried…

title: First and last visit of Magaluf
review: We stayed at Hsm hotel for 5 nights and the hotel was no good for us. The rooms cleaned very quickly and still dust in every place. The noise and the people in hotel dont understand that some people we like our sleep.Outside the hotel the same in restaurants people in groups shouting and pushing every person. only the beach is very good but the beach is very good in every place in mallorca.

title: Good hotel! Very clean!
review: Estimado cliente,  Gracias por su evaluación y comentario.  Después de haber leído su crítica, nos disculpamos si nuestro hotel no satisfació sus necesidades. Apreciamos mucho los comentarios y sugerencias de nuestros clientes.  Estaríamos encantados de tener la oportunidad de cambiar su opinión acerca de Hoteles Saint Michel y con mucho gusto le daríamos la bienvenida de nuevo en nuestro hotel o en uno de los hoteles dentro de nuestra cadena "Hoteles Saint Michel" en Mallorca.  Le deseamos todo lo mejor,  HSM Customer Service

title: Last minute break

review: Booked this hotel as a last minute booking as we had to cancel our holiday due to a family bereavement, we arrived as a party of four and we were given two rooms three rooms apart, however my husband and I went into our room to find so one was in there already, the staff were quick to rectify this and give us another room on a higher up floor. We would've preferred to be close to our family as we had all came together. The staff very on the whole friendly and helpful, the hotel had a high standard of cleanliness in all areas. The restaurant food was average and breakfast wasn't always very hot. We also had to pay 3 euros per person per night for drinks at dinner and thought this was a bit expensive due to the fact none of us drank alcohol so for 12 euros every night we had 4…

Because this was a "lottery trip" we only knew to which country we were going to and how many stars the hotel had. We choose 4 star hotel because we were only going for one week so we wanted to get the most out of the hotel we were staying. Once we paid the trip we got the information about the hotel we were going to be staying at.   We were very pleased to see the reviews here on Trip Advisor about Hotel HSM Atlantic Park and by the look of the pictures it seemed it was perfect.  So for my review:   The pros. I am a single parent and this was the first time we were on holiday just the three of us so was slightly anxious.  I have had many holidays to Spain, Majorca and Menorca over the last few years and I can honestly say this has been the best one yet.  The hotel is immaculate, in a perfect location a few minutes walk to the extremely clean beach.  The hotel has plenty of sunbeds - never ran out and a super clean pool.  I wouldn't describe this hotel as a family hotel - but for me it was perfect as there was a handful of other children - so not frantically noisy or busy.  The entertainment staff were EXCELLENT. title: Jolly Boys Maga 2015
review: Me and my family stayed at the hotel for 10 days with all inclusive. The reception was really helpfull with information with everything from good places to visit to rentering a car. The room was good. Air condition worked perfect 24/7. The room could have been cleaner, but it's nothing to worry about. Good restaurant with a big buffet for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Nice clean pool with sunbeds to everyone. Entertainment team doing activities in the morning, afternoon and evening. This made the holiday so much better! 10-15 min to the beach and 15-20 min to the strip. Very silent - almost no noise.

title: not that good.
review: Had never been to Magaluf and didn't have a clue what we were going to encounter but it was not great. The hotel was very noisy and old but with some new items dotted around trying to make it look new ..... but it is not. The location is 15 minutes from the beach and  2 minutes from the Pirates show. Pool very crowded and too small for the large number of people staying there unless you go early when all the young drunks are still asleep.

title: Not as good as it used to be....
review: Just got back from magaluff and stayed here at atlantic park. Room was lovely, staff were friendly apart from one of the bar staff who was ignorant towards young people. Food was average did not eat at the hotel much to say i was all inclusive as the food was the same every night and was very basic. Room was cleaned every day by the maids which we was grateful for, fresh bedding and fresh towels everyday. Entertainment was basic, they should do more entertainment for young people instead of trying to provide for children as there was only 3 children when i stayed there. Definitely a hotel for young people, only five minutes from the strip so it is not noisy when your going to sleep. Close to the beach and BCM. Would come and stay at the hotel again but not all inclusive.

Now it is surrounded...  Easy check in at just before 4am. Room is small...but clean...and well kept. Air-con a bit fierce...  Bed is very comfortable. Only one pillow. Towels good quality.Decent hairdrier.  Food...my usual problems in that I had emailed both the hotel and the group HQ to ensure that gluten free food was available. In Spain, gluten free is not seen as any problem in that items are usually readily available, often far better than…

review: Food was well below standards and out of 7 days ate out for 5 of them, the entertainment was not very good and found dining room staff to be very rude and unfriendly.  Hotel however was clean and close to nightlife, beach,waterpark and shops.

review: stayed at this hotel 26th to 29th June for a stag do with a few mates. Hotel offered exactly what we needed, clean and tidy, food was basic but enough choice so that you didn't go hungry with a good salad bar that I wasn't expecting. Drinks are plentiful and a big enough pool area that you can comfortably get a bed and enjoy the pool in the midday heat without feeling crowded.  As others have said it is about 10 mins to the beach and 15 mins to the strip with a few bars on the way in if you want to stop off for a beer. Evening entertainment in the hotel each night was a bit random but to be honest we weren't there for that reason!!  Overall good value for money for the AI and nothing I could see to complain about

title: Very good value for money
review: The rooms are basic but have everything you need and the position was good,just far enough away from the madness but it was within easy reach if you wanted to join in!! The hotel reception was relatively modern and always clean. The lobby and bar area wasn't anything special, it seemed to lack anything going on all the time.  The pool area was clean and lively considering the amount of stag and hen do's there at the time. DON'T take your family! Due to the amount of people plastic cups seemed to mound up more and more throughout the day.   The room was very small (myself and my friend had a room each). The decor was…

review: Been coming for several years now golfing. Hotel was clean and spacious, the room was perfect and cleaned every day with fresh towels etc.The menu was changed every day and the food was superb. I would also comment on how the staff go out their way to make sure you are catered for. Do not have a bad word to say!!

title: Excellent Hotel, Great Location & Excellent Staff
review: We stayed at the Atlantic Park in May. The hotel was very clean and all of the staff were extremely pleasant and helpful. They were the best assit the hotel has! The rooms were clean and fairly spacious. The maid cleaned every day and fresh towels were provided daily. The beds were very hard and the pillows were like a concrete block. We asked for more pillows which were provided promptly, they were slightly softer but were wafer thin. The food quality was extremely poor, the salad bar was fresh every day and we found this was the best choice for us. Breakfast was by far the best meal of the day, lots of choice, something to  please everyone. The hot buffet was not hot and the choice was very poor. I think that all of the meat came from rubber animals! My husband tried a fish…

review: a good clean, friendly staffed hotel. food well presented at all times. close to beach, clubs etc. a great place to locate while 'exploring' Magaluf. we had a great time, BCM 10 mins or 10 pubs away! do it your own way, hotel was a great sanctuary.

I wasn't disappointed, it's a lovely clean and friendly hotel situated at the edge of the resort so quiter but only 10 mins from the centre of town.  There are all the usual hotel facilities that you'd expect including free wifi in reception which was ideal for Facebook updates and posting pictures of the day out to friends and family.  The food was a traditional buffet style with a good selection of foods to choose from, everywhere was beautifully clean and must importantly I felt very much at home which is important as a lone traveller. The manager and staff were excellent, I've traveled a lot and not come across a team more helpful.

review: Stopped at this hotel twice, once with my boyfriend when we went for a partying holiday and once with my friend on a girls holiday. The hotel is lovely definitely a 4* rooms cleaned everyday, great selection of food at breakfast, lunch and tea and snacks provided throughout the day! Wouldn't advise taking children to this hotel however it is a lovely hotel for a drinking holiday, as it is clean and relaxing throughout the day. It is also about 10 minutes walk from the strip so away from the noise and nightlife! Drinks are also great with a wide selection as well as British drinks which you have to pay for if you wanted them. Overall excellent hotel and worth the money we spent!

title: Hotel fab food naff
review: Stayed here for 5 nights from 21st - 26th September 2014. Hotel is spotlessly clean & the maid cleaned our room daily. Rooms were spacious and beds very comfortable, the shower was fantastic and powerful. Food however was not up to 4#. Wasn't hot and was the same food most of the time we were there. Staff were wonderful. Everyone on review sites have moaned about the staff especially the snack bar waiter, in our opinion he was the nicest of the lot. Would go back for the price we paid as it's cheap enough to eat out. Can thoroughly recommend Tom Browns who have two eateries one not far from the hotel and one on the sea front. Huge breakfasts for €4. The other meals are reasonable also. For nice food can recommend the boatyard on the sea front also.

Our party were not AI and for the price we had paid expected much, much better, my advice would be to anyone thinking of staying here is go room only, or try and find an alternative hotel, I would recommend the Trinidad for position, food and staff. We would not stay there again ever!

review: Stayed at Atlantic Park for 7 nights in September as a couple with only breakfast (as wanted to visit and try various restaurants - as a side comment not related to the hotel, i'm a little sad that the local Magaluf cuisine is to much burger/chips oriented instead of more local food).  The hotel is a good choice if thinking to stay in Magaluf, not so affected by the noise of the street, but in the same time close to the main road, bus station close and few steps far from sea. First appearance of the hotel was really to a good standard and after looking around at other hotels in the area especially the main entrance and bar area it definitely one of the best . Our room was exceptional very clean and tidy . Bathroom was lovely with a powerful shower . Hairdryer and big mirrors . Wardrobe was big and spacious and geld all clothes on coat hangers . We were on the 9th floor which I thought was way to high especially with children . I was even scared to even sit out there . Would opt for a lower floor . Saying that if was exceptionally quiet . Bar and pool area was good . Snack bar was brilliant and a good variety…

title: Great holiday!
review: Holiday was great, and hotel really good! Room cleaned daily with clean towels, comfy beds and facilities in irons like a fridge and hair dryer! Had to pay for safe, but not bad cost -15 euros for the week. Food was good, nothing amazing but choice every night. Pool also good and clean, definitely more for clobbers, but some families around who looked happy

After we went downstairs and kicked off about the situation, we were 'compensated' with a bottle of champagne from the manager.. which we could get for free anyway being all inclusive.  On 3 occasions during the 10 night stay our room was…

title: Fab holiday - Great aspects
review: I've spent 2 weeks here in HSM Atlantic and it's been really lovely!  The food in the restaurant is very well cooked and the size of the restaurant is sufficient for the hotel. However, I would add that, after 14 days of dinner here, the variety of food seems a little narrow. I imagine, that should you be here for a 5-7 days, then it would be more than adequate.  The snack bar by the pool is good too, with a variety of 'fast food' which makes attending lunch in the restaurant less of a necessity.  The general cleanliness of the hotel is fab, and despite other reviews commenting on 'bugs', I've not witnessed any in this hotel (not even a single cockroach!!). The staff regularly clean the toilets, poolside and bar.  I had a twin room, with perfectly comfortable beds and a hot…

We arrived quite early and were quite tired so we went to the pool for the day to 'relax' after we went food shopping (passing two brothels). You couldn't go five seconds without spotting one or having on land around you and being allergic to stings, relaxing was impossible. If you don't like bugs don't go here. title: Great Food
review: Family room were next to elevator so there were noise day and night. Some evenings neighbours listened loud music, that was uncomfortable, especially we had 3 year old with us. But after 11 there were mostly ok, except groups who came up with elevator, they were sometimes very loud. Rooms were very clean, personal very friendly, food were excellent. Weather was fine and Mallorcas beauty was breathtaking. Child area in hotel were boring but at this moment our child was the only one there. Magalluf is not childfriendly but we allready known that before this trip. But we loved Mallorca and this noisiness and uncomfortability were exceptable.

title: Great hotel! Perfect for a Hen weekend
review: I recently stayed at th Atlantic park for a friends Hen party, there were 11 in the party and we all had a fab time.  The hotel is lovely, very clean, the rooms were very spacious and the pool area and the pool itself were brilliant!!  The hotel reception was very clean and the front desk were very helpful  the al inclusive food was nice, and they varied it each day! They also have a snack bar by the pool which did burgers, chips etc  Cannot fault anything about the hotel, plus its only a 5/10 min walk into all of the nightlife.  The hotel is advertised as a family hotel but I wouldnt personally take my children here, its much more suited for Hen/Stag parties! most of the people around the pool were part of large Hen/Stagg parties.  All in all I would reccomend! A lovely hotel…

review: Just returned from the Atlantic Park Hotel in Magaluf  This is a very nice Hotel which is well equipped and spotlessly clean it has very hard working entertainment staff and the bar & catering and cleaning ground staff all work very hard, however there are two sides to the review if I was arranging a Stag or Hen then you would be hard pushed to find a better hotel venue for accommmodation, there are few rules that are enforced with drinks available on an AI basis, a dream for your party!!, however if you are going to visit as a couple or a family or disabled person I would think carefully as things can get very wild we witnessed a glass bottle being thrown to the bar terrace from the 8th floor smashing 6ft from a gentleman having a drink, a fight, at least 6 or 7 semi or naked…

We were there on a Stag do for 4 nights and the hotel was ideal for us.  Check in was smooth and quick on our midnight arrival. Air con was superb, room was permanently chilled. Food was OK, good selection of starters mains and desserts and serve yourself beer/wine/sangria and soft drinks too.   The outdoor snack bar was ok too serving burgers, hotdogs and chips although the chef was not happy to be there. The pool bar again was good, 2 beers at a time however which was a PITA for a group of 5 of us,…

We had to stop using the reception toilets…

title: Great Weekend Location
review: Dear guest,   I am writing to you to offer you my apologies on behalf of the HSM Atlantic Park Hotel. Our aim is to make our clients’ stay as pleasant as possible and to fulfill their expectations. We work very hard day after day in order to improve the quality of the services we offer. However, despite our many years of experience, it is hard to meet the needs of every individual guest and unfortunately in this case our goal has not been achieved.   As you may know, Magalluf is well known as a destination for fun and nightlife, specially in June. We do not advertise our product with our collaborating Travel Agencies exclusively as a Family Hotel, but also, as stated on the brochure, for friends and young people. However we do offer a good situation next to the centre of Magalluf, a resort for leisure.  We suffer the misfortune of not distinguishing our guests when we receive a reservation. However we always try to maintain a pleasureable atmosphere in the hotel although the guests sometimes might turn out rude or disrespectful. We also like to remind all our guests that good behaviour is required, and any problems or improper behaviour towards staff or other guests will lead to eviction from the hotel.  We have a security guy and all the corridors and bar area are under cctv surveillance.    We definitely do not allow the consume of any kind of drugs in our premises.   When we have problems with behaviour I personally speak to the unruly guests and give them a warning letter. If the situation gets out of control, we call the police.   As the person responsible for the hotel, a member of the HSM Hotels chain, I can assure you that we make a conscientious effort to avoid any disturbances and inconvenience to our clients.   Wishing you all the best,  Director HSM Atlantic Park ****

A taxi brought us back at 10am the next morning to Atlantic park eventually no apologies nothing n when we got settled it was full of stag and hens totally discussing behaviour from most of them this was not what we expected women acting inappropriate big groups of men drinking swearing bein total beeps in the pool my 4yr old grandson could not play in the pool half…

title: Above average hotel
review: For those visiting this hotel I thought it was really good. The beer included in the All Inc. was Estrella Dam and was nice n cold. The cider was Olde English and was also rather nice. The food was nice with a medium selection including Steaks, Fresh Fish, Pasta Bread, Salad, Pizza ect. The poolside snack bar is open for two hours three times a day around 12am, 3pm and 9pm serving your usual Burger, Hotdog, Pizza, Chips ect. The hotel was very clean and within close proximity to Magaluf strip. Majority of staff were friendly but a few were miserable. Pool was nice and clean with plenty of sunbeds. Bath was nice and large, shower was nice and powerful and cleaned on a daily basis with towels changed. Free Air-Con in rooms. Child friendly but not too child orientated so didn;t…

review: Decided to go Magaluf for a change this year with the ladies. Didn't want to stay exactly in the middle of everything so picked Hsm Atlantic Park, we always like to go 4 star and all inclusive. First walked in friendly staff, booking in very quick and straight forward. Did ask for all 3 rooms to be low floor, pool view and next to each other if possible. We didn't get any of our requests, 5th, 7th and the top floor 9th! Oh well not the end of the world. Room was very spacious, flat screen TV, large bathroom with bath spa. Went out to the balcony to have a view of a car park and the roof of the entertainment room. Went down and requested to move, unfortunately they were unable to do this until the next day. The sofa bed settee was uncomfortable, you could feel the wooden slacks.…

Excellent bar staff - special mention for the pool side bar staff brilliant sense of humour and always with a cheeky comment or two.  Special mention to the two animation team Ana and her accomplice - cant remember his name but they were always full of fun and very persuasive.  A thoroughly enjoyable holiday and a chance to meet some lovely people.

The hotel is situated  within walking distance from Magaluf beach and opposite Pirates adventure show.  There was plenty of spaces…

There was a lot of variation with the food if you eat meat, not much choice for vegetarians as everything had meat or fish in, but no different to any other al inclusive I've stayed in. The room was clean and a good size, as was the bathroom. I would recommend this hotel, and I would stay here again.

title: decent hotel
review: Stayed at this hotel a week between May and June 2014. Hotel is clean and sfaff are very friendly. Food is quite good but very salty. Most things are fried, so you feel the oil taste more than a food's. Beach is about 1 km or a bit less to walk. Sunbeds cost. Lay on your own towel is free. Beach is clean. The cleaning staff at the hotel uses too much chlorine and other chemicals, which is not very healthy to breathe in though. There's locked baggage room for suitcases to hold between check-out and leaving the hotel. Also opportunity to book a shower room. Public bus stop in front of the hotel. Easy way to visit Palma, Palmanova etc. Ticket to Palma is 3.15 Eur. Good car rentals near by within 200-300 meters.

title: lovely clean hotel

We got to the hotel and told us there had been a flood (although it didn't look flooded to us) there were 2 other British girls that got moved with us aswel. We were pretty pissed off as they had moved us to the other end of magaluf (the furthest away we could have possibly been). Being a few hundred yards from the strip, you are far enough from the hustle and bustle. Yes there were groups of revellers, stag and hen parties and some noisy guests in the early hours, but look were you are! The hotel was on budget, staff polite and enough food choice that you won't starve.I do agree with several comments made about the bar staff.....smile guys, it won't kill you. For us it was the entertainment team who made our holiday.  Not what we would normally participate in, but once we did, it was a good laugh and an opportunity to meet other guest.You made us feel welcome and wanted.Thanks.

review: We stayed here for an All-Inclusive three night break and I can only report that this is one of the best hotels I have stayed in. Even the plumbed-in radio in the room worked! The restaurant had a better range of food available than any other 4*AI I’ve stayed in. It was well cooked and presented, being overseen by a very polite and efficient maitre d'. I was very impressed by one of the chefs, who coped very well with an obnoxious and rude man. title: Great holiday!
review: Just returned from a one week stay at the HSM Atlantic park in Magaluf. We visited as a family with two teenage children.  The hotel is easy to locate with no access problems for wheelchairs etc. Access to the lifts, restaurant and pool are also very easy.  Check-in was quick and easy and the receptionist was friendly and spoke very good English. Safe cost for the week was 15E with a 5E deposit. Check-in is after 2pm but we were given our two rooms on arrival around 12.30pm.  The rooms are basic but clean and well maintained. All rooms overlook the pool and have a fridge. The air-conditioning is fine and not too noisy. The room was cleaned daily but note that the towels are only changed when left inside the bath tub. Meals are served in the a la carte  restaurant, there was a…

Only negative thing that would have been nice is free wifi in the rooms, instead of having to go downstairs every time we needed to use the wifi.

The hotel is far enough away from the strip but close enough to walk into it if that's what you want. The entertainment team work very hard and are eager to please everyone. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend it. The only down side I can think of is that if you book half board you cannot have a drink with your evening meal not even water! There is an option to pay 3euros a night if you want a drink but my advice would be to book all inclusive as the drinks otherwise are…

The hotel was lovely really clean and well equipped. The food was always available and plenty of choice at the buffet. Really though the highlight of this hotel is without a doubt the entertainment team, they are fantastic with entertainment starting at 10.30 in the morning and finishing at midnight. Activities ranging from tennis,water Zumba,games for the kids and evening shows. The only downfall I would say is that some of the bar staff can be very unfriendly and at some point rude, reasons unknown. Also because the hotel is just a mile away from Magaluf centre some of the quests are a bit rowdy although the hotel does have a…

title: Atlantic park hotel, Magaluf
review: Stopped here from 10th-17th July 2013 as a group of girls. Wanting a nice chilled out vibe in the day and could walk into the nightlife later on!  Location - Straight opposite the Pirates adventure show and only a 5 minute walk to BCM square and a 10 minute walk to the strip. Ideal if you do not want to be in the thick of it all. On the way to the nightlife there is a bar called Manos which is 10 euros for 2 hour all inclusive bar.. Very friendly defo recommend!!  Rooms - Very very clean and tidy. Well kept and couldn't fault the cleanliness or facilities. Pool view rooms and I would recommend a higher floor. The way the hotel is built you can more or less see everyones balconies so great for making friends.. not so much if you want privacy!  Food & Drink - 3 star standard..not…

I went half board (wouldn't recommend all inclusive you would be wasting your money) and frankly the dining was not of a high standard, I was very disappointed and ate very little at the hotel.  Chicken, veal and pork seem to be the main dishes in the hotel.  (lots of pizza and chips if you are into that!)  Also, they don't put a lot of food out at once and most nights I had to wait for long periods for them to bring fresh food out. Vegetables were a hit and miss, most night carrots and veg…

It is very clean, our room was cleaned every day with fresh towels every day. The staff are friendly but have very limited English, even the reception staff struggled a little. The entertainment staff spoke the best English, and they were great fun and worked very hard. The food is average, definitely not 4 star, but we always found something to eat. The rooms were fantastic overlooking the pool!, nice staff in reception and restaurant. The pool bar was the best as we were booked in all inclusive so we were there in the evenings drinking their nice cocktails. I will not be going back to this hotel it needs security to keep things under control.

review: Just returned from a long weekend in Magaluf.  Fabulous time had by all.   The Atlantic Park is a great hotel, the entrance and reception area was immaculate as was the dining hall, toilet area etc - constantly being cleaned!  The food was plentiful and varied, if basic.  It catered for all tastes with cold meats and salads with bread to the traditional paella.  There were always chips at the ready if you didn't fancy any of the other things.  There was always loads of free tables and it was lovely bright and airey and you never had to que for very long.   The rooms are of a good quality with great views off the balcony and our bathroom was perfectly fine and very clean.  Your room was cleaned each morning, beds made and clean towels provided too. title: like ron seal u get what u pay for cheap and easy
review: Just returned from a stag do for my 67 year old uncle and had the best time in Magaluf. On arrival we were supposed to be staying in their sister hotel next door, but due to overcrowding were upgraded to this hotel.  Unlike other guests we ate and drank in town. Only sampling 1 breakfast fried egg on 2 toast in the 4 days we were there. This was fine so can't comment on how good or bad the food is. The room was clean and the shower was very powerful, we stayed on the 3rd floor. Each room has a safe and there is also lock boxes located next to the lifts on the ground floor.  The location of the hotel is a 5 minute walk from all the fun but also far enough away from all the noise.  For the amount of money we paid I can not find any criticism and high recommend it, please note…

The rooms are adequate for the amount of time you want to spend in them.  Clean but with dated decor and a fridge free of charge.  Not the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in but it may just be a personal thing. The large buffet restaurant is fine, a large selection of varying international options and a fantastic salad bar, something for everyone and there's always chips!!!!! Self service beer and wine taps as…

I was peaceful during the day which was lovely, the food was ok, but i didn really eat much anyway. I ended up using an English pub just down the road as a meal was around 3 euros!  We was half board at this hoel bu as i was geting home in the earl hours of the morning i never had breakfast, i think i did once for the whole stay i was there haha.  This hotel is for the clubbers who do want a more quieter hotel during the…

title: IT'S A PALACE :)
review: Don't know where to start. First thing we were looked up and down by a rude woman on the main desk didn't start off on a good note. The room wasn't ready as they'd had a late check out - so we had to wait forty mins. Then I got told I coudn't take my coffee from the bar area to outside can you believe it still not unpacked yet ! Room was very small and we had to take a breath and hold it every time we went into our bathroom ....... Beds like bits of hardboard and the restaurant was like an old time movie of Oliver children everywhere. Yep you guessed it NOT the best holiday.

title: We would stay here again:)
review: Stayed here from the 10th - 17th july on a girls holiday. we were moved from the hotel next door which looked disgusting so we were very pleased to then be treated like princesses on arrival. The room was clean and the beds were divine. Air con was CREEPY SICK.  the fridge could have been slightly bigger and we would have preferred a room with a view of the pool to check out the lads ;)  overall we were VERY happy! and would 100000% visit again.

title: Not a serious four star
review: I chose this hotel for the area but when we got there couldn't believe the beach was so far away, took us a good ten minutes and in the heat this was a huge problem for me.  We are used to two and three star hotels and upgraded for a treat this year to a four star - so we thought - don't know how they got another star here could do with a few things sorted.  Food: Good choice but it was luke warm nearly every night put us off didn't want to get the dreaded holiday tummy ! Room: Big room but our sheets only got changed once and in the heat I had to swap the bottom sheet around myself, would have hoped to get clean sheets every other day. View of the " Tango walls " out of the window was not a great view the hotel opposite is close and very bright. Not happy with our hotel…

Around the pool was fine with the animation staff doing all they could to get you involved in the daily games,also there were plenty of sunbeds and a good pool bar.There was also live entertainment every 2nd night with other nights bingo,quizzes,and disco…

title: Don't book this hotel!
review: I stayed at the 'HSM Atlantic Park Hotel' from 22nd September untill the 29th September 2012. It was a family holiday (10 people in total) . I like to judge a 'Hotel' buy it's 'Staff / Cleanliness / Location and Value for Money' , this hotel ticked all the right boxes for me . The Room that I was given was on the 3rd floor, it was a very nice and clean room, the bathroom was very nice with an excellent shower and plenty of hot water . I had 'Room Service' everyday . The food in the 'Dining Hall' was plentiful but only luke warm . The 'Swimming Pool' was very nice, but deeper than it looks !!! . As for the 'Sun Loungers' I did not find these to be a problem and there were lots of them . The 'Entertainment' during the day was good fun and a good way of making new friends, some…

title: Excellent Holiday
review: We have just returned from a weeks holiday & after being initially apprehensive from reading the previous reviews, it has been a great week!  We chose All Inclusive & the food choice was excellent with salad choices, great selection of meat, snails were even an option one night. There is pasta & chips if you are not feeling particularly adventurous. The carrot cake was a particular highlight, but my partner felt the beans at breakfast could have been warmer- a small gripe!  The staff in all areas were courteous & helpful & the entertainment staff did a great job of getting people involved. There are day activities & nightly entertainment. The only low point in the entertainment was the Elvis impersonator- but then you don't need to watch!  The rooms were spacious & clean with…

review: We have just returned from our 4th visit to The Atlantic Park and have had a really enjoyable holiday and will definitely be returning in 2013. Although it is in Magalluf it is on the outskirts and so are guaranteed a nights sleep but can reach the night life easily.  The staff are all fantastic but the real icing on the cake are the entertainers or animation team as they are known. They work extremely hard and do their utmost to get the guests to join in daytime and evening activities which is a fantastic way to get to know them and other guests of all nationalities.They provide such a wide range of daytime activities that there is something for everyone. The evening entertainment was not great but it is really difficult to cater for different nationalities and there is…

title: Don't see what the complaints are about.
review: First time at this hotel and very pleased to have chosen it.  Great staff - very friendly.  Food good with lots of choice and no queuing as restaurant is very well laid out. Take the all inclusive option as this works out very good value for money.  The rooms are not over plush but they have everything you will need - very clean and comfortable.  The location is good being just on the outskirts of Magaluf - approx 10 mins walk to the strip so far enough away so its not really noisy.  Plenty of sunbeds available around the lovely pool.  And friendly entertainments staff providing the usual fun games but not too pushy if you dont feel like joining in.  Would recommend to couples and families.  If you are going to Magaluf - stay here - you will enjoy it - we definitely will be back…

title: Thoroughly recommend
review: Just got back from a weeks all inc at this hotel.  Good food plenty of choice. rooms clean and tidy. staff were helpful to. Not the usual rush for beds in a morning and the hotel assured us that it was fully booked up the week we were there. Only one small somplaint was that we were not due to be picked up til l6pm.. so unlike other hotels were you could hire the room for extended hours. The Atlantics policy was only to provide a courtesy shower room which had to be booked " in advance " which we were blissfully unaware of..  for you brits only lovers..  There was only approx 10/15 % brits staying at the hotel. There is also an animation team who try their best to get holidaymakers off their sun beds

title: good.. not amazing
review: Perfect hotel for the family. We went with our 6-month old son. I can warmly recommend the hotel to both families, couples, partyers (5 min walk to the center of Magaluf) everybody really. Nice pool area with a snack bar, tennis / volleyball / football / basketball court, table tennis and more. One of the best features of the hotel was the fantastic entertainment crew who, with great dedication, activated interested guests with various competitions during the day (table tennis, tennis, soccer, water polo, crazy games, etc.), complete with prizes for the winners in the evening when they started with their evening shows at the pool area. The restaurant (did all inclusive) had something for everyone with a good buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. Beer, wine, cocktails, coffee, etc.…

I had no idea what to expect but thought Magaluf was going to be noisy, dirty and full of drunks.  Maybe this is the case outside the hotel, but I found everyone at the hotel friendly, courteous and more than happy to help.  I travelled with my 10 year old son, so really wanted to make sure he had a good holiday.  The entertainment staff work tirelessly from 1030am each day.  My son couldn't wait for the competitions to start.  There was aqua zumba, darts, table tennis, crazy games, water polo, football, basketball, pool, pistol shooting and many more.  Apart from a break at lunchtime there was…

title: A typical all inclusive
review: We have just returned from a 4 night stay at this hotel in Magaluf. We were supposed to be staying at the HSM Don Juan which is next door to this hotel, who on arrival told us there was a problem with our room and that we had to stay here!  We didnt no what to expect, and we were very pleasantly suprised.   The staff were more than helpful and very friendly. We were shown to our room straight away which was on the very top floor directly over looking the pool area. The room was spacious and very clean, and was cleaned with fresh towels everyday. We were half board, but never had breakfast as we were partied our on magaluf strip and found breakfast too early. However, we had dinner every night, i must say food is a little repetative but very eadible and there is something for…

title: Far from a 4 star hotel
review: First, this hotel and the area is most suited for young people, 16 to 25. If you want relaxation and want to get a good sleep in the night go to another place, preferably not in an area near Palma. Check advice from your booking agency. This is definitely not a 4 star hotel, it's at most a 3 star. The only advantage or disadvantage is that it's more expensive and you don't find as many party english people like in the 3 star hotels in the area, so you can get some sleep in the night. It is not very close to the beach (8-10 minutes), but this means a more quiet area. There were no sheets and towels change the whole week, your room gets cleaned from time to time but not every day. There's no carpet on the floor. Beds are like in a prison, no joking. AC is ok. Half-board food was…

However in summer it is a younger clientele who just enjoy the lively Magaluf.  With kind regards,  Your HSM Customer Service

Firstly they put us on the 7th floor, but because we had a 2 1/2 year-old i asked them if we could have a lower floor, that wasnt a problem.   We went A-INCLUSIVE, as this is the best option i believe. I see the people were complaining about the food, but i thought it was brilliant, always cooked and look tasty aswell. The drinks were really good aswell. never really went to the snack bar this year but from previous years always to a good standard.   Everyone from the hotel manager to the cleaners were brilliant, hey Nelli lol. Towels were changed everyday, along…

review: Arrived at the HSM ready for a week with the lads, we had booked and paid for all inclusive to make life easier. I will start with the good points... biggest plus was the bar, staff there were friendly and efficient, good range of drinks and shots on the all inclusive! The entertainment was good both day and night. Rooms and bathroom were also nice and comfortable, air con etc was good. Was also a lot of other young people there so everyone's up for a good time.  But...and there are a fair few of them...  Food was shocking, i have never tried to eat anything like it, to say it reminded me of school dinners would be an insult to my school. The pizza and chips i bought at the end of a mental night on the strip one night suddenly tasted like a Michelin Star Restaurant in…

title: Very Nice Hotel
review: Written on behalf of my 19yr old son and mates.After their initial shock of having to change hotels, they were very pleased with the standard of the room- bright, clean, well furnished with good air con. As young lads in a family hotel they were a little worried but all turned out ok but they would not recomment for group of young people as much more suited to families. They really only used the hotel as a base to eat and sleep so cant comment on any of the other facilities. They never made it up in time for breakfast !!! so cant comment on that but they did eat there most evenings, because they were unsure of some dishes they stuck to familiar ones so said it got a little samey by the end of the wk but that overall the quality was good. They said the staff were always friendly…

title: Brilliant hotel!
review: I went with my friend for 7 nights from the 3rd to the 10th of july, the hotel is brilliant one of the best places i have stayed. The reception staff are very friendly and the rooms are excellently clean and fresh and cleaned everyday. The food is very good with a wide variety to cater for a lot of tastes, food is available from the food court or the snack bar with one hour breaks in between. The pool is very clean and there were always sunbeds available before 11am. The cleaners were very friendly and gave you whatever you needed. It is a short walk from the first set of bars and local takeaways open until 6am. There is entertainment on throughout the day and evening and the entertainers are very friendly and like to get everyone involved. No complaints at all and will be…

title: Very clean , fantastic hotel but Spanish guests getting preferential treatment !!
review: The hotel atlantic park is fantastic value for money. To start with, the rooms have a fresh feel to them, are cleaned and changed everyday, have air conditioning, which you are not charged for, a fridge, again something you aren't charged for, and a safe. The safe does cost, but isnt expensive.   The food in the hotel is what you would expect these days in an all inclusive hotel, and there are always plenty of dishes with a few pleasant surprises too. The snack bar by the pool is open during the hours which the restaurant is closed, so you will always be able to get some food no matter what time during the day. It also opens between 9:30 and 10:30 pm. The bar is open from 10am till 12 midnight, and the staff are always friendly and polite. You can only get two drinks at a time…

title: Does what it says on the tin
review: My fiancee and myself stayed here for 10 nights only returning this morning and I would recommend this hotel for couples and parties of people but not for families.  As there are large parties of hen / stag does or large single sex parties the hotel can be a bit loud at times (especially at night)  BUT what I would say is if any problems regarding noise or rowdy parties are reported the hotel deal with them very quickly, on one of the nights above us it was very very noisy this went on until after 1230am, finally I decided to call reception, and they said they would send security within 10 minutes silence, also some of the large groups can get quite boisterous around the pool drinking beer in the water etc but again the hotel staff worked hard at stamping this out although not…

title: Good holiday
review: We were on holiday at the Atlantic Park between 15th to 22nd June my wife and I and a another couple on arrival we were allocated unsuitable rooms,  on complaining to the reception, Margaret spoke to the manager and they changed our rooms to more superior one’s which we appreciated. The food was first class in the restaurant for all of the meals the restaurant staff were polite and helpful. There was a great choice of drinks from behind the bar and the bar staff worked extremely hard at times with a friendly smile towards us. The entertainment staff of Eulises, Fernando, Idelf  and Alex put in 110 percent from morning to night and their enthusiasm in the pool game’s and the shows was great to see. Our party of Paul, Kay, Mark and Sue will be returning in due course to this hotel.

title: Perfect Hotel

Other reviews moan about the staff, but they were good enough considering they are serving hen and stag do's 24/7.  Would definitely return.

review: Too many scousers or "Churchtown Stag Party 2012" as their T Shirts proudly proclaimed. Me and my hubby stayed between 14.06.12 - 21.06.12 and we would not return to this hotel. Foul language was heard throughout out stay.  The food and drink was reasonable. No sun loungers from 8am every day. Pool area was clean. Staff do a good job under the circumstances.   Sick and 'full' condoms found in the lift on a nightly basis. The walls are paper thin and every noise and 'groan' can be heard between rooms.

title: amazing holiday
review: I went to this hotel on 14th - 17th June 2012 for a friends 30th Birthday bash. We had a good time and found the services of the hotel good.  The food in the restaurant was nice every time we went in and the quality of the drinks on the bar was good. The location of the hotel is ideal with a 10 minute walk from the main strip and also the beach. On the negative side the staff at the bar were incredibly rude and the whole hotel was very rowdy as it was full of stags/hens/all male and female groups.  This didn't bother us as we were on a girls holiday but it was not advertised as this so I did feel sorry for the 1 family that were staying at the hotel as the sort of behaviour around the pool during the day was not suitable for young eyes.  Also, there was a shortage of sun beds…

review: Was somewhat amused by the stag with the pink wig/fake plastic breasts/shaved legs last Saturday... a few nights before we saw the saw guy wandering naked from the hotel tennis court to the pool area (appropriately addressed by the Security Gentleman in the orange T-shirt).  I think he was from Stoke.  As addressed elsewhere, if you want a relaxing family holiday with a quiet pool area, three gourmet meals a day and the highest class of 5-star service, don't come anywhere near this hotel.  If however you're a young group / hen party / stag doo, you'll have a right laught and the hotel has everything you need (Wi-Fi for uploading pictures of idiots on facebook, 5 meals a day and flowing all-inclusive alcohol).  One point to be aware of is the angry night porter who sits on…

title: Not sure if I'd go back
review: I spent 4 nights at this hotel in June 2012, and had a fantastic time. I agree with previous posts that families wouldn’t get as much enjoyment from this hotel as young people, but that is representative of Magaluf as a whole. Magaluf has a reputation as being a lively resort with mainly under 30’s, so groups of men and women should surely be expected at most places.  In my opinion you can not ask for much more from the hotel. The hotel looks fairly modern, is well equiped, the staff were very friendly (especially at the reception desk and the guys at the pool bar and snack bar) and are good banter especially if you are friendly to them.   In terms of food and drink, there was plenty of selection. I would only give the food 5/10 in the main restaurant, with the snack bar…

title: Only stay if you are under 30
review: I booked in as a family but it was clear from the off that it really is a place for stag and hen parties. It was very busy with groups and we heard them all night and they were knocking on our door looking for their friends at 5.15am, not good. There was a large variety of food but it was only warm most of the time, my son mainly ate from the pool snack bar. Although there were hardly any other kiddies there the reps certainly made my son welcome and went out of their way to get him involved in activities. I wouldn't choose this hotel again but only on the fact it is not ideal for families. Staff were fantastic and very accomadating.

title: Stag parties

title: Âmzing :o)
review: This is now our 8th stay hêre and its still as fantastic as ever. I have stayed hêre several times with both the family or as a girls holiday. We first stayed here the week the hotel reopened following refurbishment in 2007. Hotel has been maintained to fab standards and still as new and clean. Rooms kept lovely every day and fresh towels too. Alesandro on reception was very friendly and always very helpful :o) Hotel close enough to water park, pirates show and karting and also close enough to walk to magaluf town but not be right in all the main bustle. Look forward to returning again very soon. Book direct with hotel for great deals and only 10% deposit. Balance on arrival which gives more time to save xxx

review: May 17th-2oth 2012 Six adults in 3 rooms. We were greeted by a smiling receptionist who was very efficient in booking us in. Having found our rooms which were very clean, with basic facilities, and beds comfortable. We had a balcony, but unfortunatly, the view was not very good, as the room was at the side. As we arrived at lunch time, we went firstly to the dinning room, which was well laid out, and clean. There was a good selection of dishes, from soup, hot dishes, salads and sweets. Looking round the hotel which was very clean throughout, at every point. The adult pool was of an adequate size, and was surrounded by ample sunbeds, with table and chairs situated a little way back from the poolside. There was a small childs pool and play area, situated away from the main pool…

title: Boys on Tour
review: stayed at the Atlantic park hotel recently on a golfing trip and so far it has been the best.Comfortable,immaculately clean,the food was excellent and the hotel staff where warm and friendly. I would recommend it to anyone.

title: Never a 4 Star
review: Firstly, our party experienced what seems to be a common issue of refusing to issue your room safe key when checking in, then items being stolen on first night whilst you are out. Seems to only happen to groups of guys. Watch out.  The actual hotel on the whole is ok, although certainly not "Pure 4* Luxury" as a previous reviewer had claimed. To look at, it is a typical Spanish concrete monstrosity of a hotel. The rooms look like they have had a refit in the last few years, however my room had a blocked shower drain and split shower hose which meant I could only shower at 30 second intervals before the water would overflow onto the bathroom floor. I reported this to reception on the first and third days of a five night trip, however nothing done. Not a 4 star hotel.  My party…

title: Golfing trip with the lads
review: Stayed at Atlantic Park when playing golf throughout Mallorca and we were all inclusive. Food was great, good choice every night and freshly cooked; people in the hotel were nice as well, very friendly and very helpful. Also rooms were cleaned every day which I had not experienced before so this was especially good for me. Overall, a nice hotel to stay at, people friendly and good food too.

title: UK GUESTS
review: Dear Guests,  thank you for your nice comments and for share your expierences with us. We are glad to know that you liked so much our hotel and specially our staff. We hope to see you again in Hoteles Saint Michel!  With kind regards,  Your  HSM Customer Service

title: DON'T STAY HERE UNLESS YOU LIKE HAVING THINGS STOLEN
review: Just been to this hotel for 11 days, 13 guys,on a golfing holiday, the service , staff,cleanliness,rooms,facilities and food were excellent .The problem was that there were a few "English" idiots there,who really did not respect the 4* rating and the facilities.There was one incident ,where a chap was asleep in reception,all night in a chair, I know I saw him in the morning prior to breakfast,he had sick down his front and they could not wake him up,he was out of his head !!! He apparently accused the staff of stealing his money, as his wallet was found on a chair near by ???? Why didn't he report it to the police and insist on an investigation ???I will stand by this hotel and the staff are honest, they even found some notes that had fallen from my pocket and handed them back…

title: Fun had by all!
review: Stayed here for a long weekend for sisters hen do!! Had a variation of ages and hotel was enjoyed by all. Def worth going all inclusive as if not bar was expensive! Entertainment was a little naff and food very samey, but hotel and rooms where of a high standard!! Would def stay here again!! Was close enough to the main strip so you can walk there but far enough away so you can get a good nights sleep!!

title: Pure 4* luxury
review: We went on a stag do last week - two of the lads had their room robbed, and was punched in the face. I would not recommend this to anyone. Loads of people experienced the same. The hotel could not care less. We think someone on the inside was in on it. DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!

title: Good allrounder
review: I had written in advance requesting a room on the first or second floor, so when I arrived and was greeted by a smiling receptionist informing me they were sorry but could only offer me a room on the third floor, I was not best pleased. And although the room was spotless I didn´t like the view from the back of the hotel overlooking parched mountains and uninteresting buildings. I was lucky enough to speak with Juanjo Cerdo Gost the hotel Director who said to see him the following morning and he´d "See what he could do". True to his word I was moved to room 105 facing the swimming pool. Now I felt I could start my holiday and began by enjoying their quite magnificent Resturant. Breakfast was amazing with so many choices, whilst Lunch again had so much to offer including the Chef…

title: Lovely Hotel, Wrong Place for us!!
review: Had a lovely time at this hotel, great food, clean rooms, lovely pool, entertainment was a bit naff in the evenings, near enough to town for a walk out though, overall nice cheap break

title: Family orientated hotel
review: I went out to Magalluf with 2 mates for a lads holiday, we were originally supposed to be booked into the Don Juan on an all-inclusive deal at it's sister hotel next door but on arrival we got upgraded to the Atlantic Park.  The reception area is quite welcoming and first thing that is apparrent in the cleanliness of the hotel, most of the staff are friendly and are multi-lingual so there isn't such an issue with the language barrier.  However a couple of the bar staff despite my politeness towards them felt a little put out to serve me, but in saying that there were a few rude brits staying at the hotel so maybe I was getting tarred with the same brush.    The rooms in the hotel are large, well furnished and of a decent standard, the rooms were air-conditioned, cleaned every…

title: Brilliant!!!!!!!!
review: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your nice comments. We are glad to know that you liked our hotel and that you have spent a nice time with us. However, we will inform our quality department about all your suggestions. Hope to see you again in Hoteles Saint Michel.  With kind regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Nice hotel
review: It was my first time abroad as i was petrified of flying, this holiday was definately worth  conquering the fear. The room was spotless and cleaned every morning. The staff were most helpful. went all inclusive and there was a wide range of drinks. I wasn't much for the food but i am fussy anyway, it has a great range and if you are a fussy eater they have a huge english food range. The hotel was near to the main strip but far enough away to be out of the hussle and bussle. Entertainment was good, had a snake show one night, wasn't too keen on this. It is a stone throw away from the pirate show and around the corner from the water park. Me and my partner went with two other couples and they stayed in a hotel round the corner and it was shocking, so it was a relief to be staying…

title: a bad hotel
review: Good Hotel was 5 mins away from main strip but not noisy. Hotel was very clean. Staff were very friendly and appreciated if you tried to learn Spanish. Free wi-fi in reception area or 15 euros a week in your room. Our room was large and spacious. Tariq in snack bar was excellent and helpful, snacks were made to order so were fresh.  Bad Bar closes at midnight and you are moved into the hotel and you cannot buy any more drinks. Food was not always hot. Drink was served in 1/2 pints, you could get a pint glass if you paid for the drink! Entertainment was not up to much. Cocktails came out of a machine and tasted alcohol free.  We were there for our wedding anniversary and I contacted the hotel before we left and upon arrival they upgraded us to a pool view room and also gave us a…

title: it was just ok

However, we will inform our quality department about all your suggestions. Hope to see you again in Hoteles Saint Michel.  With kind regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: My holiday here
review: I can see that lots of people wrote some good things about this hotel, but unfortunately this is how i felt my time here. First thing is i have to say is that i did not have all inclusive, only breakfast and dinner were included. The room was spacious and modern, only thing i have to say about it is that i do not understand why they have 2 separate beds in a double room, isn't it obvious that i don't want a gap between me and my wife when i sleep? And besides that, the beds are on wheels and the slide really really easy, one moment you want to reach for your loved one and the next you are at a distance from her.      The staff...well, the only other 4 star hotel that i stayed at was Russell Hotel in London so i don't know if i should compare this one with that, since this one is…
