title: A genuine four star hotel
review: just returned from this hotel after spending 11 nights there,could not fault this hotel,lovely food,hotel kept spotlessly clean,staff always friendly.we are a couple in our 50;s and this hotel caters for 0-80 year olds.superb location,just enough distance away from the magaluf strip,to walk to after having dinner.beaches nearby,again lovely and clean,all inclusive is the best option to take,even if you go out most days like we did the snack bar is open between 3-5 in the afternoon and the chef there serves lovely snacks,picnics available if out all day to collect in the morning.we were a bit dubious about booking at first do to some peoples negative feedback,and the unfriendlyness of the bar staff,this is not the case the bar staff are superb and work long hours,we had a photo…

title: Fab hotel and would definately go back !
review: My wife and I spent a week all inclusive here in September 2011. The first thing that strikes you about The Atlantic Park is that it is a clean modern hotel. On arriving we were checked in by a pleasant young man on reception. Our room was a good size with large twin beds, ample wardrobe space, a balcony, a good size en-suite that included a bath with shower unit, hairdryer, shaving mirror and a full set of towels which were changed every day, and the room had a flat screen t.v. on the wall with a handset. There were about 20 channels to watch, mostly Spanish but there was also BBC World News, Sky News and German Eurosport.  When you go all inclusive on holiday you want to know about the food so let me tell you about The Atlantic Park's catering. Firstly breakfast: As with all…

title: It was the second time in Atlantic Park, next year will be the third
review: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your nice comments. We are glad to know that you have spent a nice time in our hotel and that you liked our good service. See you next time in Hoteles Saint Michel!  With kind regards,  Your  HSM Customer Service

title: Don´t go all-inclusive!
review: Paid to go all inclusive but regretted it. The food is very oily and heavy and always luke warm, never nice and hot. Also it is pretty much the same thing every day. The worst thing is at night when it turns midnight and suddenly all the bar staff close up on the dot and refuse to serve you another drink, even if you had been waiting. I think they enjoyed doing this. It makes you feel very cheap and small. In fact most of the staff we met were really rude and looked like they didn´t want to be there, and seemed to have an attitude of looking down on the guests. The rooms themselves were o.k. and the location o.k. so I would say that if you just booked the hotel and not all inclusive it might be worth it.

title: Animation team is very good !!
review: Negative point: The staff bar is not so hospitable (welcoming?) The food is unlimited but soso, you have to pay extra for drinks (half board)  Good point: The hotel is very clean (room, bed, lights, balcony) and close to the beach (5-10min by walking) We got a beautiful view on the swiming pool Swiming pool is very clean and big The reception staff is good speak english   The Animation team was very fun and activites were good too (water polo, foot, bingo, show...)

title: Mean and dishonest bar staff, making this a 2nd rate hotel.
review: Dear guests,  thank you for your nice comments. We are glad that you liked our hotel and specially our animation team. On the other hand, we will inform about all your suggestions to our quality service department. We hope to see you again in Hoteles Saint Michel!  With kind regards,  Your HSM Customer Service

title: Scary place!
review: This hotel looked promising but sadly was a let down. It has appalling bar staff, some quite rude, others completely dishonest. The 1st night here we were overcharged for our drinks; they grudgingly admitted their 'mistake' and refunded the money, but it created bad feelings rather than an apology as would be normal.. Worse still, we came with a baby and when we asked to get a small cup of drinking water for him (from the large water coolers they have), some bar staff refused to give us it. One man charged us 1 euro for a small cup, others made us buy a very small bottle of water for 1.90 Euro, saying we weren't 'Inclusive' guests so the baby couldn't drink any water from the cooler. It was shameful behaviour, greed at its very worst. It was 30+C temperature and water should be…

title: The Best hotel in Magaluf. Champagne Breakfast. Delicious food. Friendly Staff and brilliant for all ages.
review: Dear Guests,  Thank you for comments. We apologize if some services from the hotel were not exactly what  you have expected. At the moment we have two types of boards, half board (your case) and all inklusive. At the half board the drinks are not included, so that is why the waiters have to charge extra.  We hope you had a nice stay with us despite this litle missunderstanding.  With my best regards,  Your HSM Customer Service

title: A really great Hotel, totally recommend it to any couple or family looking for an excellent value holiday.
review: We stayed at this Hotel between 7 and 14 August, and couldnt find a single fault. We arrived at mid day, were greeted by a friendly receptionist, who spoke excellent English,and allocated a spotlessly clean room, fully equipped with flat screen TV, air con, fridge and comfy beds. The bathroom was spotless, hair dryer, and a shower which delivered hot water at any pressure you wanted. We had an excellent lunch on the first day, which set the tone for the rest of the week,  real choice every day of hot and cold meals to suit everybody. The Hotel caters for special diets, which is not usually the case. The swimming pool is great, the area is cleaned every day, with a Bar serving snacks and drinks. Entertainment was excellent during the day and night. I agree with the comment that…

title: A genuine 4 Star Hotel, the best we have stayed in. First class service, helpful and friendly staff, a real pleasure to stay in.
review: Dear Guests,  Thank you for your nice comments. It is nice to know that you liked so much our hotel and good service located in a quite area. Thank you also for the recommendation and see you again in September!!  With kind regards,  Your HSM Customer Service

title: Absolutely Brilliant Resort
review: We had read the positive reviews, and they were absolutely right. Excellent location, right by the Pirates show, the Hotel was spotless, the room was clean and large enough for 2 adults. We needed a Gluten Free diet, which was immediately available, the first time in Majorca.All in all, this Hotel can be totally recommended, its excellent!

title: Nice hotel with great staff
review: Dear Guests,  thak you for your nice comments. We are glad to know that you liked our hotel and good location. We also are happy to know that the gluten free meals prepared by our restaurant were suitable for you. We hope to see you again in Hoteles Saint Michel!  With kind regards,  Your HSM Customer Service

title: Good value for money
review: The HSM Atlantic Park is close to the beach and night life, but secluded away from the chaos of Magalluf. The service was excellent in the restaurant, bars and main reception.  The entertainment team work hard every day to ensure people participate in the activities which include, aqua aerobics every morning, water polo and football every afternoon and a host of events for the kids each day. There are a number of evening shows that were excellent.  The key for us was a clean hotel and its spotless...The food was excellent with a choice of healthy salads and fresh fruits, pork, steak and chicken with potatoes and veg. Pasta and rice and kids stuff like chips and nuggets.  We went all inclusive with draft lager, red wine, white wine and sangria plus fanta, sprite, coke etc and tea…

title: nice clean hotel
review: just come back from the atlantic hotel stayed one week .the rooms was spottless maids came in every day. the food was nice loads to choose from. staff friendly loads of sunbeds every day the entertainment staff worked hard always came to us every day to involve us in activities. the only thing was we had two cold nights and would have thought they would have opened the bar inside apart from that lovely located hotel n nice and not noisy

title: 'Moscow' revisited
