title: The best entertainment  team - Eulises, Ricardo, Idelli, Baiba!!!
review: This reveiw is from my son, who has just returned an had a great holiday!  After flight from Liverpool, and transunion transfer (had to wait over an hour, as they were late) we arrived at the hotel Don Juan, to be told they were full, and they were moving us to the Atlantic Park. It was literaly 100 yards away next door, so no biggy. Reception at Atlantic park was very friendly and we were checked in efficiantly and they were considerate of our being moved.   Rooms - our room was a triple, even though we only booked a twin; it was spacious, clean and modern, bathroom was large with shower over bath, so best of both worlds. Free electronic safe, plasma tv against wall, bbc news and eurosport were British channels; balcony overlooking pool, table an chairs on balcony. Maids were…

title: Exceeded our expectations in every way possible!!
review: Good morning,  thank you for your nice comments. We are glad to know that you liked our hotel however you have been moved from Hotel HSM Don Juan. We hope to see you again in Hoteles Saint Michel.  With kind regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Could not have picked a better hotel!!
review: I would like to thank all our friends - Baiba, Idelli, Ricardo, Eulises!!!  We had a wonderful vacation in our Atlantic Park along with them! They try to entertain visitors (children and adults) all day and have a great work!  They are very cheerful and energetic, always spend all sorts of games and contests: aqua aerobic, table tennis and billiards competitions, darts, rifle shooting, volleyball and football, dance lessons and much more! After dinner, the guys spend fun mini-disco, and then spend a very interesting game Bingo! And children and adults enjoy spending time with these cool guys from the entertainment team!  We see that they are trying hard and work hard to entertain our campers. Guys - true professionals! We've always been interested in spending time with them! And…

title: We loved it and stayed here for the second time :)
review: I can just recommend this hotel :) It is very good located, in a very calm place. The shops are very near. You can buy there so many different things. You can find there many pubs as well. The beach is very near as well - just 5 minutes far away from the Hotel. There are good connections to other  cities by bus as well . About the hotel : The hotel is very clean, the rooms are cleaned every day. that is very good. The personal is very friendly and helps you with every question or problem. The food was really delicious. So much sorts of all kind of food : delicious cakes, melons, meats, pasta, The bar was oppened every  day from 10am till midnight !!! The waiters were very nice to the guests. We had a great view to the swimming pool. The best was of course the animation (the…

title: best holiday at the altantic park hotel
review: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your nice comments. We are happy to read that you have recomend us, and that you liked so much our good location, restaurant and services. We will be glad to recieve you again next time in Hoteles Saint Michel.  With kind regards,  HSM Customer Service

title: Amazing holiday, Not down to the hotel though
review: This hotel was situated in the quiter end of Magaluff away from all the noisy bars and clubs. Hotel and rooms were very clean.  Staff were very courteous. Our room was very spacious and the majority of rooms overlooked the pool which was lovely to wake up too every morning. the food was supurb, more choices than you could possibly imagine and fantastic quality. the waiter service was excellent and everyone was very polite and professional. they even provided us with a wonderful picnic box to take to the beach with us on request free of charge. we was all inclusive and the all inclusive package was 100% worth the money. couldn't of wished for better food, drinks and service. definately recommend this hotel!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Definetly coming back next year!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your nice comments. It is nice to know that you liked so much our hotel, our good location, our restaurant and good service. And of course we hope to see you next time in Hoteles Saint Michel!  With kind regards,  Your HSM Customer Service

title: Nice Hotel, would stay there again :)
review: This is written on behalf of my freind who does not have an account who travelled with 1 friend (2 Females)  Location  Brilliant - Right in the centre of things  Rooms  Rooms were clean but room we were in were smaller smaller than those with a pool view, the balcony was tiny.  There were adequate amounts of powerpoints. Reception do not show you to the room so we got lost on the way, as the signs  were somewhat misleading. Overall the rooms were ok  Food  We ate chips and soup for ten days because we didnt like the other food. There was a good veriety of food availaible but not to our taste, however we accept that other people may like this.  Drinks  Felt that they were watered down and it took some doing to get drunk!!  It was all locally produced, but this is to be expected…

title: nice hotel but!!!!
review: Hotel is very nice, clean and well looked after. swimmimg pool was clean and there were plenty of sunbeds. Breakfast was great, evening meal not so good. The main problem is the clientel, lots of noise and banging doors all night long, this is not a good hotel if you want to sleep at night.

title: Do not go to this hotel if you would like to sleep during the night
review: Good morning, Thank you for your nice comment. We apologize for the noise, we hope you enjoyed the rest of your holidays. See you next time in Hoteles Saint Michel. With my best regards Your Customer Service

title: SLEEP ANYONE??  ---NO CHANCE!!!!
review: We went to this hotel because it was a 4 star hotel in Magaluf that was supposed to appeal to families and couples wanting a friendly relaxing time just outside of the busy resort. The first night we got there we did not get any sleep from 2.30 am because of large groups of men coming in all night from the local clubs shouting and basically continueing to party in the hotel.  We asked to move room the next day and they did not seem surprised by this.  However, the next 6 nights were no better because every day there were stag and hen parties arriving running up and down the corridors all night screaming and shouting foul language etc.  Even during lunch and dinner we had to listen to all of the foul language and explicit goings on of the night before.  I felt really sorry for…

title: Fantastic 2 weeks AGAIN !
review: Good morning, Thank you for your  comment. We apologize for the noise in our hotel. This hotel did not suit to what you were expecting for your holidays but as you may know we have other hotels in Mallorca, feel free to check our website to find one that could fit with what you like.  Your HSM Customer Service

title: VERY RUDE SNACK CHEF!!
review: When arriving at this hotel I was pleasantly surprised, that it was very nice and attractive from the outside.  Checked in after 10pm to be told that snacks were still available.  Checked into room and was horrified to find my room had NOT been cleaned, rubbish everywhere and beds a mess!!   I was travelling with 3 suitcases a buggy and a 2 year old so it was no that easy to move from room to room especially after having been travelling from early that morning.  Reception told me that they would sort something and to go and get snacks.  I was then horrified to see the behaviour of the Snack Chef!!  Totally unacceptable and rude....  This carried on for the duration of the holiday and made you feel very uneasy and to a point scared to go an egt food!!!!  Then from the next…

title: Great hotel and friendly staff
review: The hotel is very clean and the food is fantastic,, the staff and entertainment crew, Eulises , baiba and idelfi and ricardo are good fun and have lots to do with the guests. The hotel manager John and his crew are very friendly and will do anything to make you feel welcome. The bar staff looked after us very well indeed, especially Jose, every one llooked as though they were enjoing there stay at the hotel.

title: Lovely hotel and I will definitely be back!!
review: Good afternoon,     Thank you for your nice comments. Be sure the staff will know about their great job. See you next time in Hoteles Saint Michel! Your HSM Customer Service

title: very smart hotel
review: A friend and I stayed here at the start of June 2011. I have been to magaluf now 5 times and I will definitely be back to Atlantic Park!!   The rooms are immaculate and the staff throughout the hotel are lovely!! the food was lovely and always plenty to choose from, you definitely won't go hungry!  The location is great too, close enough to the nightlife if you want but also in a nice quiet location so you can sleep peacefully!  Also met other guests and there is a lovely homely feel to the place, hopefully see them all again soon!

title: Fantastic value for money!
review: Good afternoon, Thank you for your nice comments. We are glad to hear about your great holidays and we  hope to see you next year in Hoteles Saint Michel! Your HSM Customer Service

title: All Inclusive - but you have to pay for that Sir...
review: great place to stay just outside the centre of magaluf, but close enough to walk .went with my son and 4 friends i asked for a lower floor and got it had a great time, would go back again rooms were spotless, staff polite but food at times could be a little bit too cold but that was the only downside.

title: WILL NOT BE GOING BACK
review: On first impressions I thought the hotel was lovely.  We booked for a week All Inclusive.  As we were a group of 24 ranging from 18yrs through to 70yrs I thought check in would be a nightmare, but it was great.  Lovely man on reception (tall, stocky with a beard, didn't get his name) and he was very helpful and polite at all times.  The rooms were spotless, but never cleaned during our stay, towels were changed and beds made only)  The food, well, where do I start?  I am not a fussy eater and enjoy most foods, but what I will say is that I like my food hot and cooked !  Everything was cold, even the water to make coffee and tea!! After 2 days, I never went for breakfast, would rather wait till dinner and eat out.  After 4 days I did not touch very much in the restaurant.  The…

title: Great value for money!!
review: Dear Karen,  Thank you for your comments.  We apologize if the quality of the food was not what you expected, also our entertainmet. We will inform the peson who is in charge about it.  Your HSM Customer Service

title: excellent all round hotel
review: 13 of us stayed here for a birthday weekend, pleasantly surprised when we checked in, lovely airy reception, all inclusive bands on right away and off we went for a beer. All staff very friendly and efficient, food more than adequate but would imagine if you were staying for a fortnight you might want to eat out a couple of times. There were 4 stag parties there during our stay who provided great entertainment before they went out to the 'strip' at night. Was a bit worried about noise at night but can honestly say we never heard a thing...unless they just weren't home yet by the time we got up!! Good location, just round from the Pirates show and a nice stroll into town and the beach. Great singing and dancing in the Piano Bar at the roundabout 5 mins from hotel. All in all we…

title: no better way to relax and enjoy your holidays
review: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your nice comments. We are glad yo know that our Staff has treat you so well and that you have had a fantastic time with us.  See you next time in Hoteles Saint Michel!   Your HSM Customer Service

title: Lovely hotel, recommend
review: This hotel is situated in a perfect location on the edge of resort therefore no disturbance at night.  All rooms are very spacious, well maintained and kept very clean. Food is available in great supply and is varied but all of a very high standard.  Hotel staff from Manager to room cleaners are all very friendly and helpfull.  Have stayed in this hotel a couple of times and can not wait to return again. Hotel entertainment is available during the day and in the evenings, again the staff are excellent. Can not find fault with any staff or facilities.

title: Adequate
review: I have recently returned from a week at the Atlantic Park Hotel, Magaluf. I checked in at around 5am on the Sunday morning & also got a room safe key (20 Euros- 5 euros refundable), i was given a single room on the top 9th floor. The view i got wasn't great & overlooked the back of the hotel out onto the side street & was obviously very high up, a pigeon had also taken up residence on the balcony & had left a number of deposits dotted around! The room itself was ok, although a little cramped with a single bed on wheels which almost collapsed at on point during the week! The shower was good but the shower curtain/guide didnt go all the way across the side of the bath & so to avoid 'The Poseidon Adventure' every time i used it towels had to be placed on the floor! Breakfast…

title: GREAT HOLIDAY
review: Just got back after yet another great week, already been for 2 weeks in June this year, this is now our 10th visit over the last 4years .As you can imagine , we LOVE it there.Once the staff know you and you treat them as equals, they are wonderful, don't forget they have a job to do and rules to stick by, so chill and enjoy your holiday.Food variety excellent, drinks great ,now got English cider on draft.Very clean, very helpful, will see you next year .

title: shame about the food
review: We booked the half board option, which puts you in rooms overlooking a desolate car park but does mean you do not feel you have to suffer the restaurant more than twice a day (pity the all inclusives). The food is a selection of overcooked meats in what seems like a similar slurry for each dish served, luke warm at best. the staff are miserable but efficient at their work (mostly clearing three quarter full plates of food to the bins). On the plus side, the hotel is clean and the pool area is a pleasant place to be during the day. The hotel is an easy walk to the beach (10 minutes) or to the centre of magaluf in similar time.     Robert's Summary

title: fabulous
review: My family and I arrived late at the hotel because we had a late flight.  We had missed our dinner and we were hungry.  To our surprise, on arrival the reception staff said we could leave our suitcases in reception because they had prepared us a meal in the dining room. We went finished supper and took our suitcases up to our rooms.  We were pleased with our rooms which were very clean and remained clean all week.   The hotel was very well maintained and cleaned every day.  This is a 4* star hotel and it does live up to a 4*.  The hotel was in a close location to the beach, bars, shops and bus stops around 10 min walk for quite quick walkers.  The hotel does not allow for noise after 12am which is also good and everybody outside has to go in the hotel or go out to a different…

title: The hotel was "ok"
review: For 60 EU a night, and breakfast and diner included, the price was ok. The hotel was clean and the staff was extra friendly, I would recommend it, but don't expect to be indulged in luxury . :)

title: august 2010
review: Hotel Atlantic park is in good location to our opinion because he was just in 5 minutes from beach and 10 from main street. Hotel is average,room is smal but clean,the balcony overlooked the hills. Pool – Very nice. Breakfast and dining area is nice.Same food is over and over again.The bred,pizza,ice cream and same other things are very fresh and tasty.Hotel no have room service,market,clock on the reception,need more staff and entertainment.

title: A great base (not for food lovers).
review: We are a couple in our early 30’s.  Room - the room was all that we needed.  Clean and practical.  Most of the rooms overlook the pool with balcony.  Small flat screen TV which had BBC news (no other English channels).   Pool – Very nice.     Food – ok where to start, the main restaurant is ok.  The food is quite bland and repetitive.  We were all inclusive for a week and ended up eating out for the last 3 nights. There is a great Indian on the sea front which we reccmend!  The snack bar only served fried food, again repetitive.   Location – In a quiet area but with a 10min walk to Magaluf (bars) and the beach.   Lifts – We spent ages waiting for the lift and often walked up and down the stairs.    Bar – The bar staff often served the Spanish guests first s which got very…

title: WOW, definately worth a visit
review: What a great location, beside the Pirate show (which is a must go see) and a couple of minutes walk from the magalluf strip and beach. It is also close to the Western waterpark which is another great day out. I really liked the Atlantic park as soon as I walked into it nice and white lobby with loads of staff at the reception desk so I didn’t have to wait to be seen to. I found out the hotel was just decorated in the last couple of years which shows with white everywhere and a modern dining room.   The pool was great! Loads of space in the pool and around with lots of sun loungers.  When I was there I had a walk around the sports areas and saw some different classes for the teenagers including a target practice class which looked so fun!  The room I was in was huge, water…

title: Oh my God it's a pigs head
review: I don't know how this rates 4*. Food was terrible. Location right opposite Pirates and away from 'Strip' was nice. TV  in room rubbish had to go out to World Cup and Wimbledon meaning we'd booked All In but spent same amount as holiday (£700+ each for 14 nights)  eating and drinking out. Rooms adequate and AirCon - not ready when we arrived. Pool same size as a large puddle (not very big). What makes this 4*? My FB profile is of me with a pigs head found on my plate at dinner - actually, ironically, best meal of the fortnight. We have had same or better amenities at 3* and 2*. Mano's Place good laugh, BCM Square for Football, manic. Cleanliness ok Service ok. Stags and Hens over weekends not best suited to kids. Maybe should be adult only with a Chef. Hottest thing in restaurant…

title: Brilliant location, ideal for groups 3.5 out of 5
review: I travelled with my fiance his brother and my best friend. We paid £430 each for a week all inclusive for 2 rooms.  The quality of your stay will depend on the other hotel guests!  Positive - Fantastic location, within walking distance to the waterpark, beach, local pubs, main strip and clubs.  Very clean and tidy rooms.  Fridge in room.  If you don't want the madness of the main strip the local pubs within 5 mins walk have dance floors, pool tables and decent music.  You cannot hear other entertainment from this hotel.  Average - We all found the food to be ok, plenty of fruit, different meat on the grill each night (steak, pork, chicken, lamb chops), different potato offered (roast, jacket, chips, mash), plenty of veg, pasta, rice and fish. Fruit, cakes, icecream for dessert. …

title: HOTEL OK, BUT WOULD NOT TAKE MY FAMILY THERE
review: I have just returned from the Atlantic Park Hotel.  Been for 3 nights with girlfriends to celebrate our 40th birthdays.  On arrival at reception our room was not ready and we had been up for over 24 hours.  We were promised our room at 2pm but it still wasn't ready and we finally got it at tea time - not impressed.  The room itself was spotless and quite modern.  If it had had 3 beds you would not have been able to move, so be warned if you need an extra bed.  Food was edible but it was the same thing day in day out.  Thankfully we were only there for 3 nights.  I couldn't have stood it for a week.  The salads were the best bit.  The deserts were rubbish and the whole thing could have had far more choice.  The pool area was OK but I thought it was extremely untidy.  Most days…

title: Excellent vaule for money
review: We have stayed at Atlantic park for the past 3 years and are returning again in july 2010. Atlantic park is an excelent hotel in an excellent location. Food is excellent and a great choice in restaurant, snack bar is also good. There are plenty of activities every day to suit everyone and all the staff are very friendly. The bar staff can seem a little grumpy but if your pleasent with them they will be pleasent with you. Rooms are clean and tidy as is the whole of the hotel. The location of the hotel is fantastic as it is about a 5 -10 min walk from the main strip of magaluf which means its quiet at night. As with any other hotel in magaluf you will experience some noise from people returning in the early hours so if someone is looking for a quite week away don't go to magaluf.

title: excellent hotel
review: we stopped for a week and really enjoyed our stay.Could't get kids out of the pool.Childrens pool very good.Staff very friendly.Only problem was a few ants in room but was sorted out as soon as staff was informed.

title: Ok but nothing amazing
review: My boyfriend and i arrived at the Atlantic park hotel on the 11th June 2010. We were given a room on the 7th floor which hadnt been cleaned. There were fag butts in an ash tray on a table on the balcony and a towel in the bath, we had been traveling for around 19 hours and were very tired. We were then offered a room on the 9th floor over looking a road with out a tv, my boyfriend rang reception and a man came up to explain why there wasnt a tv in the room. I was unhappy (and started to cry) they decided to move us again to a much nicer room over looking the pool. It was a nice holiday but if i am honest i wouldnt go back again. Tons and tons of hen and stag parties and if you like England flags hung over the balcony then this is the hotel for you.

title: Stag and Hen doos
review: Two adults one child 12y,we went all inclusive and they do half board as well. hotel is clean and tidy, staff are friendly, same food over and over again , most of it is cold although there is a micro-wave, the only thing that we could not put up with was all the stag and hen partys most of who were disgusting,noisy ,and foul-mouthed and some of these are people in their 30s and 40s, a little tip if you go h/b go to the pool side snack bar at lunch time because they dont check for A I bands so you get free lunch. a plus is Pirates show place is right across the road from the hotel, and there is a water park 300 mtrs away  which opened the day we came home. the entertainment team although they try hard are not very good, we tended to make our own entertainment by people watching.…

title: food crap, cheaply branded drinks which were ok but made you ill-but the pool was nice, hotel was generally nice
review: for the price you cant really complain, we had a bargain all inclusive, so overall it was ok. the  only thing that really let it down was the food, which eating 3 meals a day from the buffet for 6days was awful, it was tasteless or salty, and the meat you just didnt recognise as it was weird cuts. we were all living off salad by the middle of the week, and takeaways at the end of the week, which we werent expecting to spend our money on!  The drinks were good, there was a wide range, although again by the end of the week we were buying bottles of alcohol from the shops and bringing it back to the hotel because the bar drinks made us all ill in various ways, not sure if this was down to the cheap brands or quality of the fizzy drinks etc. And so as much as we wanted to drink our…

title: hotel nice shame about the food
review: just got back from the atlantic not a bad hotel but be aware that u will have 2 take more money with u 2 eat out as the food is really awfull

title: excellent choice of hotel
review: Stayed at the Atlantic park with a group of 8, age group ranging from 18 to 49. The hotel is spotlessly clean. The rooms are well decorated and have aircon, hairdryer and a fridge. Every area was constantly being cleaned. The food was of excellent quality although  the same sort of things most days, it did vary. The snack bar at the pool does an excellent burger. And there are free ice lollies available at the pool bar on request.  It is litrally a 10 minute walk to the main strip /beach.  The staff were really welcoming and helpful with any problems that arose. I have been to other all inclusive hotels in Spain, and found that the drinks were low quality or watered down. This was not the case at the Atlantic Park. There were hen parties/ stag parties and families staying at the…

title: Pity about the food
review: We have just returned from a week's stay in this hotel and we were very dissappointed in the food .First of all the selection was very limited all the meats and chicken were either tough fatty or tasteless which suggest they were using very poor quality cuts.All the fish was full of bones,and everything on the "hot Buffet menu" was stone cold luckily they had two microwaves so you were able to heat things up.We went out ot eat for lunch and dinner after the third day as we decided to try their lunch which turned out to be exactly the same as dinner,pity if you were all inclusive luckily we were only half board.The rooms however were clean and comfortable but the air conditioning gave out a terrible smell at times. The staff on the whole were friendly and helpful but please be…

title: Amazing hotel - ignore the whingers
review: We stayed here in June 2009 on our HONEYMOON and had an amazing time.  The hotel is perfectly located, away from the noise of Magalluf town but close enough to walk there...if you can make it after using the all inclusive facilities. We found everywhere in the hotel to be spotless from the bedrooms to the reception to the pool to the pool bar and restaurant. There were plenty of sunbeds and the staff were very friendly. The snack bar is amazing, we arrived just after breakfast had finished so our first meal was a cheese toastie and chips which was freshly made. The snack bar chef who I believe was also one of the main chefs cooking in the restaurant would do just about anything. If you want triple hamburger and chips he'll do you triple hamburger and chips freshly cooked to…

title: Great hollidays
review: an excellent week of hollidays in hsm atlantic park great food great drinks lol great beach great pool great staff ,me and my wife loved it .an special thanks to bruno of caminha -portugal thank you for everything

title: Worst hotel in 10 visits to Majorca
review: Just got back from 10 days staying at this hotel. This hotel is in no way a 4 Star hotel. We went AI however ended up eating out for breakfast and dinner on most days. The food was appaling. The staff from the manager down to the waiters were a waste of time. The majority of the guests were Spanish and they got priority on everything. On one of the evenings we ate in the restaraunt the hotel manager had a table reserved for him and his family. As well as getting various drinks that were not offered to the paying guests his table was looked after by 3 of the restaraunt staff resulting in paying guests having to clear thier own tables. It was an absolute joke. There are also 2 grades of AI packages which we only found out about when we got there. We were on the basic and all of…

title: BACK AGAIN, EVEN BETTER.
review: Yes ,back again so soon, June was that good , we came back in July, and it was even better, all the staff remembered us, and were even more friendly and helpful.Why go anywhere else , I have booke up again for September. Even the bombs didn't put us off, if it's your time , he will get you where ever you are ha ! Special champagne for our birthday treat . food excellent, choice magnificent. Weather brilliant, golf not so good , need more practice . Try it and tell me I am wrong. Peter .

title: Hotel is spotless, food great and so glad it is not in centre of magaluf
review: Booked online last minute to celebrate 25th wedding anniversary. Hotel is lovely definitely 4*. Most of clientele are spanish and french which put us off at first, however after a walk into Magaluf we were very glad to get back to its tranquil surroundings. Magaluff town is made up of sleezy clubs and not a place we would care to return to. It is very "English"..not many from Ireland, north or south!! The only grumble we had about the hotel was that Spanish all inclusive guests were given drinks from top shelf ie Smirnoff, Baileys,Gordons gin etc while we had to make do with the local brands and beakers of water as opposed to bottled! The food wes excellent and everywhere spotlessly clean. Entertainment was ok for 1 week could not have listened to it for another week, Everything…

title: A great place to go first class my thanks to all the staff in the hotel CHEERS
review: Iv gust got back from a week in the atlantic  park  with all my brothers we have been there 9 times and have never found any thing wrong with the hotel at all and I cant wait to go back next year .so don't take any notice of all the moaners give it a go trust me you wont be disappointed PS thanks again to all the staff for making the holiday  so enjoyable see ya next year PS the drinks are on me

title: Great Majorca hotel!!
review: A great hotel in Magaluff. Clean, great pool, good food. location is brill, walk to everything!

title: Bad reviews??.. Why??
review: I have read some of the reviews that says that the staff was rude, the food was bad and a lot of other negative things! I have no complains what so ever.. I went there with my mom, my son and my husband and we all had a blast! My son was going to the "Mini Club" every day, and he is usually really shy but the three staff members of entertainment made it easy for him to have a great staying. The three of us grown-ups could easily lay back and be safe that they were looking out for him while we relaxed at/in the pool.. I think it was the other guests that made the staying a little complicated. About 15-20 young guys from England were drunk all the time and yelled from one balcony to the other, and made scenes every night at the bar! The entertainment staff tried to get all of us…

title: Lovely clean hotel not quite 4* standard but close...
review: Me & my Husband have just got back from our 3 night break to Maguluf to celebrate our 2nd anniversary. We went last year & stayed a different hotel but wanted all inclusive this year and as Atlantic park was only 4* offering all inclusive we booked up. To be honest, we we're going mainly for the amazing Magaluf night life & wouldn't have minded where we stopped, a nice hotel was just a added bonus!!  We thought the hotel was rather expensive for the 3 nights but knew with being all inclusive we'd get money's worth by being able to make use of the free drinks up till midnight then go out......only problem when we was there was the wine was horrible (&this is what I like to drink with a evening meal) and the evening entertainment was sooooo boring that we never ended up staying in…

title: Its Magalluf! Typical 4* Spanish Hotel
review: There are a few negative comments that say the hotel is loud and service isn't great.....but it is magalluf. Magalluf + party and clubbing = some noise. As for the service....you could have alot worse in magalluf! The staff were like angels compared with some of the bar's staff!   This is a hotel with 4* elements like WI-FI in the reception.... so take your laptops! Power showers - first for us in spain! Snack bar in-between meals - Great for All-Inclusive - This is a must all inclusive hotel! Fridge in the room....great for keeping your cold bottle of water for those heated night and day experiences. LCD 19/22 inch in size......and wall mounted......ooooooooo aaaaaaaaah! On a more serious note.... food cooked in full view behind service counters. Very fresh food hot and cold.…

title: Never Again!!
review: I must admit the rooms were nice but nothing else, food rubbish, entertainment I could'nt even comment would rather watch paint dry!! The reviews are correct about the food and the noise. We had to use the microwave which I think is probably provided for guests who require baby milk, my husband even had to heat up his cup of tea which came out of a machine!!! FOOD AND DRINK - Overcooked Chicken!, Fatty Pork, Cold undercooked chips, Uncooked hard potatoes, Pizza uncooked, Pasta sauce a BOWL OF RED STUFF WITH OIL ON TOP! disgusting, the same thing every night disgusting - the Spanish luv it but to us they were eating anything! Staff never smile and the bar staff asked to check my all -inc armband after I had already been there for 4 days! They do not look happy  NOISE - The Walls…

title: WOULD NOT ADVISE IT
review: just returned from a 2 week h/board at the atlantic park magaluf. it was the worst we have had food always cold not much of a choice rude staff, the all inclusive brigade noise and language was terrible the noise at night was unbearable at times shouting banging in the early hours police been called. it was more like a good run 2 star certainly not a 4 star, the cleaning was basic, rooms and corridors, we had to ph reception a few times for towels as cleaner failed to show, this was before we went out to eat. the best thing was when we left, never again

title: Nice Hotel
review: We are very sorry to have this kind of report  with I cannot agree. We work with an external company called Equtel to evaluate our clients’ satisfaction and so far we have got very good results. We offer a huge choice of food which you can choose among, and also we have to keep a very high level of food quality since we have been awarded with a Quality Stamp, for what we must keep it up in order not to loose this acknowledgement.   About the noise at night we are very strict. When some clients are misbehaving we try to warn them to keep it down, otherwise we are forced to work together with the travel agency to realocate them in others Hotels.  Towels are changed when clients leave them on the floor as we try to be respectful with the environment, another recgnition by our Tourism Government.   Once more we apologise for not having satisfied your needs but I think that is just a very subjective opinion.

title: Good value for money well worth a visit
review: Just came back from staying at the Atlantic Park- magalluf, the hotel its self was lovely, but we were given the key to our room whilst people were still in there, ther people on the reception spoke limited English so that became a problem. The food was ok but very repetative and for peole who dont eat meat there is not alot of choice but pasta, chips and salad, but the sweets were nice. The entertainment was good, but loud if you want an early night. The maid service was very good, beds were remade every day and towels were changed every day.  Overall not a bad experiance but expected a little more from a 4 star.

title: Great family hotel
review: Just returned from staying at Atlantic Park all inclusive for 1 week with family & friends.  Large, spacious, exceptionally clean bedrooms.  Whole hotel including pool area, bar & restaurant all well decorated & again very clean.  All inclusive food as you would expect, bit repetitive but you certainly won't starve, snack bar at the pool doesn't open for long though.  Ideally situated just on the edge of Magalluf, so away from all the constant noise, but only a 10 minute walk to lovely sandy beach, 10 minute stagger to BCM Square & the main Strip!  The walls in the hotel room can be a little thin at times but if you're going to complain about noise.....don't go to Magalluf in the first place!  Well situated near plenty of places to eat if you choose not to do the all inclusive. …

title: We enjoyed it
review: Liked: food (varied buffet style), entertainment programme, room, swimming pool, location (close to beaches and shops)  Disliked:  from the outside the hotel looks a bit like a concrete jungle, but don’t let this put you off  Would recommend to: couples, families (great entertainment for children), singles and anyone who enjoys golf  Price:  4 * all inclusive, saved nearly half by booking through Ola Holidays online and not the local shop, well worth the money

title: Nice Hotel But.......
review: Booked hotel in august 2008, from alpharoom.com i recieved all the paperwork and taxi transfer.Taxi arrived o.k, got to hotel, no rooms available, no notification from alpharooms, but they would put us in the hotel next door,real dingy place, but we were tiered and needing our beds,would sort it out in the morning. Went back to atlantic park in the morning still they had no paper workbut would give us a room then sort it out monday, but we found that others had the same problem. The hotel its self was nice but bar staff were absolutly rude!! I couldnt believe the stinking attitudes they had! Entertainment was not up to much if i wanted to play bingo or quiz night i would have stayed in England and went to the local pub. Food was nice but the snack wasnt up to much either didnt…

title: OK for A Base!
review: We stayed 30/08-06/09 All Inclusive. Four of us all in our early 20s.  Hotel was clean and nice rooms, good aircon, clean and modern.  Food wasnt the best on all inclusives weve had- often repeats of leftovers, we ate out twice,  entertainment was rather rubbish- we used the hotel all inclusive bar till midnight then went out then.   Some staff we happy and friendly and the others were just rude! We were always polite but sometimes didnt get the same response.   Lots of spanish stay at hotel!  Good location- right next to pirates and waterparks- near to a park and few shops around.. 5-10 mins walk into BcM square and another 5 to the strip which was awesome!  Any questions just ask.

title: Really a good 3 star, repetitive buffett
review: I stayed in this hotel 27 July- 3rd August (7days) Half Board  Ok, this hotel is really a 3 star, only could you take it as a 4 for only a couple of things:-  Good:-  nice heated pool everyday maid service clean hotel (no bugs) clean rooms acceptable air con pool view rooms large selection from buffett location right near the 2 water parks, pirates show and go karting no outside noise (away from main resort) fridge in room  Litlle moans:-  Repetitive food buffett (large selection but only slightly changed after 4-5 days. Just got bored, get a night out at a restaurant sometimes. Some food looked undercooked, but had no stomach problems (just check some of the meat) Some staff miserable, some staff smiling?? Half Board evening meal drinks charge (you will pay 4 euros for…

title: very good
review: i just stayed in this hotel for a week and thought it was very good.  There isnt really anything i can say that was bad about it at all, people are right that sometimes the food isnt always really hot but it is if you catch it just as its come out of the kitchen it is and most of the time its fine anyway.  Some of the entertainment in the evening wasnt great but there are all the bars about a 5 minute walk away so its no problem if you dont want to see the shows. However the entertainment staff were very good (especially Sushu) who allways talked to everyone and did alot of activites through the day.  I think this hotel is for all ages and i would say it was about 9 out of 10 overall

title: excellent hotel
review: Me and my girlfriend both stayed at atlantic park hotel on 5 june 2008 for a week, we booked the holiday on teletext holidays and paid £340 for a week all inclusive. It was a very clean fresh hotel it was renovated a year ago apparently. The room was very nice and clean with a fridge even tho we were all inclusive. The pool area was big enough and the pool was very clean and nice. I read reviews before i went and alot of ppl were saying the staff are rude, i never saw this once. The food was brilliant we ate at the hotel every nite im a fussy eater but i liked sumthing everyday. The hotel is about a 10 min walk to the center of magaluf, pirates show is just over the road and a go-kart track and aqua park are very close. The only problem with the whole holiday was the transfers…

title: Not 4*
review: After staying at a 4* hotel in Lanzarote this hotel should only be a 3* at the most.  The food was the same every evening and only ever luke warm.  The reception staff & restaurant greeter were very friendly & helpful but the pool bar staff were near on rude.  The entertainment was a joke along with the sun beds which were mainly broken, clean towels every day but cleaning not brilliant I don't think our balcony was swept in 10 days.  I have stayed in many hotels in Magaluf but I will not be returning to this one, try Majorca Beach great all round hotel and only a 3*

title: Really Good hotel
review: The hotel overall was really good, im 19 and my bf 20 but there was many differnt age groups at the hotel , from groups of teenagers- to families with young children.  *The rooms were really clean and maids came daily * The food was overall good, even though alot of the food is caterd towards germans, there is still a good selection of pasta,pizza,chips,veg,salads,meats * The hotel also has a spar shop and loads of bars near it, its about a ten minute walk through magaluff to the beach and there are plenty of restuarants etc about 2-5 minute walk away, Bcm nightclub and the main strip are about a ten minute walk away.  -The only bad things about the hotel is the bar staff are a bit moody and seem to be alot friendly towards spanish guests rather than english, - The night time…

title: Make your mind up.....
review: A strange one here.  Hotel markets itself as family, couples etc etc, however, a LOT of male or female only groups.  We booked on all inclusive basis, 2 adults, 1 child of 4.5yrs.  Food 6/10 Lots of choice, tended to be veal, pork, chicken, fish - one time we got served up a barely cooked chicken breast, not nice.  Pizza poor, and by the end the chips even were horrible.  Plenty of cold meat, cheese, bread etc etc which I will be honest was all I ate near the end of the trip.  Plenty wine, beer, fanta etc etc on tap to help yourself with.  Pool Never went in large pool, looked great though.  Kids pool adequate, only small thing was litter getting blown in and no one fishing it out.  Kids Club A new girl Terri started about 3 or 4 days into our trip, she was excellent, and a good…

title: Noisy but nice
review: The hotel was very clean and fresh and rooms cleaned daily. There was plenty of sun-loungers for everyone outside and good poolside facilities (bar, toilets, showers etc)  My one complaint was the noise in the hotel. We found we were woken EVERY night by groups of young lads and girls returning between 2am-5am. I suppose some would say "it's Magaluf what do you expect" but we had hoped that as the hotel is a little out of the centre and aimed towards golfing trips, that it would be quiet. To be fair to the hotel we didnt complain so perhaps they would have taken action had we done so - but on one occasion the noise was coming from the lobby for about 45mins at 4am and nothing seemed to be done to stop it.  The food was very nice and plenty to choose from. Desserts were decidely…

title: value for money
review: I stayed in this hotel when I was a student, some of the reviews are true it is very outdated!however it was clean, the service was good and the food was typical 3 star basic but nice. Also considering it is in Magaluf it was not full groups, hens, stag etc and if you wanted an early night it was quiet enough. However there was no air con in my room and its too hot to beathe so take a fan.

title: Great Holiday
review: Im 26 years old my partner is 36 years old my baby son was 13months at the time. My grandparents also came along both in their 60's. And we all enjoyed our 2week stay.  Hotel overall was fab. We did not have any problems with any of the staff they were well mannered and very friendly ecspecially the one with the curley hair and glasses.  Reception area and lounge very nice and relaxing, pool area fab with plenty of sun loungers and tables etc. Restaurant very nice food was lovely plenty of choice, bar staff happy and served quickly.  Rooms spacious cleaned every day maids very friendly too.  Entertainment was good no compaints from me every night there was something different to entertain us.  Location of hotel very good just 5/10 minute SLOW walk to town and beach.  Just booked…

title: Don't listen to all these people !!
review: Went here with my mate 4 years ago 3 weeks before we were going to start university. We booked it the day before we were about to leave. The hotel itself is opposite Pirates (which I strongly recommend, wicked night out!) and about a 10 min walk to the main bars of Maga!  It is a large hotel, and the pool area does get busy, so get down there quick, but the rooms are clean and spacious and they all over look the pool. For young clubbers this is the perfect hotel, you can't hear the humdrum of Bar Street when you are trying to get to sleep, and it is near the beach - we found a short cut. If you come out of the hotel turn right across the car park there is a small alley way that takes you directly on the beach! Food: Ok when I was 18 I was pretty fussy so didn't rate the food at…

title: Don't Manolo  (I'd expect better conditions in a brothel)
review: DONT EVEN GIVE IT THE BENEFIT OF THE DOUBT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'M DONT HAVE HIGH STANDARDS. I JUST EXPECT IT  2B CLEAN! Oh my god. How can any1 justify this place. I am only writing this reveiw 2 save any1 from going through this hellhole unnneccessarily. I checked the hotels webpage B4 going which was completely misleading. I wish that i'd seen this website 1st. On arrival, i 1st went in2 the toilets at the side of the reception wot a mess (JUST SEE MY PHOTOS). I then got into the flooded lift which was dark with wires hanging out. Then i passed all the overflowing bins on the way to my room. My room was absolutely discusting. the doors and the floor were all sticky, my bedding was full of fag burns & dirty stains (if u know wot i mean? so i had 2 cover them with my own beach…

title: Very Good 4* Hotel
review: I have to say we stayed in this hotel at the same time as the previous writer; we were 4 adults and one baby staying for a week. Hotel is very clean and modern, rooms had modern wood floors, LCD TV, fridge and up to date fitted bathroom, carpeted corridors and staircase, so no noise from late arrivals. Dinning room was spotless with a good choice of food, however we all get a little bored of eating in the hotel every evening, so go out a few times and treat yourselves. Bar drinks are not so good! That’s if you like brand name booze, A.I. drinks are local spirits only and you have to pay for the top brand names.  Snack bar is just what you’d expect with hot dogs and the usual snacks, coffee from the bar day and night, evening entertainment not so good, swimming pool average size…

title: THIS IS NOT A 4**** 2**and thats been kind  its crap
review: Reception very clean modern staff polite ,bedrooms clean if abit small. would not give this hotel 4**** only 2**for the following reasons. bar staff very rude &ignorant one person especialy ,you can have twenty people waiting at the bar and the barman with the currly hair &glasses will call spanish people to the front and serve them first(if you dont like english remember we pay your wages) snack bar very poor stale buns&biscuits )when getting served at bar it is only 2drinks served at a time regardless if theres five of yu in the group . OLYMPIC SIZE swimming pool thats a joke weve got a bigger garden pond!! restaurant  food only luke warm  menu is virtually the same every day deserts very poor choice & if you have ababy or young children then you wont find anything for them to…

title: Don Manolo
review: Me and my friends all booked a last minute deal and we couldnt wait to arrive. On arriving it seemed not to bad. Our rooms were clean enough but the food was awful everything tasted the same breakfast lunch and dinner. What was last nights dinner became the next mornings breakfast! Apart from the food we enjoyed our stay in the Don Manolo that was until we returned one night to find someone had been in our room and even had a wee in our toilet (without flushing)!! We reported this to the reception to make it even worse they said it was the police who had been in our room! Obviously we got what we paid for. Apart from this our holiday was fantastic definitely recommend magaluf just maybe not the Don Manolo!!

title: Fantasic Holiday
review: Had a fantasic time here.  had no problems with the staff being moody, had a laugh with a few of them, although they all have individual rules about drink limts. One say 2 drinks the others dont care, someone else will say max of 3. If you can get the younger ones to serve you they'll give you how ever many drinks you want.  The food was lovely, a bit repeative but you would never starve.   the only downside for me was that i think the whole of the hotels sewage system flowed through my room at one point or another, my friends room was fine.  Situated out of the main town so at night at least it's quiet and you could get some sleep. The strip is about a 10 min walk but stop off at manos on the way there, lovely guys there and you should try their cocktails.  I wouldn't suggest…

title: Good Holiday all round!
review: My friend and I stayed here Half Board in June for 10 days and overall had a really good holiday!   We'd read a few reviews that the staff weren't very friendly, and to be fair they could have been a bit nicer!  The restaurant manager was a bit rude on occassions and some of the waitresses were a bit miserable too. The reception staff weren't the best either...their english wasn't amazing and they moaned when we wanted to leave the key behind the desk (not entirely sure why!?)    The hotel had just had a refurb so our room was really nice, in particular the bathroom. We can't fault the cleaners either...the room was always spotless when we came home (and I'm ashamed to say we were quite messy so they did a sterling job!)  The location wasn't bad...it was a bit of a walk to the…

title: Loved it!!
review: Spent a week at the atlantic park (10th july-17th july) with 4 friends. Had an awsome time, rooms were very nice and clean, cleaner came in and changed towels everyday, but make sure you put them in the bath. Food was a little repetative but was nice, so was the snack bar. More than enough room around the pool to relax. A 10 min walk to all the bar's and club's. Would deff recomend atlantic park, im going back next year for 2 week's.

title: Appalling Hotel for young adults or party types.
review: THIS HOTEL IS AN EXTREMELY POOR CHOICE IF YOU ARE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING:  1) YOUNG ADULTS LOOKING FOR AN EXCITING HOLIDAY IN A LIVELY HOTEL 2) THINKING OF GOING ALL INCLUSIVE TO SAVE MONEY ON FOOD AND DRINK 3) EXPECTING TO SHARE A ROOM WITH MORE THAN TWO PEOPLE  This hotel is the worst I have ever been to for a large number of reasons of which i will attempt to highlight  some for you so that you will not have your holiday spoilt as was ours.  Firstly the number of people (mainly groups of young adults) that was kicked from the hotel whilst we were there was simply unbelievable, we oursevles a group of lads (23,24 and 28) were asked to leave the hotel without any prior warnings within the hour or the cops would come, this was in broken english and the manager was very…

title: dont take every review into account til you have read mine
review: we stayed at hotel 3/8 til 18/8 taxi didnt know where hotel was, took us right into torenova, i nearly had a fit, this was about 1in the morning, my daughter was 11... this was an eye opener for her!!. so make sure you say atlantic park hotel next to pirates magaluf... the hotel has been made over and are trying to attract familys and couples... and to forget the male and female parties...apparently last year it was an stag and hen hotel under the old name of Don Manola they will hopefully get there. our room was clean and spacious for a three bedroom. food cannot complain, yes it does get repetitive, but so does yours at home. enough choice for meat lovers and veggies... pool and surround area spacious,very clean and plenty of sun beds and terrace seating. Bar staff very…

title: excellent for young!
review: stayed here in 2006 with my sister! food was nice but breakfast wasnt up to much so we went to cafe across road for 2 euros full english. although hotel caters for familys i feel its better for younger people. great location. pool great staff very friendly. rather noisy at night. we would have returned to this hotel but could not find avaliblitly so we are going to sol jamacia!

title: Lovely hotel shame about the bar staff
review: We arrived at 1pm and had to wait till 4pm for our rooms. When we finally got a key for a room it was on the 7th floor and so small my sons wheelchair could not fit in. (it was only a double room with a 3rd bed  added) We were moved to the 1st floor in a room slightley bigger but alot safer for William to get about. The food was very nice and the staff in the dining hall were very nice. pool area great and the entertainment staff  were the making of this hotel. on the 5th night my husband snapped his achilles tendon and was in hospital for surgery for 3 days, so now i had 1 on crutches and 1in a wheel chair, but when i went to the bar would they hell let me have 3 drinks i was made to go back for another one. Total madness. and the bar staff were very ignorant always talk over…

title: loved it
review: Firstly its not or nolonger called "don whatever" its hotel atlantic park and is worthy of its 4* rating. It has been recently refurbished and it is done to an excellent standard! it has a mix of young and old and families although i must say there are a lot of 18-30's there which if you are young - is great!  Bathrooms had granite floors and tilled trhoughout, bedroom was big enbough and we also had a small tv room. only problem was the security box broke on the frist day but by the second day it was fixed a minor inconvenience.  Cleaners were eagar to come in around 12ish, food was of a high standard, drinks are served in 1/2 pint measures and are slightly expensive but with your evening meal you can give the waiter by the door 2 euros and drink as much alcohol as you want! …

title: Love atlantic park!!
review: Hi i stayed in altlantic park with my friend on 30.05.07 - 06.07.07, we came to magaluf for a fun filled week of clubbing, late nights, etc etc....as thats why people go to magaluf.  Occasionally people were grumpy (staff) at the hotel, but so would i be if i worked long shifts in a hotel.  Firstly, we got there at 3am on sunday morning, after ur flight was delayed.  We got checked in quickly and efficiently, our room was lovely, clean and more than we expected.  We booked our holiday 2days b4 we went, so we wasnt really expecting anything special, but we got a pleasant surprise.  We went to breakfast in the morning and couldnt believe the array of food, there was options for everyone, including fresh fruit, cereal, fried foods, toast, different varities of bread and we were…

title: Loved Atlantic Park!!
review: My friend and I went to Atlantic Park for a week and were very impressed with our stay.  The food was lovely and all rooms were nicely decorated as well as the main lobby and dinner room.  The all inclusive part made it all the much better with free alcoholic drinks and also breakfast, lunch and dinner.  So what if you can only get two alcoholic drinks per person at a time how many more can you carry?? Just drink them and move off your seat to get more! As for the person who wrote the review about the loud noise, yes there are people up at that time but personally its Magaluf what else did you expect?  If you dont want loud noise go to a place thats known to be quiet and relaxing! Not "Shagluf" as they call it!   Anyway i would definately reccommend Atlantic Park to anyone going…

title: A very enjoyable holiday
review: This hotel has had a total refurbishment and apparantly opened during June 2007. Rooms are neat, bright and modern and are serviced every day. Staff are helpful and the evening entertainment very well performed. We went all inclusive and there was always a fantastic variety of food and drink which was well prepared.  The hotel is in walking distance of a lovely sandy beach although we spent all our time next to the pool. Overall, I would reccommend this hotel to all and we had a fantastic time there.   The only three negatives are, firstly, the plates in the dining area were not always clean and one quite ofted had to make sure that you have picked up a clean plate.  Secondly, the place could get quite noisy for a while when the clubs closed around 04h00, but then again, this is…

title: How things have changed
review: Have just returned from atlantic park in magaluf,  having been there twice before when it was called DON MANILO, it was 3* ,and is now classed as 4*.  on arrival had a bet with my other half that it was the previously named don manilo , i was right.   newly decorated i thought it would be better than before. . to start with :  the food was without fault, nothing to complain about  there. the room we had was nothing to complain about either, so when we arrived and had breakfast next day we thought we were in for a NICE holiday.    WRONG.   First night we had a lot of shouting and banging doors at 4 in the morning.  we,ve experienced that before so thought  no more of it.  next night the same but worse, banging on our door and others , shouting obscenities and total disregard for…

title: Nice hotel, but......
review: Upon arriving at the hotel the lady on reception was very polite, check was quick and effeciant. The hotel has been renovated and parts are still being done.  The cleaners are very eager and like to enter your room about 9 in the morning, which less face it is not good if you have just got in. Oh and on my last morning i was woken up at 8 am by maintance people drilling. Not nice after a late one.  The lifts also have a habit of not working at least once a day, which isn't too bad unless you are on the 9th floor.  The food is ok, but only really 3 star food. The breakfast was good with a wide range of cereals, fruits and fried food. Lunch was virtually same as dinner which was always repetative Pizzas, pasta, 1 meat, 1 fish, 2 types of dessert. It's great if your a kid, but for…

title: Ok Hotel, Not the best
review: Having read previous reviews of this hotel I was quite optimistic and didn’t know what to expect.  We turned up at the hotel to find a dull looking building and looks as though there were hardly any balconies only small windows luckily the balconies face away from the entrance part of the building.  My friends took one look at me in horror as me being the travel agent arranged it for us!!!  We were ripped off too with the taxi from the airport we paid 60 euro one way only to discover that the average fare is approximately 35 euro!! So I advise to always agree a fare.  Upon arrival at reception the receptionist warmly greeted us.  Rooms were clean and quite spacious.  Lots of young groups as well as families and mixed aged couples.  Entertainment through day and night was good. …

title: turned away!!!!
review: We arrived at the property just after midnight on 28th June, went to reception to check in, handed over confirmation, the shift manager took this, looked down his list, shrugged his shoulders and said "we do not have a room for you tonight, you stay at palmanova palace come back tomorrow morning then maybe we have a room for you then" NO apology, very unfriendly and really couldn`t be bothered just told us he was calling a taxi to take us to other hotel.  We booked the hotel back in April, as a Travel Agent i would definatley not recommend this property to anyone, after reading reviews from previous customers and was bit optimistic anyway but agree very unfriendly, lack of people skills, the most unhelpful staff!!!!! We stayed at the Palmanova palace for the duration of our…

title: the most unfriendly place I have ever been
review: I have just come back from the Atlantic Park Hotel with some friends.  We went to this hotel last year.  Take note, it is not 400m from beach, there is no show cooking or thematic buffet.  You can not get cake, ice-cream or fruti from the snack bar.  There is no cakes and pastries in the afternoon.  You do not get a welcome drink or free billiards game.  We did not even get a hello!!!!  And there is no jaccuzzi in the pool, also the pool is not like a lake.  The above is all quoted by all travel agents.  The hotel has been done up very nice, much better than last year but the staff were really UNFRIENDLY AND RUDE.  The female staff were ok and two young lads at the bar were ok.  But the rest of the bar staff and restaurant  staff and the reception staff were so unhelpful, rude,…

title: better than expected
review: we travelled to the atlantic park in magaluf from the 1st of june to the 5th. we didnt really no what to expect as we hadnt heard much about  the hotel since it had been refurbished. we arrived in the afternoon and check in was no problem, when we got to our room we were a bit shocked as it wasnt finished. there were light fittings on the bed, the bathroom wasnt finished, there were no lights and the balcony could only fit one of us on it. we were straight back down to reception and there was no problem changing the room, partly because it wasnt that busy. the room we got was great with a pool view. the food wasnt great and if your anything like me ' a fussy eater ' you will be eating out everynight as we did. even though we were all inclusive i couldnt live on pizza all week.…

title: The worst Hotel in the world
review: I stayed in this very poor excuse for a hotel several years ago and it was without a doubt the worst hotel I have ever stayed in .  If you like to go to Chav central with all night shouting and screaming then you will love it.

title: Brill holiday
review: I've been on holiday the past 3 years to this hotel so it can't be all that bad! The rooms are basic, you'd expect a TV but there isn't one, but who goes to Magalluf to watch TV anyway?!?! All rooms have a balcony with a great view and a bed and a bathroom with a flushing toilet and a shower - what more do you need. The reception staff are very helpful. The downside is the food - there is always something to eat but it's not the best i've tried. You get what you pay for! Good entertainment during the day - plenty to drink if you're all inclusive - brill location to have a quiet nights sleep but not too far from the nightlife either. Brill holiday recomment to lads, lasses - but i wouldn't suggest families...

title: Terrible
review: The hotel was a real disappointment. The rooms were basic, the food was terrible and it was very noisy  Coupled with this the weather was dreadful  and it rained a lot.  Our main problem (as a family) was the noise being generated from our next door neighbours rooms when they returned in the early part of the morning  drunk and disorderly.  We weren't allowed acccess to the pool as it was chained up during our stay. The entertainment was naff and lacked any real imagination-quiz games,dancers but some of the acts were cancelled due to the sheer volume of the rain!  I would not feel obliged to reccommend this hotel to anyone unless you're in the 18-30 age group.

title: hell hole from the 1970's
review: dated, dreary, dirty. discusting food,noisy. the hotel staff unfriendly unhelpful and rude. if you want a drunken holiday with somewhere to put your head when your sobering up then this is the one for you.

title: Family Holiday
review: After reading terrible reviews about this hotel i thought oh god what am I letting myself in for. I can safely say to all those people out there that are planning to go here they have nothing to worry about. With it being in the area it is yeah there is a lot of groups of young people but going to Magaluf  what do you except?!. The food at the hotel is very basic but there's plenty of choice. If you fancy a change there are plenty of English bars and takeaways located within a 5 minute walk away from the hotel.  Entertainment is based on children however there is plenty in the surrounding area to suit all ages. I do recommend The Western Water Park for a great fun family day out and The Pirate show which is loacted right next door to the hotel. I enjoyed Magaluf that much im…

title: Hotel from Hell
review: What can i say about this hotel? were do i start! although me and my four friends had a great holiday, the Don Manolo was terrible! The food is vile we could not eat salad and bread any longer so we ate out most nights after that! The food seemed to be the same everyday and looked as thou it was left overs reheated! The rooms were basic, and were cleaned everyday, although i did find a disgusting present left behind by some previous holiday maker in our toilet brush holder!!!! This is defo not a hotel for people with children, as there is loud noise 24 hours a day, the walls are so thin its so hard to get some sleep! big gangs seem to enjoy throwing chairs and tables of the balcony!  although the entertainment was good for the adults, the childrens mini disco seemed to only have…

title: Never ever again....
review: I have just returned from a weeks stay at the Don Manolo in Magaluf with my friend. To put in blunty this place is absolutely awful. The food is disgusting and stale, nothing is fresh and I would warn you against eating the meat there as it is not cooked properly at all. The same food is kept out all week and only topped up with fresh food occasionally also the same meals are served everyday.   The staff are so unhelpful and their customer services skills leave a lot to be desired, If you need any assistance do not expect to get any as they shrug their shoulders and pass the buck to someone equally as useless.  I would strongly advise any one of taking their families to this place, I felt so sorry for the families staying there as people were coming in from nights out at 5 in…

title: Never again
review: Just returned home today and will at least get a good nights sleep!!! Basically if you are going there in a large hen or stag night group  and just want to get legless then this is the place for you! NOT  for families at all, too many drunken yobs around the pool.. Staff appear to dislike  their jobs and who can blame them after what they have to deal with day in ,day out. Large groups of men sit around the pool getting drunk from 10 am onwards ,  The noise level is contant 24 hours ( LOUD). aFTER DARK IT JUST GETS WORSE ! There was a lot of shouting from the balconies and running up and down the corridors, smashing glass and at least a couple of evictions a night!!!. Food wise it is a bit samey, although ok. Entertainment is poor, although the staff did try hard and seemed very…

title: Bring on August!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: Me and my friend stayed at this hotel June 2006 and what a holiday it was. We had mixed feelings about staying here as the reviews weren't very good!!!! But can i just say this was the best holiday we have both ever been on!!!! The hotel itself is very basic but clean, we found the staff friendly and the rooms were always clean and made up every day. We both think this hotel is not for families it is full of stag and hen parties, more stag parties which believe me is a girls paradise. We met alot of people here especially some loud welsh lads (phwaa very nice), put it like this everyone goes out for the same thing!!!! Night life is absolutely fantastic, everyone is very very friendly and there are hundreads of bars to choose from. This was the first time for us both in magaluff…

title: Roll On Don Morolo
review: 13 girls went again from wigan on a hen doo renuion, the hotel is on the basic side, however it does the job it is supose to do!. Rooms are ok (take some bugs away wipes  and just wipe over your bathroom again) and your well away!!. Food is not of a good standard but is edable but you can eat out.  You can have as much alcohol as you wish day and night! and on both occassions we have met some great people who are up for a laugh. Overall Hotel is cheap and cheerful and is great for Hen, Stag and Birthday Doo's.

title: Bring your mates
review: Do not bring your family here!!!!  Bring your mates!!!!!  The hotel is only suitable for groups of mates (stags and hens), and so is populated by them, so if you are looking for a peaceful break do not come here!!  Do come here if you want a cheap break, in a 24-hour ‘party’ resort. The bars in the hotel offer local beer (which is ok after the 6th one) and local sprits (and a choice of 4 cocktails). The food is of a ‘school dinners’ standard, but you shouldn’t be coming here for the food (I do recommend the cooked breakfast, which is served about 1/2 hour after the last club kicks out).   The beach and pubs and clubs are about a 5-minute walk from the hotel. No need for a taxi into town!  We paid 28 Euros to get from the Airport, in a taxi.  The British mainly use the hotel, so…

title: Late Break
review: Took my mom to the Don Manolo for a quite break at the end of September. We were just looking for a cheap all inclusive and this was it. Arrived quite late but still food available. The food varied a bit but was not very warm most days. Pool quite small but ok and beach not far away. Bars just round the corner and Pirates directly over road.  No problems with room or hotel in general (just make sure if you're departing late in the day you need to book a slot in the shower in reception!!!) As we went quite late in the season was pretty empty, still had most entertainment and the staff tried to make the most of it bless them especially Jonny (very cute) and Rafa. Probably a lot better mid season, but a holiday is what you make it.

title: Great place
review: this hotel was great, simlpe rooms but they were always tidied up...the food was nothing Flash  but really nice. the location is perfect, you can lounge by the pool allday in the sun, or a very short walk into plalma or  a short walk to magaluf on an evening. this is a hassle free hotel where you can enjoy your holiday without worring about anything.

title: natural laxative
review: hey people just returned today from a weeks all inclusive to the DON MANOLO...............  O MY GOD  this is a bad hotel, as the title goes the food gives u the trotts and the ale is watered down , the only thing i enjoyed about my stay in the don manolo is that i escaped every night out of the hotel.......... i read the reviews on here and me and my girlfriend thought it cant be that bad, it is probably some old stuck-up people writing the reviews. but the bad ones are true ....  SO BE WARNED PEOPLE " DON MANOLO " GIVES YOU THE TROTTS.

title: Its still 3 star....
review: If you wanna get drunk every night, and then hit the town, then you got your hotel. If you want to eat well, clean rooms, and quiet in the evenings, I would suggest going to an old persons home. Fantastic for those in the right frame of mind, but to be fair, the food is shocking. We ate out 10 out of 14 nights, but always ended up back at the hotel to take advantage of all those free Vodka Oranges.

title: A decent visit!!!
review: We have just returned from a weeks all inclusive visit to Don Manolo, and reading some reports wondered if we had made the right decision...but still travelled with an open mind. On arrival, the hotel seemed black and dirty but on entering the reception area the image had totally changed. Its like walking into another hotel, clean and tidy looking.  As soon as we went to reception for check in, and throughout the holiday we considered the staff to be of an excellent service and were helpful throughout. On entering the room, our first impressions were standard, but being a 3* hotel we wern't expecting anything more. Clean rooms and storage space to accomodate all of our possesions, including safes, which must be rented at reception for a small fee. As we got there quite late, the…

title: never again !!
review: After reading a few off the reviews was a bit worried about going. it was a last min all inclusive deal for myself and friend for a quick get away. where do i start: the entertainment was rubbish, bar staff rude, unhelpful, reception staff as the bar staff. It was meant to be a family hotel !!! it was full off single sexed groups, with some family parties, the noise from the hotel at night was a nightmare, from 4am onto 7am music blearing, shouting, things being thrown. how anybody could sleep though that, it should never include famillies should be a 18-30 holiday hotel. the food was copable was always hot and plentiful staff were happy and helpful and included pic nic's if you were going to the beach for the day. The alcohol was unrecognizable. i would never go there again.

title: don't go
review: i was in this hotel for 9 day's all inclusive, and thought the staff was arrogant, never wanted to help. the food was terrible an i ended up eating out cause after 2 nights i relised the food was the same has the night before, i went in the restaurant each night but the food was still the same choice. the cleaners never actually cleaned up, all the done was tided the bed sheets, we had black marks over the bed sheets even after we complained to the reception. my final advise is DON'T GO, LOOK SOMEWHERE ELSE
